comments: Only couple days, awesome! Has Theasaurus built in so learning is easier. Paid for it, no ads! On 2 months vacay @ CDMX, very limited knowledge Spanish. Better app than the other I used AND off line mode!!! Hope this helps, good luck

The app says it will translate Georgian but after you install it, it tells you it won't work for Georgian. The app wasted my time and it's now taking me a while to figure out how to stop the automatic payments that will start after the free trial is over.

Pretty useless. I'm using offline translation, Spanish to English. Translated a Spanish message that included details of an engine oil purchase, English result was "Ok, I'll be right back, and I'll be right back." How is this remotely useful? Google Translate got it right, thank goodness I had service!
Very easy to use, and for the most part accurate. I'm fluent in 5 languages Italian, German, French, Spanish, and Dutch. And this translator is very accurate in all those. Highly recommend.

Im giving only one star. I used the app once to try to figure out they chinese letters on my car screen and did not work at all. I tried the 7 days free subscription thinking rhat it will help me in getting the translation but did not change anything. Now it just automatically subscribes for a year without any consent and now i have no money because of an app that i don't even use. I emailed for a refund but nothing yet.

title: 1Password - Password Manager and Secure Wallet
description:
1Password: the password manager that's as beautiful and simple as it is secure. Simply add your passwords, and let 1Password do the rest. Try 1Password free for 14 days, then keep going with a 1Password.com subscription.

Selected by Android Central as the Best Password Manager for Android: "For those who want the absolute best password manager for their phone, tablet, and computers, 1Password is the way to go."


PUT PASSWORDS IN THEIR PLACE

1Password remembers all your passwords for you, and keeps them safe and secure behind the one password that only you know.

◆  Create strong, unique passwords for all your online accounts
◆  Fill usernames and passwords into websites and apps
◆  Access your information on all your mobile devices and computers
◆  Share passwords securely with your family or company
◆  Unlock with a single tap using Fingerprint Unlock


GET ORGANIZED

1Password is for more than just passwords: it’s the ideal place for financial information, personal documentation, or anything you need to keep secure and accessible.

◆  Store information in more than a dozen categories: logins, credit cards, addresses, notes, bank accounts, driver licenses, passports, and more
◆  Create multiple vaults to keep different areas of your life separate
◆  Organize your information with favorites
◆  Use search to find and filter your information


STAY SAFE

Everything you store in 1Password is protected by a Master Password that only you know. 1Password uses end-to-end encryption, so your data is only ever decrypted offline. The encryption keys never leave your device, and you are the only one who can see your passwords.

◆  Unlock the app quickly and securely with Fingerprint Unlock
◆  Lock the app automatically to ensure your data is protected, even if your device is lost or stolen


SHARE WITH TEAMS AND FAMILIES

1Password for Android has full support for team and family accounts. It’s never been so easy to share the simple security of 1Password with those you work and live with.

◆ Add all your accounts — family, team, individual — and see all your information in one place
◆ Easily migrate information between accounts
◆ Share passwords and more with teammates and family members


TRY FREE

Get a 14-day free trial when you install 1Password, and subscribe at any time on 1Password.com.

Your subscription lets you use 1Password everywhere. Your data syncs securely and automatically between your devices, and can also be accessed on the web. Learn more at https://1password.com.


LOVED AND USED BY MILLIONS

1Password has been highlighted in The New York Times, GQ, The Wall Street Journal, Forbes, The Verge, Ars Technica, Mashable, and The Guardian.

◆ Featured on NBC’s Today Show: Coolest must-have phone apps of 2017!
◆ Named One of The World’s Greatest 100 Apps by Business Insider

We’re proud of this recognition, and we’re even happier that millions of people love and use 1Password every day.


WE LOVE TO HEAR FROM YOU

We love 1Password and strive to make it the best it can be. Connect with us at support+android@agilebits.com, @1Password on Twitter, and Facebook.com/1Password! We're also available for feedback or questions in our discussion forums at https://1pw.ca/AndroidForum .

In this update, we’ve added support for filling credentials in the Vivaldi browser and made further improvements to Archived items and file fields. comments: Dropping a star. My opinion remains - the UX is unfriendly and unintuitive. I'm sure this makes sense to a programmer but not a user. Also, I want the ability to generate a password BEFORE I commit to creating a login. Norton has this. The method you propose assumes I am creating a login in the app, but this is not how people create logins. For $70 per year, this needs a significant overhaul. At this point, I'm seeking a refund. I thought I could put up with the issues, but it's too much.

Not sure what happened here but .... It is not the same and this is before the new versions being released. Things like stating they have Linux client when it's not really a full client, just a snap or maybe python coded program to present their web vault like a client. Then other areas where instructions were literally copy and paste credentials .... Isn't that part of the reason for a. Password Manager? Sometimes is one thing but as a necessity in some scenarios? Use BitWarden, 1Pass done

I love this app. The Family Plan and sharing vaults has been instrumental in getting my elderly parents to FINALLY get a password manager. My only feedback is that the built-in browser is very unhelpful and often has trouble rendering important websites. I wish I could configure this app to open links in a browser app of my choice by tapping the url.

Have liked this app before... this version will not allow me to enable biometric unlock and keeps crashing before I can use it to fill in a username/password. Crashes over and over. Allows me to slide the button for bio unlock, but does not ask for a fingerprint confirmation and does not enable the feature. App is currently useless.

Love it BUT.... It doesnt work on my tablet in DEX mode Samsung S7+ 5g Ultra. Really silly, cos its the only way i use my tablet. I now need to open my phone find the password stored, then go back to tablet and enter it.... Which is really stupid when 1password sets a 20+ multi character password. please fix this

title: Ever Accountable - Rise Above Pornography
description:
Are you tired of feeling like you can't quit porn?

We have the solution: You choose to be accountable to someone. 
The American Society of Training and Development (ATSD) found that by having a committed accountability partner, your chance of success increases by 95%.

And, after surveying thousands of our customers, we found that 84-96% of pornography viewing is completely eliminated by using Ever Accountable. In fact, almost 90% of pornography usage disappears immediately when people start using this app!

And it’s easy!

Ever Accountable is a positive choice to become accountable to a trusted friend. You don’t need to fight porn alone!

This app allows you to share your device activity with a friend you trust. It gives YOU the freedom to use your device how you like, while keeping you accountable for the choices you make.

Ever Accountable is a powerful motivator in the fight against pornography. It rebuilds trust that you can make good choices on your own. And it opens up conversations that lead to lasting healing.

You choose to control who sees your device activity. Your reports will contain the websites you visit, content viewed inside many popular apps, and a breakdown of the time spent in all apps. Things you type and messages sent to you may also be included in the reports. We realize that you might not want certain apps to be shared, so you can exclude them from your reports. 

You can stop sharing your device activity at any time. If you do choose to stop sharing, your accountability partners will be notified.

Reports contain a summary of all the content you view, not just the pornographic content. The system will automatically flag content it deems to be pornographic.  

The price is $9.99 per month after the 14-day free trial for our individual plan.*

Ever Accountable doesn't run your battery down, uses very little data (typically just a few megabytes per month after the initial setup) and is very hard to bypass.

What will your story be? Start your free trial today!

The nitty gritty:

This app uses Accessibility services. It uses the BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE permission to monitor content and share device activity, which helps people who wish to avoid pornography to use their android devices and apps.

This app uses the Device Administrator permission. This allows us to alert your accountability partner when the app is uninstalled or disabled. This permission is used for no other purpose.

comments: I love this app. I don't feel pushed to use it so I feel in control. I don't know about others but I think if you give people options on whether to count a streak could be more meaningful. Overall, its just enough and works well with me. I forgot to mention minor bugs sometimes causing it to turn off but nothing to worry about.
This app is very light on the phone. Others I have used loaded down the phone and almost made it inoperable. Also, the app does a much better job of tracking apps that the others.
Ever accountable has helped me be, well, accountable. They have a great way of doing it, and having a partner to help you is especially helpful.

Ever accountable has been a total game changer for me. The hardest part about it is asking someone to be your accountability partner, but dont let that deter you! Freedom is just on the other side of that one uncomfortable conversation and it is well worth it. This app makes it so much easier to quit and the emails are very encouraging. $10 a month is a very small price to pay for liberation from porn. May God richly bless you and the creators of this amazing app 🙌

I really do enjoy this app but what makes me disappointed is it's designed for only men. I'm a woman who struggles with the same thing I wish the app could encourage women as well. It does the job of what I need it to do just wished it could be for women. Maybe the app creator could look into it.

title: WPS Office - Free Office Suite for Word,PDF,Excel
description:
★ WPS Office-Free Office suite for Word, PDF, Excel, is an all-in-one office suite integrates Word, PDF, Excel, PowerPoint, Forms, Cloud Storage, Online Editing, Template library and Sharing. Access various WPS Office functions through mobile devices, such as scan PDF files, edit slides, convert spreadsheets, or view documents anytime, anywhere.

★ WPS Office is compatible with MS Office 365 but Free in basic functions, smarter & lighter.In addition, WPS Office can work perfectly with Google Classroom, Zoom, Slack and Google Drive.

 「Features of WPS Office 」
1. Powerful Office Suite on your Android device 
• Using templates to start editing your budget, presentations, resumes, documents and other files.
•Using tools to convert and process Document, PDF and images.
•Easy to create, edit, share word documents and collaborated on with others in real-time.

2. Scan, view, edit, convert PDF on your Android device
• Free PDF reader that can open, view, share and comment on PDFs anywhere and on any device
• Convert all Office documents (Word, Text, Excel, PowerPoint, doc) to PDF
• Scan paper documents/convert images to PDF
• Support PDF annotation
• Signature is now supported in Document
• Support PDF extraction/split, PDF merge, PDF to Word/Excel/PPT
• Easily add and delete watermarks in PDF

3. Powerful cloud storage function, you are not afraid of losing documents
• Use WPS Cloud to manage all documents, synchronize in real time on mobile phones and computers, and easily and directly access and edit office documents
• Save documents to third-party clouds: Dropbox, Google Drive, Box, Evernote and OneDrive.

4. Solutions for working remotely on Android devices
• 1G free cloud storage, support online editing and sharing of files, easy to build and join the cloud team
• Easy to share office documents via WIFI, NFC, DLNA, email, instant messaging, WhatsApp, Telegram, Facebook and Twitter

Now available PC and Mac for free , please visit the following link: https://d.wps.com
Support page:  http://help.wps.com/Android-Office/

comments: When you select text, it puts up a black box that completely blocks further progress. Cannot use colors on text, and cannot use 1/2 numbers for text size. Now after latest upgrade can't rename a file or close one. Good job . Stupid ad captures the whole phone. Cannot back out. Nothing has changed. Won't show all (all) pictures when inserting a pic. Totally worthless as is. How else can you screw it up ? can't back out. Have to hit the III button and then wipe of the screen to close.

Very easy to use, even on the mobile! Storage is fantastic, and convenient; I have used it for job hunting, as I composed, and had my resume stored on my mobile. Having this app on my phone is a game changer, very satisfied.

This is really a great office app. I use it mainly because it has support for multiple platform. WPS alone can handle all types of documents. I use this in my laptop, tab and android. The 20 GB online storage which comes with subscription helps a lot. I feel like the subscription price should be cheaper.

It is one hundred times better than any application I even used! And because my job depends on such good apps then I really appreciate. I just wish if it could give more free template,because people like me who are living in Iran Or countries like Iran where we can not buy the premium ,are really far from using its awesome templates. Again so appreciate for your perfect performance.

It's a very fast app and is very helpful for those who don't want to use different apps for each type of pdf as WPS office supports mostly all types of PDFs and stuff.... and there are other facilities also like it helps to view the pdf from the page you had left it....as a student It was really helpful for me....I totally recommend this app for people who face issues with pdfs and other files....

title: HotSchedules
description:
​HotSchedules is the industry's leading employee scheduling app because it’s the fastest and easiest way to manage your schedule and communicate with your team.  

Team members love it because they can swap, pick-up or release shifts with one click. Work-life balance is easily managed with automatic shift pick ups when you want more hours and time off requests for when you don’t.  Calendar sync and notifications keep your Schedules and the roster automatically updated to your phone with any manager-approved changes.

Managers appreciate the 75% time savings when building schedules and one-click approvals for shift changes.  The ability to monitor business performance with sales and labor snapshots from anywhere, keeps them out of the back office.  And most importantly, staying connected with broadcast and one-to-one messaging makes for a happy and productive team culture.
 
NOTE: The HotSchedules application REQUIRES a valid HotSchedules user account through your employer.  Need help?  Contact Customer Care 24x7x365

comments: Good app for employees with managers that know what they're supposed to do. Your experience may vary depending on your hardware/OS it seems. This app updates frequently which is annoying because you won't be able to log in until you update or look on the website. I find myself getting randomly logged out every other month or so as well for no reason. ALSO IF YOU DONT WANT TO BUY THIS APP JUST GO TO THE WEBSITE. THE APP IS JUST A LITTLE MORE CONVENIENT

I cannot believe they are charging for this app. Not only am I being extorted to buy the app (or it's a pain to clock in), the app I PAID FOR is barely functional. Often slow and unresponsive, and the widget will freak out if I even look at it wrong. I'm sorry that your job is using this service
This app sucks. Constantly have to update it. It only works when it wants to. So the price you pay is not worth it. It should be a free app, when it screws up all the time.

Constant bugs for important things. E.g. the calendar is one day ahead all of a sudden and claims it's Friday (it's not, it's Thursday), so it says I'm scheduled for today (when I'm scheduled for Friday). It was on time all week until just today, and now it looks like I missed my shift. Luckily I worked it out with my manager, but this is unacceptable. It's too important to be bugged like this.

I have such a difficult time logging in most of the time! Today I have to go to Google Play and update the certificate. I have uninstalled and reinstalled multiple times...extremely frustrating and wish my company didn't force us to use Hot Schedules! ***ZERO STARS!!!*** Update on 6/7/21. They "upgraded" on June 3rd and I haven't been able to log in since then! "There was an error. Please try again later." Extremely frustrating and a total junk app! I REALLY wish i wasn't forced to use it!!!

comments: The 'G Cloud Backup' is a wonderful & useful app. I love the options to earn additional storage space, FREE! I'm not a tech person so it seems the main page could be set-up to be a little more user friendly. I like to keep my text messages as a diary/journal entry. Looking back @ them helps w/ scrapbooking. I have an additional memory having the G Cloud save all my text messages. I can delete unimportant info, if it saved from my error of not correcting before going to the cloud. Zaza

Perfect until DECEMBER 2020. I notice it will run on my old Android 7 LG Stylo 3+ but won't run any longer on Samsung devices. Multiple emails to Genie support before getting any response. Since May zero follow up. Samsung smartswitch doesn't function nearly as well as a restore via G Cloud. G brings over all apps and some home screen launcher settings (thank goodness). After 8 months, Finally a v that works! 10.2. 10 Stars for app, 1 star for tech support.

G Cloud is the only cloud storage I have ever used for the past 5 years. It is simple, secure, and easy to navigate. I stuck with G cloud though their growth...and it has only gotten better. I have tried others, but always came back.
This is one of the most generous and greatest storage apps I have found and used extensively. They offer upgrades and services that I have not found in an app similar to it. I love it!!
UPDATE.... FIXED!! Used for two years, now since the last update it keeps saying I'm out of space (I pay for unlimited), won't backup and won't let me open the cloud gallery...

title: mydlink
description:
Important Notes
• Older D-Link cameras (DCS-xxxL and DCS-xxxxL) can still be used with the new mydlink app, but advanced functionality such as Cloud Recording and Automation will not be supported. 
• The new mydlink app does not support mydlink™ Home devices (DCS-935LH, DCS-8200LH, DSP-W110, DSP-W215, DCH-S150, DCH-S160, DCH-S220, DCH-G020, DCH-Z110, DCH-Z120).
• The new mydlink app does not support setup and control of D-Link Wi-Fi router devices. To install and control these devices, follow the accompanying instructions on the router packaging and manual

With the new mydlink app, smart home control is now Smarter, Simpler, and More Compatible. You can view your home monitoring cameras in real-time, be alerted and record video when motion or sound is detected, turn appliances on/off, as well as set schedules and automations to make your life easier. All from the convenience of your smartphone or tablet. 

Your Home, Only Smarter

NEW RICH NOTIFICATIONS*
• See and do more right from your lock screen
• Get clear snapshots, open live-views, and call designated contacts** in one tap

NEVER MISS A MOMENT WITH CLOUD RECORDING
• Save motion and sound-triggered video footage to the cloud, and watch it anywhere, anytime 
• Filter recordings by Event Type, Date, Device, and Location

WORKS WITH THE GOOGLE ASSISTANT, ALEXA
• Use voice commands to bring up live-views from a camera on your Chromecast and Echo Show, or turn your lights, fans, and other appliances on or off

SET IT AND FORGET IT WITH SCHEDULING
• Wake up to freshly-brewed coffee every morning
• Walk into your brightly-lit home every evening after work
---
Cloud Recording Paid Plans(Price for reference only, local currencies applies)

Basic
Event recording, 7 days and up to 3 cameras.
USD $2.49 Monthly, USD $24.99 Yearly

Premium
Event recording, 14 days and up to 5 cameras
USD $4.99 Monthly, USD $49.99 Yearly

Pro
Event recording, 30 days and up to 10 cameras
USD $9.99 Monthly, USD $99.99 Yearly
---

comments: Camera view on phone always shows 2-4 days ago so any 'tap to view' current does nothing but show you the last time it actually worked. Phone app (android) is one of the worst. I have eZviz camera and never any viewing issue. Why have a security camera app that will not let you view real-time !?? A couple months later and the functionality is horrible... I will NEVER recommend this product... what is the point of having security hardware that just doesn't work ?!

Critical defects: 1) Human detection doesn't work as ANY type of motion (none human) still triggers alerts. 2) Motion detection area is COMPLETELY broken as any motion outside this box will still trigger alerts. Have 3 cameras and all have this problem plus I'm an IT Pro so know what I'm doing. Extremely disappointed since these are two key advertised features which clearly do NOT work! Buy Eufy floodlight camera instead as these app features work flawlessly. I know because I also have one.

After the last firmware update it take 15-20 minutes before I get a notification on my cell. Also it doesn't capture everyone on the camera. I use this for front door security, and it didn't capture me coming home with my wife. Absolutely useless as a security camera.

Why can't D-Link make a more user friendly app? Sure the cameras are ok but your app sucks. It seems like the more cameras I buy and put around my house the more difficult it is to set them all up and my newest addition isn't even showing up in the list of cameras that I have to schedule it. Please do not reply to this review, that takes precious time away from revamping and creating an awesome app.

I've had nothing but problems with both the app and the water sensors. The app only partially downloaded onto my iPad then I could neither complete the download nor restart it nor delete the partial download. I then downloaded the app onto an Android phone. When adding devices the app often "spins" forever and I need to restart the phone. This app is not ready for prime time. DLink needs to go back to the drawing board.

title: AdTranquility Spam Protection
description:
Our mission is to get rid of aggressive advertising forever.

Spam and annoying ads - they're a nuisance we've gotten used to. Why?

You may be used to feeling a lack of control, of not being able to do anything about the nonsense you're bombarded with every day.

Fighting against greedy, unethical, aggressive advertisers isn't an easy game.

But that's where AdTranquility comes in. We want to equip you with the power to say "NO" to misleading, annoying ads.

We want to help you create a distraction-free environment.

So that using your mobile, or browsing the internet is a tranquil and relaxing experience.

The question is - do you want to join our cause? Do you believe that together we can stop abusive advertisers and bring back the beauty of the internet?

==============

Our first proposal for you is the Spam Protection app.

If you're getting bombarded with tens, maybe even hundreds of "push notifications" every day (yes, those annoying messages telling you about how you won a new iPhone), we have the solution.

==> Simply follow these 3 steps:

1. Download the application
2. Follow the simple (one step, one-click) on-screen instructions
3. Click the big button, and clear your current notifications. You won't get any more!

We hope you enjoy using our app. Please, tell your friends about us if you think they'll find this app - or our mission - aligned with their needs!

comments: I originally gave this app a 4 star. I have taken 3 stars because my phone is completely glitchy and slow now! Then to add insult to injury it has tried taking extra money from my account that I connected it to for the 4.99 p week as it claimed... But not only did it take that it came back for 9.99 not once but so far 4x!!! I attempted to reach the creators on this, but surprise! surprise! They did not respond to my query regarding the attempt to take money that is not approved!! DON'T DO IT
This is the best decision i ever made to get this app. Trying to control all of these spam calls and emails is just sickening. I highly recommend it!
It has completely stopped all ads from affecting my phone! I love the peace of mind I now have!! Great job guys...
I wasn't sure if to do it at first but I've had less spam and unwanted ads without the hassles of trying to get rid of them myself so far so good 🤞
This app is pretty good I don't a lot of spam calls but when I do it's only about two a week.

comments: I love it. I use free version to keep track of my notes via email (cause I go through a lot of phones, clumsy ole me) and I've never lost data or had any problems. (Update August 2021) I still love this app but lately the checklist keeps glitching. It will suddenly erase everything except the first letter of each item. What's going on?

Can't tout this app enough!!! I lost my phone with every bit of information about me including addresses, pictures, passwords, EVERYTHING! I downloaded the app again to start over. When I opened the app, it asked for my email address. Thankfully I remembered the address I used for this app and, voila! There was all the information I'd saved on the app! By no means was it everything I'd lost but I'd regained a big chunk of it! THANK YOU, INKPAD!!!!

I love this app! It's great for writing down things that you need when you are on the go and on your phone or anyother device like saving meal ideas or gifts or grocery list! Everyone needs to download this app even if you don't need it 😂 thanks to everyone who makes all these apps there all amazing thanks again and have a great day bye!

I honestly do Not think I could do without InkPad! I use it Every single day, usually, several times in a day. To Do lists, grocery lists, memories that pop up, and often, journal entries of time spent with my granddaughters. It is easy to use and quick to access. Again, I just couldn't do without it!

This is the best notepad app that I've ever used. I pay for the upgrade because my life on paper is literally stored in this app. At $1.99 a month, you just can't beat it... although the free app is great too. But the best thing about Inkpad/Notepad, is the customer service. Dave has helped me out numerous times, and has always solved my problem within minutes. I can't say enough good things about this app, and if I could give it 100 stars, I definitely would... Thanks Dave.

title: BlockSite - Stay Focused & Control Your Time
description:
Stay focused with BlockSite the app that improves productivity by blocking websites and apps that waste your time. Create custom block lists, schedule tasks or start a focus session to make sure you stay focused, productive and in control of your time.

BlockSite is considered an awesome self control app to regain time control as it enables you to control your browsing content by blocking apps and sites when you need to keep focused.

All it takes is a few simple clicks once downloaded and you’ll be able to avoid procrastination, increase concentration and stop wasting time.  You’ll also be able to stay more engaged with the world around you and make time for what matters most, both online and offline. 

So whether you’re a student, professional in the workplace or just want to implement better productivity and time management in your life by improving your digital habits, we can help.

⭐️Features⭐️

Want to know how to block a website? We’ve got you covered! Just add websites to your block list on and we’ll do the rest, we’ll even throw in some really funny images if you try and go on the sites while they’re blocked 💩

⏰Stay Focused App
Remove all distracting and harmful websites and apps from your life by blocking them while you need to stay focused and productive. You can even set yourself a focus timer and make sure you stay on track throughout the day while at work or school.

👨🏼‍💻Focus Mode
The work mode timer feature enables you to control your time via the Pomodoro technique timer. Break down your work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes followed by a short break. With ‘Work Mode’ you can set times when to block websites and when to browse freely - no willpower necessary.

🔞Block Adult Content
Ever wondered how to block adult content on your device? Well now you can...easily! With the built in porn blocker that blocks all known adult sites by default making sure that you don’t see any inappropriate content.

📅Scheduling
Set up your own daily schedules and daily routines when you need to stay on track with the ‘Scheduling’ feature that enables you to set days and times when you can access certain sites and apps. It’s the best time management planner you could ever wish for, we promise!

⏳Time Management
Now your time management schedule will never look better! You’ll be able to get all your work done and still have time to browse your favorite sites and apps in between.

📱💻Sync
BlockSite is a cross-browser website/URL and app blocker that helps you to control your website usage and manage distractions and addictions. It is available on Google Chrome and can be synced between your desktop and mobile so you stay productive and have total control over your time wherever you are.

As one of the best productivity tools available, we can help you  procrastinate less, become more productive and reach their life goals. You’ll never have to worry again about how to stay focused at work. So what are you waiting for? Download now and start taking control of your time...today!

BlockSite helps you stay focused and avoid distracting websites and apps by using Accessibility services to block them from opening. As part of this process, BlockSite receives and analyzes aggregated de-identified information about your mobile data and app use. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy: https://blocksite.co/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://blocksite.co/terms/

comments: Too easy to unlock by hitting the big red Unlock button and a quick swish of a pattern - in the middle of a planned two hour Work Mode. Found myself scrolling an app without even realizing I did it. It worked for awhile until I realized the SIMPLE workaround that does not even require me to close app.I guess this would work well for my kid, which is why I am giving it 3 stars. As a personal app for Blocking I give it 1 star. It doesn't Block anything, it just slows down access by 5 seconds, max.

It would be great if it actually blocked the site. The site will still populate and then you'll see a page overlapping it stating block site blocked it and you have to click out of that to go back to continue your search. Happens at least 5 times a day and I don't search the web that much. It's still very annoying just as much if not more than the site I want to block. Seems to defeat the purpose. Uninstalled.

This app is good but then there is only 1 issue that needs to be solved. I'm a premium user and I downloaded this app to curb certain addictions of mine. The only reason I went premium is because I felt like the uninstall feature would help me stay accountable. I soon realised I was wrong after the purchase because even if you turn on the uninstall feature, you can simply turn it off with 1 click and then uninstall the app. This need to be fixed. If you do fix it, I will reconsider my review.

I DO NOT RECOMMEND!!! It's says free, you download, it it let's you block 1. After one you have to upgrade, you don't even get any comfort or peace of mind on knowing that this is actually doing the job before it says you need to upgrade to block anyone else.

Used to be the best but now after installing it on a new phone, it wants me to accept its spyware on my phone ("to keep track of my usage stats so I'll know how I use my phone". Thanks but no thanks - as if you ever needed that to block specific apps/sites) or it won't let me use it. Also, every other feature is now behind a paywall except you can only block 10 or so sites/apps. That's all it does now. It's become useless. The spyware especially leaves a bad taste!

title: signNow - Sign and Fill PDF Docs
description:
The signNow signature app is a mobile business tool that allows you to sign documents in PDF and other formats. Sign and send documents to one or multiple recipients. Email customized signing invites to let your recipients fill out PDF files and add electronic signatures from any mobile or desktop device. Write on PDF with a document signing app trusted by 6+ million users worldwide.

Key features:
⚈ E-sign documents free and collect e-signatures from multiple parties.
⚈ Upload docs to the signNow e-signature app and turn them into fillable PDFs.
⚈ Fill and sign documents by using diverse annotation tools embedded in signNow’s PDF document editor.
⚈ Make a PDF easy to fill and sign by adding fillable fields.
⚈ Send your document for signing and let recipients fill and sign PDF forms in seconds.
⚈ Create your personal signature using the e-signature maker. Type to sign or draw to sign.
⚈ Access your files from the mobile app or the web app anytime and anywhere to sign documents or edit PDF documents for free.

Sign PDF documents free and collect signatures in minutes instead of days:
⚈ Sign PDF documents by simply tapping on your smartphone screen.
⚈ Invite other users to sign and fill documents from any Internet-connected device.
⚈ Instantly share documents via short signing links.
⚈ Create a team so that multiple users can collaboratively manage and co-sign documents.

Save time filling out PDFs by using a convenient document editor for free:
⚈ Upload and fill out PDF, Word, PNG, PPT, or text docs online. 
⚈ Edit documents on your phone before sending PDFs to sign and fill.
⚈ Add text, date, checkmarks, stamps, and e-signatures to your PDFs as annotations.
⚈ Convert JPEG to PDF, PNG to PDF, BMP to PDF, etc.

Get a form builder and a form filling app in one comprehensive solution:
⚈ Add different types of fillable fields to documents, including text fields, dropdowns, signature fields, date fields, etc.
⚈ Create complex fillable PDFs by using conditional fields, calculated fields, and attachment request fields.
⚈ Save unlimited reusable templates and send fillable document copies for signing.

Benefit from global compliance with the signNow app for Android:
⚈ Archive and store completed documents into folders for easy access and safekeeping.
⚈ Ensure your data is protected with 256-bit encryption in transit and at rest.
Use legally-binding electronic signatures fully compliant with the ESIGN Act of 2000.
⚈ Fill and sign docs offline. All your changes will automatically sync once reconnected. 
⚈ Keep a document's detailed history and all actions to it with the Audit Trail feature. 

More benefits of the signNow e-signature app: 
⚈ Export or import documents from your email, Dropbox, Google Drive, and more.
⚈ Sign up and sign in with one click using your Google or Facebook account.
⚈ Download documents to your device, store them on your signNow account, or print them.
⚈ E-sign documents on a tablet with Kiosk Mode. Collect e-signatures at events, in waiting rooms, and at front desks; automatically generate a new file for every new signer.

descriptionHTML:
The signNow signature app is a mobile business tool that allows you to sign documents in PDF and other formats. Sign and send documents to one or multiple recipients. Email customized signing invites to let your recipients fill out PDF files and add electronic signatures from any mobile or desktop device. Write on PDF with a document signing app trusted by 6+ million users worldwide.

Key features:
⚈ E-sign documents free and collect e-signatures from multiple parties.
⚈ Upload docs to the signNow e-signature app and turn them into fillable PDFs.
⚈ Fill and sign documents by using diverse annotation tools embedded in signNow’s PDF document editor.
⚈ Make a PDF easy to fill and sign by adding fillable fields.
⚈ Send your document for signing and let recipients fill and sign PDF forms in seconds.
⚈ Create your personal signature using the e-signature maker. Type to sign or draw to sign.
⚈ Access your files from the mobile app or the web app anytime and anywhere to sign documents or edit PDF documents for free.

Sign PDF documents free and collect signatures in minutes instead of days:
⚈ Sign PDF documents by simply tapping on your smartphone screen.
⚈ Invite other users to sign and fill documents from any Internet-connected device.
⚈ Instantly share documents via short signing links.
⚈ Create a team so that multiple users can collaboratively manage and co-sign documents.

Save time filling out PDFs by using a convenient document editor for free:
⚈ Upload and fill out PDF, Word, PNG, PPT, or text docs online.
⚈ Edit documents on your phone before sending PDFs to sign and fill.
⚈ Add text, date, checkmarks, stamps, and e-signatures to your PDFs as annotations.
⚈ Convert JPEG to PDF, PNG to PDF, BMP to PDF, etc.

Get a form builder and a form filling app in one comprehensive solution:
⚈ Add different types of fillable fields to documents, including text fields, dropdowns, signature fields, date fields, etc.
⚈ Create complex fillable PDFs by using conditional fields, calculated fields, and attachment request fields.
⚈ Save unlimited reusable templates and send fillable document copies for signing.

Benefit from global compliance with the signNow app for Android:
⚈ Archive and store completed documents into folders for easy access and safekeeping.
⚈ Ensure your data is protected with 256-bit encryption in transit and at rest.
Use legally-binding electronic signatures fully compliant with the ESIGN Act of 2000.
⚈ Fill and sign docs offline. All your changes will automatically sync once reconnected.
⚈ Keep a document's detailed history and all actions to it with the Audit Trail feature.

More benefits of the signNow e-signature app:
⚈ Export or import documents from your email, Dropbox, Google Drive, and more.
⚈ Sign up and sign in with one click using your Google or Facebook account.
⚈ Download documents to your device, store them on your signNow account, or print them.
⚈ E-sign documents on a tablet with Kiosk Mode. Collect e-signatures at events, in waiting rooms, and at front desks; automatically generate a new file for every new signer.
⚈ Get contracts or invoices completed on time with signer notifications and reminders.

Get the signNow e-signature app free to sign documents on Android without any charges for 7 days. After the trial period, choose one of the four subscription plans starting at only $8 per month to e-sign more documents and get access to premium features.

Your feedback is important to us. Please contact us at support@signnow.com with any questions or feedback.

comments: Cant save the document after editing,it says data should not be empty,all spaces are filled,
Having unstable issues on my app,on Android phone, it just shakes after opening to do a digital sign.

It was definitely over a 4 star, but just under a full 5. So I rounded up. There are a few things I'd like to see, such as the date formatting in US form. The US is very weirded out by the format of DDMMYYYY, rather than MMDDYYYY. The other thing is that I am not getting notifications about docs being signed, which can delay payments if I'm not watching it. Not sure what the issue is but sending a query to support now. Otherwise, amazing software. I appreciate its influence on my business.

This app does not allow you to resize the signatures or initials, so it's practically useless - you can't insert them into table cells; To dev: your suggestions to tap once after inserting does not work on my new Galaxy Note 20! No menu shows up! It only allows me to move it around (if I hold down and drag)

Constant issues with not being logged in when I am, not accepting the link via email with the cryptic error message "internal api error" Not exactly creating trust into an app dealing with signatures....

title: Appointfix: Appointment scheduling app
description:
Appointfix is a free appointment scheduling app that makes life easier for beauty, fitness, and wellness professionals. The app helps you effortlessly schedule appointments and reduce no-shows using automated text reminders.

“Do you have an archaic booking system, either on a desktop or the old-fashioned pencil and paper method? Time for an upgrade.” - Salon Magazine 

Replace your paper appointment book today and let the app send appointment reminders, so your clients never miss a booking again! Appointfix is the free scheduling app for any business with a repetitive client base, like salons, barbershops, or spas.

MAKE YOUR LIFE EASIER WITH APPOINTFIX:

• FAST & EASY APPOINTMENT SCHEDULING: Check your schedule and create unlimited appointments, no matter where you are. With Appointfix, appointment scheduling is a breeze! 
• FLEXIBLE CALENDAR: Effortlessly flip through your appointment calendar with the Day, Three Day, Week, Month, and Mini Month views. Your appointment scheduler has never been more accessible! 
• REMINDERS: Reduce missed appointments and lost revenue by using text reminders. 
• ONLINE BOOKING: Let customers use online scheduling 24/7 on your free booking website and through your Facebook or Instagram page. 
• SERVICES: Define your services by setting the price and duration, or personalize them with colors. 
• CLIENTS: Easily search for clients to view their history or their upcoming appointments.
• NOTES: Delight your clients by always remembering their requests and particularities!
• LOCATION: Add an address in the appointment and start navigating to the client when it is time.
• RECURRING or GROUP APPOINTMENTS: Set up repeating appointments or add more people to an appointment in just a few taps.
• GOOGLE & APPLE CALENDAR SYNC: It’s now easy to keep track of all your personal and work appointments in one place!

ACCOMPLISH EVEN MORE WITH THE PAID PLANS
Appointfix Basic is your free scheduling app. For even greater productivity, you can upgrade to a paid plan.

APPOINTFIX PREMIUM - US$9.99/month 

Premium includes everything in Basic and:

• SYNC ACROSS TWO DEVICES: Everything in Appointfix instantly syncs on both your smartphone and tablet. 
• REPORTS: Easily see how your business is performing with simple reports on revenue, services, and clients.
• MARKETING: Send a bulk text to all your clients with an update, a special deal, or anything else you want. Or send a reminder to rebook to clients you haven’t seen in a while.
• MULTIPLE TEMPLATES FOR MESSAGES: Define and use different messages depending on the time of sending (instantly, before or after the appointment), or depending on the purpose of the message.
• MESSAGES WITHOUT OUR BRANDING: The messages that get sent out won’t include the signature “Sent via Appointfix.”
• PRIORITY SUPPORT

APPOINTFIX ULTIMATE - US$19.99/month

Ultimate includes everything in Premium and:

• FULLY AUTOMATED TEXT REMINDERS SENT VIA OUR SYSTEM: Ultimate uses a robust SMS delivery system with a nearly 100% delivery rate. As an Ultimate plan subscriber, you get 500 text messages free of charge each month.
• SYNC ACROSS UNLIMITED DEVICES: Start managing your appointment calendar on all your smartphones and tablets, no matter how many devices you use.

Appointfix is the appointment scheduler that will grow your business!

Payment Policy: 
Your Appointfix Premium or Ultimate subscription will be charged to your Google Play account, and it will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage your subscription in your Google Play account.

Terms of Use: https://www.appointfix.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.appointfix.com/privacy

developerAddress:
Thurzó Sándor 40
Oradea 410098
Romania
recentChanges: Minor bug fixes and improvements
comments: I can't use this app, it won't connect with Facebook. Facebook only allows me to choose from their list of apps, Appointfix is not one of them. There is no empty Facebook URL box available to add Appointfix in the Book buttons. I'm saddened as this seems like a much better app than all the low rated options Facebook is making me select from.

Highly recommend!!! This app is just awesome... It's very user friendly and even the online booking is very easy!! I have recommended lots of people!! Do download it you wont regret.. 🤟🏻 Just one update would really love to have in this app is while sending any message to the clients please give the option of sending it through WhatsApp and also the currency change even if I have changed to INR while booking it shows the default one $ or €.. rest all is awesome. Thanks

Have just started using this for my. Makeup bookings and am loving it. Was easy to set up, the booking system is super simple and quick.. Had 4 clients book within 2hours of releasing this online booking system to them! Thankyooouuuuu! My one recommendation/nit pick so far would be to have pictures available for the service options! Otherwise awesome.

I'm having an issue with the app not showing all the available times for clients to book an appointment. It shows half the availability for the AM times and says all booked for PM times when there's availability. I can't share the link to clients or on social media pages for booking if all the appointment times aren't being shown.

Great app. I've been searching for a simple scheduling app that also has the ability to send reminders. I love that the text reminders send from a randomly assigned number instead of my personal number (with the paid subscription). I love the ability to colour code different services, and customize the services and everything. Also the only app I've ever found that actually listed "tattoo artist" as a job option so that made me smile, haha.

title: Dragon Anywhere: Professional Grade Dictation App
description:
The most accurate professional-grade dictation service available on the market. Create templates, add custom words, and instantly dictate your documents – Dragon Anywhere will automatically adapt to how you speak. Download your one-week FREE TRIAL now! Trial converts to a monthly ($14.99) or annual ($149.99) subscription.

WHY USE DRAGON ANYWHERE
Paperwork doesn’t end when you’re away from your desk. Dragon Anywhere speech to text is the only mobile dictation app that enables continuous dictation of documents, with no length or time limits. This means, you can dictate documents of any length, edit, format, and share them directly from your mobile device to boost productivity anywhere—whether visiting clients, a job site or at your local coffee shop.

Mobile employees are often burdened with heavier documentation demands in the workplace—client intake forms, reports and more. Dragon Anywhere speech to text makes it easy to create detailed and accurate documents, fill out reports and forms, or complete other paperwork— all by voice, directly on your smartphone and tablet, and all on-the-go. And because you can also synchronize your personal customizations with Dragon Professional for the desktop, transcription work started in the field or out on the road can easily be completed back at your home or office.

DRAGON ANYWHERE FEATURES:

• Fast & accurate dictation means you can dictate immediately with 99% speech recognition accuracy right out of the gate, with no training required.

• No time or length limits for our voice to text means you can dictate as long as you want to complete documents of any length – from a business report to an entire book!

• Need to fill out forms from the road? Easily create professional form-based templates using Dragon Anywhere’s auto-texts feature and create and fill out forms, such as client in-take forms, and even navigate field to field by voice commands.

• Powerful customizations, like the ability to add words specific to your industry, means even more accurate transcription as you dictate documents. Or create simple voice commands to short-cut repetitive steps, like inserting an email signature or standard clauses into documents.

• Robust voice formatting and editing in our speech to text solution lets you select words and sentences for editing, correction, and deletion, apply common formatting like underline and bold, or voice navigate through fields of a report template.

• Need to sync your work anywhere? Simply save to popular note-taking apps like Evernote®.

• Synchronize with supported Dragon desktop speech to text solutions, so transcription work started on the road or in the field can be completed back at the desktop for seamless document workflows.

Additional Information:
• Dragon Anywhere supports the following languages: US English, Canadian English, UK English, and German
• Dragon Anywhere uses cloud-based speech recognition, and requires an internet connection to dictate.
• For any technical or subscription assistance with Dragon Anywhere speech recognition, please contact Nuance Support: https://www.nuance.com/dragon/support/dragon-anywhere-support.html

Dragon Anywhere has your privacy in mind:
• All communication with the cloud is secured with Enterprise grade encryption.
• The app does not require access to your personal information, and only requires access to the device’s microphone and storage for speech recognition

Subscription details:
• One-week free trial converts to Monthly or Yearly subscription. Monthly ($14.99) subscription; Annual ($149.99) subscription.
• Manage your subscription via Google Play Settings
• Subscriptions auto-renew at the end of term unless auto-renew is turned off 24-hours before the end of the current period

Privacy policy: https://www.nuance.com/about-us/company-policies/privacy-policies.html

Terms of Service: https://www.nuance.com/dragon/dragon-anywhere/eula.html

Improved Forget/Reset password functionality.
General improvements, including usability, stability, and security updates.

comments: 7 day trial and like others have said I can't even login. You can't reset the password through the portal. I think that's a testiment to how behind they are I would not put faith in a technology that cant even give you a basic feature for resetting your password. I have to call to reset they password to login they are closed currently. Such a basic function almost seems intentional

I wanted a solution for taking dictation in the car - one the places where any other form of note-taking is strictly prohibited. But the sound recognition seems to be utterly baffled by the background noise of the roads. I wish this app were better than it is.

Accurate. Two major issues. 1) The app stops listening after just 20 secs, making it difficult to use for anything besides consistent speech. This time limit is not adjustable. As a student hoping to use this for notes, this one flaw makes it almost useless. 2) Not integrated with any other app. Google Docs and Word have decent free transcription built in, why pay for the hassle of exporting docs in and out of a proprietary app? Something like Gboard with customizable listening time I'd pay for.

What a joke. "Free" app cannot do anything without a subscription. Nuance has always had a problem with overpriced software. They don't seem to realize that when people can't afford it they won't buy it and they're going to make less money. But they got those greedy eyes with the dollar signs, and corporate psychopathy. Not worth the cost at all with so many free options. Jerks.
Absolute garbage. Do not waste your money on this subscription. The translation is absolutely horrid... it doesn't even recognize quotation marks. I'd give 0 stars if that was even possible.

title: Artful Agenda - Plan, Sync & Organize in Style
description:
Please report all issues to hello@artfulagenda.com or through the app via "report an issue" before submitting a review.

***
Artful Agenda is free to download but requires a subscription to use. We offer a free two week trial so you can see if our app service is right for you before being charged. You will be prompted to choose a subscription plan before accessing your trial. We offer monthly and annual plans. 

***
Artful Agenda makes planning enjoyable! You will feel inspired when using this calendar because it’s customizable, stylish, and intuitive!

***
Artfully Agenda offers these important calendar features:
-View all of your calendars in one app! Syncs with major online calendar platforms, including Google, Apple and Outlook
-Monthly, weekly, and daily calendar views that are easy to navigate and beautiful to look at
-Repeat scheduling for events
-Push notifications for event reminders

***
What makes Artful Agenda special?
-Choose your own cover and handwriting.
-Check off/cross off monthly, weekly, and daily goals/tasks.
-Identify daily priority tasks
-Create a custom daily task list
-Track your water intake
-Meal plan (daily and weekly)
-Stay inspired with daily, weekly and monthly quotes
-Make planning fun with drag and drop stickers
-Keep track of important information with stylish, customizable lists

***
Artful Agenda is free to download, but you will need a subscription after your free trial expires. We offer monthly and annual plans.

***
Be sure to check out our browser-based desktop application for the complete Artful Agenda experience!

***
If you have any problems, please go to “my account” and “report a problem” before writing a review. Our goal is to fix any issues in a timely manner to make the Artful experience great for everyone! You can also email us at hello@artfulagenda.com

summary: Online functionality with the look, feel, and fun of a paper planner!
developerAddress: 4809 Nevada Ave. Nashville, TN 37209
recentChanges:
Added tablet views to match the web on larger form factors.

Also recently released:
Updated sticker sizing and positioning to be more consistent between mobile and web.
Added drag to create on the Week and Day tabs.
Added the ability to search Artful content.
Added the ability to rotate and scale stickers.

Before submitting a review, please report all issues to hello@artfulagenda.com or through the app via "Tech Support".
comments: I am a new user and I love this agenda so far. I'm big on personalizing and having been a paper agenda user for years, I love how easy it is to "spruce up" this calendar. I would find it useful to be able to see which family member each color represents, as a reference. Like a small table of contents. Especially when juggling multiple family members. Another useful feature would be the ability to print out a weekly or monthly calendar, to post in the house, for family members to easily look at.

Syncs with all my calendars. Beautiful design and ability to add my own personality with colors, covers and stickers. I would love more stickers or the ability to add them. The ability to use the stylus on my Surface tablet and Samsung Note Spen would make the whole experience complete. The developers are very receptive to ideas. Thanks!

This is the app I have been searching for! I love it! I just wish there was a way to hide or minimize the timeblock section. Or an option to just change it to a list of the events. I hardly ever have more than one timed event a day, if that, so that portion basically goes unused.

I like this calander app so far. Really like that it let's u add stickers &pick colors for whatever u write on a specific day. One thing I saw on another calander app that I wish this one did was, if I put someone's bday on a certain day then I could 'check it' as something that happens every year on that date &the app would fill the calander out for u, whatever you typed for that day for years and years or however long u keep the app. Hope that all made since. Cute app all together tho.

I was a paper planner person for years, this is the first digital planner that eve comes close, I love it. My only suggestion is maybe a notes section each day, maybe down by the priority list area? For someone with auto-immune it'd be nice to have a place each day that I could journal and keep track of symptoms with out it being in a list/checkmark format?

title: IFTTT
description:
Connect your favorite apps, services, and devices to create new, seamless experiences. 


Over 630 apps work with IFTTT including Twitter, Telegram, Google Drive, Twitch, Weather Underground, Dropbox, Slack, and devices like Google Home, Amazon Alexa, iRobot, LIFX, Philips Hue, and your Android.


Turn on connections and:

• Control everything around you with your voice and Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant
• Stay informed about what’s happening from publications like The New York Times and ProPublica
• Always stay prepared for the weather with custom daily forecast notifications
• Message roommates when you’re near the local grocery
• Get an alert as soon as there’s a new Craigslist listing that matches you search
• Stay safe with automated and intelligent home security alerts
• Streamline your social media
• Back up and share your Android photos automatically
• Back up important files, photos, and contacts to cloud-storage solutions, such as Dropbox or Google Drive
• Set your home thermostat to an optimal temperature when you arrive home
• Post all your Instagrams as Twitter photos or Pinterest pins
• Trigger events based on your current location 



There are thousands of use cases! New services are added every week. Some popular ones include:

Sonos, YouTube, Google Calendar, Tumblr, Medium, Pocket, Square, eBay, Giphy, Automatic, Honeywell, Fitbit, Withings, littleBits, Google WiFi, Evernote, Reddit, Digg, Slack, LINE, MailChimp, Salesforce, Todoist, and hundreds more. 


Discover connections for:

• The home, office, and car
• Staying informed on news and politics
• Your Android devices
• Exploring outer space
• Improving how you use social media


Learn more at https://ifttt.com
Get help https://help.ifttt.com
Build on the IFTTT Platform https://platform.ifttt.com

• Back up important files, photos, and contacts to cloud-storage solutions, such as Dropbox or Google Drive
• Set your home thermostat to an optimal temperature when you arrive home
• Post all your Instagrams as Twitter photos or Pinterest pins
• Trigger events based on your current location



There are thousands of use cases! New services are added every week. Some popular ones include:

Sonos, YouTube, Google Calendar, Tumblr, Medium, Pocket, Square, eBay, Giphy, Automatic, Honeywell, Fitbit, Withings, littleBits, Google WiFi, Evernote, Reddit, Digg, Slack, LINE, MailChimp, Salesforce, Todoist, and hundreds more.


Discover connections for:

• The home, office, and car
• Staying informed on news and politics
• Your Android devices
• Exploring outer space
• Improving how you use social media


Learn more at https://ifttt.com
Get help https://help.ifttt.com
Build on the IFTTT Platform https://platform.ifttt.com
summary: Every thing works better together
developerAddress:
2436 Jones Street
San Francisco, CA 94133
recentChanges:
+ We translated the IFTTT app into 6 languages, including French, German, Japanese, Portuguese, Spanish, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese.
+ Check out new services from B9, #epicjobs, ComEd, and more!
comments: I'm currently trialling 7 day free IFTTT Pro on my Galaxy Android phone. I used IFTTT heavily previously and haven't been using it much in recent times. It used to be a very reliable tool. With the current paid version, it doesn't even run most of the times in spite of providing required permissions. For instance, I have an applet which reads notification and sends out a message. I have been testing it and the applet runs only when I manually hit the 'Check Now' button and never gets triggered automatically. For a tool with $6 a month charge, it a totally a let down performance. Looks like I might not go ahead with the subscription at this point .

It executes the commands whenever it wants . Unacceptable the fact that they even ask for a premium version when their free already suck . Hopefully the next update will fix this . Their WiZ command "when I get home turn lights on" doesn't turn the lights on even when I am 9n the same room . Absolutely ridiculous. My device is Xiaomi Redmi note 8 . Running WiZ app with google assistant , and IFFT. PLS FIX

Used to be great but after adding a paywall it's kinda dumb now (feedback has been submitted on Twitter but I doubt they'll do anything with it anyways). Also, you say it's optional to go pro but it's really not to people who had many custom applets already created, and are going to archive all but 3 in the near future.

Most of these criticisms apply to their website as well, so take that as you will. Charging people for functionality that other apps offer for free is stupid (Tasker anyone?). 99% of Twitter functionality doesn't work, which also is stupid. People are paying you guys their hard earned money and you can't even stay up to date with the latest api changes? Doesn't make sense. Error messages are vague and don't offer any idea as to what is actually wrong. "There is a problem with the applet" IS NOT HELPFUL... On a brighter side, the ones that do work work well, and the UI is intuitive and well designed. 3 stars.
This subscription annual cost is out of touch with reality. Used this app long time ago, came back to use it again and now there is a large pay wall. Not worth it.

title: Line2 - Second Phone Number
description:
Line2 is your complete business phone system for your Android device. Give your customers a professional call experience no matter where you are and keep your personal and business lines separate.

Multiple phone numbers: Add multiple virtual business phone numbers to your device and receive or make calls from anywhere.

Local and toll-free numbers: Go local with your business with localized numbers or give your customers toll-free numbers to call. You can also port your existing phone number to Line2.

Unlimited call and text: Get unlimited Voice over IP calls and texting across the United States and Canada. Also, get free calls and messaging between other Line2 users. 

Auto-attendant: Guide your customers to right call queues like sales and support using the auto-attendant feature, along with on-hold music and pre-recorded call greetings. 

No cellular data needed: Make and receive calls or texts using VoIP technology. No need for expensive cellular plans or hardware. 

Call features: Screen and block unwanted calls with call screening and call blocking. 

Designed for mobile business professionals, freelancers, and entrepreneurs, Line2 lets you keep your business and personal communications separate and eliminates the need to purchase and carry a second mobile phone.

More powerful features:

• Use your Line2 number across your smartphone, computers, and tablets.
• Share media with MMS and group messages with anyone in the U.S. and Canada.
• Quick and easy setup with no additional hardware required.

Questions or comments? We’re here to help, 7 days a week at http://help.line2.com or tap Settings -> Help from within the app.

Note: Your cellular provider may prohibit or restrict VoIP (Voice over Internet Protocol) on their network. It’s your responsibility to check with your cellular provider about their VoIP functionality, and any additional charges it may incur.

summary: Second business phone number with unlimited call & text to the US and Canada.
developerAddress: 535 Mission St. Suite 1926, San Francisco, CA 94105
recentChanges: Thanks for using the Line2 app! In this version, we've made some general bug fixes and performance improvements based on our customer feedback.
comments: The app is horrible, mute sound on your phone without permission! Same problem even after update, when I connect to my car via Bluetooth the app make your phone silent to all notifications!

It's really handy to have a 2nd number, for the most part it functions well. On Android 11 the aggressive optimizer will prevent you getting your calls/messages, go into settings for battery & unoptimize, it will function better then. 1 thing I hope developers will remedy, after an app update, you're logged out UPDATE If you're experiencing issues, email the developer and tap the help tab in the app, I'm currently working with support team and running a beta version which works better 07/20/21
Since update won't open. Crashes constantly

This app is awful. Scrolling through a text message causes it to crash, each and every time. I've been a Line 2 user for several years, never had a problem until the most recent update last February. Now it's almost unusable. Cleared data, cleared cache, uninstalled, reinstalled, still the same result. Crash. The Line2 dev guys need to fix this thing and provide an update.

It works but there is an annoying bug. Every time after a phone call, it tends to mess with my music/video audio. For example, after the phone call, all of the audio plays from my phone speaker that is only used for phone calls. Same with my car audio, it thinks I am in a phone call. The only way to fix it is by closing the app from my multi-task viewer. Hope you can fix it soon because it is annoying.

title: Squid - Take Notes & Markup PDFs
description:
New: We partnered with Google to bring incredibly fast, low-latency ink to Squid on the Google Pixelbook and Samsung Chromebook Plus (with Chrome 62). See the difference: https://youtu.be/Oc66T_e7xwU

Take handwritten notes naturally on your Android tablet, phone, or Chromebook supporting Android apps! With Squid you can write just like you would on paper using an active pen, passive stylus, or your finger.

Easily markup PDFs to fill out forms, edit/grade papers, or sign documents. Import images, draw shapes, and add typed text to your notes. Quickly select, copy/paste, and move content between pages and notes. Organize your notes within notebooks and increase your productivity!

Turn your device into a virtual whiteboard or give presentations in a class, meeting, or conference by wirelessly casting to a TV/projector (e.g. using Miracast, Chromecast). Export notes as PDFs or images, then share them with others or store them in the cloud!

Squid is vector based - keeping your notes beautiful at any zoom level and on any device. You can erase entire letters and words quickly with the stroke eraser tool, or just parts of words with the true eraser tool. The selection tool allows you to change the color and thickness of your handwriting and even resize a drawing whenever you want without any loss in quality.

Squid takes special advantage of active pens on capable devices to provide natural, pressure sensitive handwriting. Just write with the pen and erase with your finger!

Squid is designed to be both powerful and simple to use, allowing you to take notes quickly and efficiently.

Awards/Recognition
• Featured App in Google Play
• Category Honorable Mention for Productivity in the Samsung Galaxy Note S Pen App Challenge: https://goo.gl/Ji9dCS
• Popular Choice Award in the Dual Screen App Challenge: https://goo.gl/J7uT0B

Key Features
• Take notes naturally with a pen and erase with your finger on active pen enabled devices (e.g. Galaxy Note devices with S Pen)
• Take notes with your finger or passive stylus on non-active pen devices (e.g. Nexus 7)
• Vector graphics engine
• Multiple paper types (e.g. blank, ruled, graph) and sizes (e.g. infinite, letter, A4)
• Undo/redo, select, move, and resize
• Change the color and weight of selected items
• Cut, copy, and paste items between notes
• Two finger scroll and pinch-to-zoom
• Two finger double tap to quickly jump to a specific zoom level
• Organize notes within notebooks
• Sort notes and notebooks
• Import, crop, and resize images
• Export notes to PDF, PNG, or JPEG for printing, archiving, or sharing
• Share notes with friends and colleagues via email, Evernote, etc.
• Multi-Window support
• Shortcuts to create a new note or open a notebook
• Present notes on a secondary display via HDMI, Chromecast, etc. (Android 4.2+)

Squid Premium
• Create notes and pages with premium backgrounds (math, engineering, music, sports, etc.)
• Import PDFs and mark them up like any other note
• Express yourself with additional tools (highlighter, “true” eraser, shapes, text)
• Backup/restore and bulk export notes as PDFs to cloud storage providers Dropbox and Box

Learn more about Squid Premium: https://goo.gl/mJFjeO

G Suite for Education customers can purchase Squid Premium in bulk using the Squid EDU Bulk License app (https://goo.gl/Kkxjtk).

Information about active pen devices: https://goo.gl/6BRJy

Explanation of required permissions: https://goo.gl/q5f8Y

If you encounter any bugs, please email us at help+android@squidnotes.com with a description of the bug!

We would love to hear any feedback or feature requests you have at http://feedback.squidnotes.com.

Interested in beta testing? Join our public beta directly through Google Play!

recentChanges:
v3.9.0
• Added ability to move notes to Trash before permanently deleting
• Fixed several PDF import, rendering, export, and crash issues

comments: Works fantastic with Samsung Tablet SM-P550 and S Pen. Does not work well with Lenovo USI pen and Lenovo Chromebook Duet. USI pens supposed to have like 4096 levels of pressure sensitivity. Problem faced by most people with Lenovo USI pen & Chromebook duet is, even before pen tip touches the screen, it already leaves "ink-marks" on the screen. Writing & drawing is impossible. Not sure where is the problem, Lenovo's USI pen or application not able to handle such high pressure sensitivity.

The one feature I want it for, drawing on PDF's, is a premium option that you can't test out to make sure it actually works. I've tried 3 other apps and none of them worked so why would I spend money on this if I don't KNOW that it worked.

Squid is a great app for writing notes and writing on PDFs. However, that's all the app does well, and even that will cost you. There is no organization of notes whatsoever. No search bar, no tags, no folders.

I loved the app after I made a purchase for the parts I needed, now I find out that the payment I thought was once off was only for a month's use of the functionality to write on PDF's. When making this purchase there is no indication that this purchase is for a limited time only. Can't believe I paid like $7 to write on PDF for only a month!

Great app for taking notes, but the imported images are blurry, super low res. If you try to crop them in-app, for some reason the image goes back to being high quality, but in the note itself the image is super bad. You can't read text within images because the text shows up as low res nonsense.

title: TickTick: ToDo List Planner, Reminder & Calendar
description:
🥇Great to-do list app for new Android device - The Verge
🥇The best to-do app for Android - MakeUseOf
🥇The best to-do list app for 2020 - Wirecutter (A New York Times Company)
🙌MKBHD's favorite productivity tool

TickTick is a simple and effective to-do list and task manager app which helps you make schedule, manage time, stay focused, remind about deadlines and organize life at home, work and everywhere else.🗓 🔔 ✔

TickTick helps you make the most of your day and get things done (GTD). Whether there is an idea you want to capture, personal goals to achieve, work to accomplish, habits to track, projects to collaborate with colleagues, or even a shopping list to share with family (with the help of a list maker). Achieve your goals with our productivity planner.

💡Easy to use
TickTick is easy to get started with its intuitive design and personalized features. Add tasks and reminders in mere seconds, and then focus on things that really matter.

☁️Sync across Web, Android, iOS, Mac & PC
You can view and manage them wherever you are to achieve your goals more efficiently.

🎙️Create tasks and notes faster
Add them by typing or voice input. With Smart Date Parsing, the date info you enter will be automatically set as due date for task reminder with alarm. Stay as productive as you can with this time manager and to-do checklist!

⏰Instant task to-do list reminder
Instead of keeping all things in mind, put them into TickTick. It will remember everything for you and provide instant task to-do list reminder, for you to gtd. Set multiple notifications for important tasks and notes to never miss any deadline!

📆 Sleek calendar
Get a clear overview of your schedule, weeks or months ahead in to-do calendar - Day Planner for free. Third-party calendars can also be integrated, such as Google calendar, Outlook, etc.

📱Handy Widget
Get easy access to your tasks and notes by adding a checklist widget to your home screen. There are various types of widgets - pick the one you like most.

🔁Flexible recurring tasks
Set tasks to repeat for those that need to be done regularly. Choose a repeating period (daily, weekly, weekdays, or monthly etc.). You can customize the recurrence, such as “every 2 weeks from Monday to Thursday”,  or “project meeting every 2 months on the first Monday”.

👥Seamless collaboration
Share lists, assign goals to collaborate with family, friends or colleagues. Spend fewer hours in meetings, phone calls or emails. Improve efficiency in a collaborative environment.

🍅Built-in Pomo Timer
The Pomodoro Timer can help log your distractions and stay more focused while at work. Try playing a white noise, it helps!

🎯Habit Tracker
Enable Habit in the Tab Bar and start building some good habits - meditation, exercise, or reading etc. Setting a goal to help track your habits and life in a more precise and scientific way. 


How TickTick makes you more productive?
- Keep it all organized and know what to do next in to-do list
- Classify your tasks and to-dos with list maker, folders and tags
- Make checklists and notes
- Improve your concentration skill with built-in Timer & Stopwatch
- Sort goals by date, priority, and title
- Attach photos, records and other attachments
- Build good habits with goals to live a healthier and more energetic life

What to enjoy more at TickTick Premium?
- Choose from a variety of beautiful themes
- View business calendar in grid format (better than in other time management apps)
- Take ultimate control of 299 lists, 999 tasks per list, and 199 subtasks per task
- Add up to 5 reminders to each task
- Share a task list planner with up to 29 members
- Use the checklist format and type a description in the same task
- Subscribe to third-party calendars and day planners in TickTick


Learn more about at: ticktick.com

Connect with us at
Twitter: @TickTickTeam 
Facebook & Instagram: @TickTickApp 
Reddit: r/ticktick

Newark
Delaware
US
recentChanges:
- Optimization for task option menu.

comments: Impressive! It's feature-rich and complex in a good way! It has a way to do everything I've wanted to do with it so far. And the restrictions for free users are VERY reasonable. I'll probably upgrade to the paid version soon, as it has already made many aspects of my life easier and I've only been using it for a week or so. Very highly recommend.

It's a nice app as far as the features are concerned but I'm finding it difficult to navigate and manage habits (despite the brand new update). I'm trying to delete a habit with no success and I don't feel the app has a sleek, clean or attractive look to it. Instead it feels cumbersome and not easy to manage. I'm also having problems adding tasks; the plus mark (+) doesn't always work when I click on it.

Simply the best reminder app I have ever used. I plan my life using this app. I lose track of time quickly and hours can go by without realizing. I use the desktop app, which pops up a notification on both laptop and phone, and I'm always on my laptop for work. I have repeating dailies that pop up at specific times to tell me when to eat lunch, take my meds, take a short break, go for my daily walk, etc. I cannot express how helpful this app is. I wish I'd found it sooner and I wish I could give it more stars. Thank you for creating it and please don't ever stop developing it.

If you're looking for a focus timer as well as place that arranges all your tasks, TickTick is just the one app you need. Earlier, I had separate apps for timers and to-do lists, but TickTick offers the best of both to you! It's the perfect app for students! Check it out!

Every morning, I start my day with TickTick. I review my work schedule (changes a lot), my habits (work out, learn guitar), my recurring tasks (clean, cook, laundry) and my big projects (home repair, moving, job search). Some people don't need an app for this stuff as they effortlessly traipse through life. But I struggle with information overload and feeling overwhelmed and forgetting stuff.  At least, I used to... But TickTick Premium has helped me enormously.  The app changed my life!

title: Easy Notes - Notepad, Notebook, Free Notes App

📒 Free notepad and notebook for note taking

📥 Automatically save notes when writing notes

 Category Notes in Different Tabs

 Automatically Save Notes
Automatically save notes when writing notes. Don't miss your thoughts and writings at any moment. 

 Reminder for Notebook
Easy Notes - Notepad, Notebook, Free Notes App allows you to easily set reminders for simple notepad notes. Schedule your time and don't miss important notes.

If this free note-taking app is helpful for you, please share the note-taking app with your friends.
If any issues, Please mail us via gulooloo2020@gmail.com
