comments: Haven't had much time to evaluate this app, but 1) The UI is impressive, 2) As is the support for importing photos, and 3) The list of features. However, the latter does NOT belong under the heading 'What's New'! I'm sure I'm not the only one who actually reads the 'What's New' section, which other Devs manage to use to communicate with (potential) users re new/enhanced features, issue/stability fixes, etc.

I really like the concept and idea behind this app. The one thing I don't like is the stop of my audio when I open the app while listening to music. This may because of the ads 😅. I do not mind the banner ads since they don't interfere with my doing but I don't like the pop ups. For better earning I think it's better to make an ad to unlock a certain feature. Like I want to make use a VIP template. Maybe I can unlock by watching an ad. If I want to use the template again I gotta unlock again.

I like this app better than the regular one, but this app you have to pay for items. It's not free as advertised. There are many things you can due for free, but most of everything else comes with a subscription. Which is $29.99 for life!! Not bad right??? Well everything I want to use like auto save, auto back up, and many other similar things all have to be done on a subscription. Which at this very moment today I can't pay for. Not today anyways. It does have some nice features!!

It's an ok app, although most of the features are only available for VIP members, & there are more ads than I'd prefer. Overall it's not horrible, but you might be able to find better, simpler note-apps out there ☺️

This app is the worst.. I created notes on it , it had pictures also. I worked so hard when it was created finally, I tried to share the assignment with teacher, but guess what ... It said you can only share text, or picture or snapshot ... It said to upgrade to premium to make the pdf My whole hardwork was wasted.. I wish this app gets downvotes..

title: AnyList: Grocery Shopping List & Recipe Organizer
description:
AnyList is the best way to create grocery shopping lists and collect and organize your recipes. Easily share a list with your spouse or roommates, for free. Changes show up instantly on everyone’s device. 

“AnyList makes shared grocery lists simple and intuitive.” —Lifehacker

“AnyList sets the standard for grocery shopping list apps.” —AppStorm

“I don’t recommend going to the grocery store without it.” —Today’s iPhone

==== FEATURES ==== 

== LISTS ==

• Quickly add and cross off items. Autocomplete suggests common items as you type.
• Add notes to list items to indicate package size, brand, coupons, etc.
• Create multiple lists to organize items by store or occasion.
• Grocery items are automatically separated into categories.
• Create your own custom categories.
• Reorder categories to match the layout of your local store.
• Save items as favorites, then browse your favorites and add them to your current shopping list.
• View recent items from your past shopping trips, then add them back to your current list.
• Easily share lists. Just enter the email address of your spouse or roommate and your list is shared. List changes instantly show up on everyone’s device.
• Lists can be shared with as many people as you’d like.
• Everyone creates their own AnyList account, so you can share some lists, while keeping others private.
• Optional push notifications let you know when a shared list has been modified.
• Sort list items alphabetically or manually.


== RECIPES ==

• Enter your own recipes, or copy and paste them from an email or other source.
• Add ingredients from your recipes to your shopping lists with a single tap.
• Organize recipes into collections by type or occasion. Each recipe can appear in multiple collections.
• Search your recipes by name or ingredients.
• Share your recipe collection with a trusted partner. Any changes to recipes will be instantly visible to both of you.


== SYNC / BACKUP ==

• Sync all of your lists and recipes across all of your devices. Sign in to your AnyList account on your devices, and any change made on one will instantly sync to the other.
• All of your lists and recipes are securely backed up in the cloud as part of your AnyList account. If you get a new device, just sign in to your AnyList account to retrieve your data.


== ANYLIST COMPLETE (PREMIUM FEATURES) ==

All of the features above are available for free. We also offer an optional in-app purchase called AnyList Complete that unlocks the full power of the app with these great features:

• AnyList for the Web: Use AnyList on any Mac or PC with a modern web browser.
• Recipe Web Import. Search for recipes on the web, and import them directly into AnyList. Works with popular recipe websites and blogs.
• Meal Planning Calendar. Plan your meals with month and list views. Easily add some or all of the ingredients for upcoming recipes to your shopping list.
• List Item Photos. Add a photo to list items. For shared lists, photos can be viewed by everyone sharing the list.
• Recipe Photos. Add a photo to your recipes, instead of being limited to icons.
• List Passcode Lock. Protect your lists from casual snooping with a passcode lock.


==== CONTACT US ====  

We’d love to hear from you: team@anylist.com

AnyList includes icons from icons8.com.

AnyList v1.8.3 fixes some minor bugs.

comments: This app makes it easy to manage and share lists. I frequently use it for my weekly shopping, but also for deciding what movies to watch with the kids, and tasks/chores needed in the house. Sharing the list makes it easy to manage shopping (or chores) across multiple people. Highly recommended. The one con is the premium version is only offered as a subscription. I would be far more comfortable simply buying a lifetime license.

I bought the premium version so that I could share the list with my whole family. The convenience of us all having the list & being able to add things & take things off when purchased is great. My only complaint is that even though I bought the premium version, I'm still the only person out of the 5 of us who can add pictures to go with items on the list. That's not time saving or convenient for me. I'm still having to flip back to a pic that one of my teens texted me & the list until I add it.

This app is brilliant, and my boyfriend and I are always trying to talk other couples or roommates into getting it. It's easy to use, it's fun to add things while someone else is shopping because you can see by what items are crossed off, what sections of the store they haven't been to yet. We have premium and enjoy the recipe importation, even though it's slightly finnicky. Being able to put a photo of the item on the list is a bonus, too!

This app has really helped my menu planning and grocery shopping become a fun factor in my day. What makes it really fun is sharing with my sister-in-law (we both subscribe) and reading her comments on recipes and seeing what is on her grocery list and other shard lists. This app has a lot of great features the best of which is being able to filter grocery lists in multiple stores and categorizing and arranging them by location to each store. And much more.

I installed this app and paid for the family premium after seeing that when I add grocery items, it automatically categories and categories, when I tried to create a different list, that didn't happen. I think they do it simply to trick us to upgrade but after you've upgraded then you realize there's nothing more explore. I feel scammed.

title: Polaris Office - Free Docs, Sheets, Slides + PDF
description:
Already 100 Million Users Across The World, Get the Latest Android Office App For Free.
Experience New All-in-One Complete Office Suite compatible with MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Adobe PDF. "Editors' Choice", "2015 Best App", and "Top Developer"awarded by Google Play.

 ■ Features ■ 
• Supported File Formats : DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX, TXT, HWP, ODT and PDF.
(NEW) Now we support CSV format.
• Supporting 18 global languages including English, French, Arabic, Japanese, Russian, German, Italian, Spanish, etc
• Polaris Drive is a default cloud but also available other cloud service such as Google Drive, Dropbox, Box, OneDrive.
• Polaris Office now only supports KitKat 4.4 and above.

Compact - Only 60 MB Size. Just one application enough for all different type of documents.
• You can open, edit and save all type of office files such as word, excel and powerpoint by one android office app installed.

Compatible - Fully Compatible with Microsoft Office, PDF Reader & Converter.
• Open all file formats such as Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, Spreadsheet, Microsoft PowerPoint, Slide, and Google Docs.
• View PDFs right from your Android phone and save as PDF files from other type of documents.

Creative - Improve your skill, enhance your creativity with handwriting input.
• Draw and edit your idea with your own hands. Let you write on screen as though you were writing on actual paper.
• Directly, take pictures from camera to documents or insert video clips from your Android phone.

Connect - Quick and Easy Access for Anytime, Anywhere and Any device.
• Across all devices like Desktop, Tablet and Android phone, Keep your all documents always up-to-date in sync via Polaris Drive or other cloud service.

Collaborate - Writing notes directly with your hands then sharing your idea easily.
• Just simply sharing the link of documents with our cloud storage via SMS, email, Facebook and other channels.
• Leave your comments right away even PDF files and invite your colleagues to in-app communication to discuss revision before printing it out.

 [Payment plan and auto-subscription] 
• Polaris Office is free all-in-one office suite but some features can be limited by your cloud usage or your subscription option. Generally, you can use more features with reasonable price, please check details on polarisoffice.com/pricing
• You can upgrade to the Smart Plan ($3.99/month & $39.99/year) or the Pro Plan ($5.99/month & $59.99/year) to take the advantage of even more premium functions. (The price is based on US dollar. The actual price may differ depending on currency of each countries.)
• You can remove advertisement by purchasing Remove Ad for $4.99.
• Recurring payments and plan subscriptions are automatically processed. Your subscription will automatically renew.
• If you would like to stop your subscription, please cancel your subscription any time within 24 hours before the next renewal date. Subscription cancellation is available within the Google Play Store app details page or Google Wallet. (Reference: support.google.com/payments/answer/6220303?hl=en)

[Information about permission]
1) Necessary Permission to Access
•  WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : This permission is required to edit saved documents in Android SD card or move documents from other storage to SD card.
• READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : This permission is required to read saved documents in Android SD card.
2) Selective Permission to Access
• GET_ACCOUNTS : If you would like to connect to Google Drive, this permission is required to use your current account.

 [Note] 
• Official Site : Polarisoffice.com
• Support : [Application] - [Settings] - [Customer Support] or [Official Site] – [Support]
• Privacy & Terms : www.polarisoffice.com/privacy

recentChanges:
In this 9.0.19 version,
- Improved document's printing resolution.
- Improved that screen of Sheet can be reduced to 10%.
- Fixed error that not calculated days and weeks in Today Function
- Fixed the errors and improved the usability based on the users’ feedback.

Polaris Office consider customers' feedback to be important!
Please give us your feedback to provide better service to you.
comments: Had a very great experience with Polaris Office for many years. But recent updates are full of bugs. Pathetic. My documents could not be saved. Each time I tried to save the app would crash. Finally to get rid of the problem I uninstalled the app and in the process lost all my precious files. In my newer device which serves as a secondary device I also faced similarly strange issues. In this case, could not press enter or space, it mashed together words and deleted blocks of texts.
It was fairly good when I first got it, but now it's glitching a lot with the text when I try to write; it randomly will mash words in the middle of other words. Also... A subscription? Really?

I would have given it 5 stars before the latest update but now parts of the program don't seem to work. Like being able to change the line spacing on documents, every time I try to it shuts down without saving anything so I have to then start over. Also when I'm typing the words they will all of a sudden cut off other words so I have to end up undoing stuff which can seriously sucks as well. If they could work on that for the next update I'll see about updating the number of stars.
This app is good in UI. But it is pathetic when I am trying to use it. It is taking unusual delay/time (and often crushed) when I try to launch it. Please look into this matter.

Extremely disappointed in the recent forced shift to All Access permissions requirement. Now several years of files are lost, unable to be viewed without allowing this app to access, change, and delete any and all files with NO notice on my devices. I know the standard response from the developers is mostly a polite "too bad, that's just how it is now due to Android OS 11", but this is terrible. Added to the frustratingly glitchy text input on bluetooth keyboards, I will be looking elsewhere.

title: 🔥SMS Backup, Print & Restore -Export PDF,HTML,CSV
description:
Backup, Convert, Exports your SMS/MMS text messages to PDF,  CSV, JPG, HTML or TXT and then restore them back to your device, print, or share them

A MUST HAVE FOR EVERY SMARTPHONE!!!

Previously called "SMS Share 2"

With  "SMS Backup, Print & Restore" you can create backups of your SMS, MMS, and RCS logs and then share it using Email, Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, and every other sharing method your phone provides. then you can use the files for storing in your pc or backup to the cloud. later you can use these files to restore your messages or print them

So, What can you do with "SMS Backup, Print & Restore":
✉️ Backup & Restore your messages - just send your messages to your email or leave the files on your device - you can restore all the messages on the same device if they desire or on another device 
✉️ Print your SMS and MMS Backups! - Print directly from your phone or share the backup to your email, open on the desktop, and print.


Special Features:
⭐ Backup and restores both text and multimedia messages
⭐ Supports RCS and "Advanced Messaging" (Not on all devices)
⭐ Supports Emojis.
⭐ Previews PDF and TXT files
⭐ Supports contacts sharing - vCard, xCard, jCard, and hCard
⭐ Supports calendar events sharing - vCal (Events, Todos, Journal)

Pro Version
"SMS Backup & Restore", even though it performs a simple task, is a major project to develop and maintain. Because there are so many devices and so many different apps for texting, it requires constant attention, development, and improvements. in order to keep it moving, there is a symbolic fee for unlocking all the features.  
The free version allows you to share 6 messages each time and includes ads. It is a bit more complex but it actually allows the full functionality, especially for shorter conversions. If you upgrade to pro, you can send all the messages in one go. 

Personal note:
I'm very grateful to know that the app is serving many of you in important cases like getting justice or saving important messages of your families. I do the best I can to remember this and improve the app as much as I can with the intention to help in needed times and not just to treat it as a business. If you are in urgent need of the app, yet can not afford it at the moment, please contact me.

Converting And Exporting SMS - Formats:
"SMS Backup, Print & Restore" will convert your SMS text messages to PDF, CSV, HTML, or JPG formats, export the conversations to files, and save them to your device storage. 
It will use these files as attachments and share them via different sharing apps. the files are all restorable, meaning you can retrieve your texting data back to the device.

PDF File:
The best option for printing SMS text messages and media (MMS/RCS messages). 
Can be opened by Adobe Reader.
"SMS Backup, Restore & Print" will create beautifully designed PDF files with graphics and text.
It supports SMS text messages, as well as MMS multimedia messages (photos and links) 

HTML File:
A compact file - can be open via the web browser. Good for backup or for printing long conversations or in case the PDF option does not work properly.

CSV File:
Best for data manipulations and analysis.
Opens with Excel or Google Sheets. 
Converts your SMS conversations to well-organized datasheets.

Image Files:
Best for sharing your SMS/MMS conversations with friends (like Facebook, WhatsApp, twitter ens').
Supports .jpg .png and .webp photo file formats
It supports SMS text messages, as well as MMS/RCS multimedia messages

Fully customizable:
Allows you to tweak, color, and customize the conversations so you get the exact results you were looking for.


The "SMS Backup & Restore" app has a slick UI, integrated with animations, which makes the app easy and simple to use.

Hope you enjoy and find the app useful :)

recentChanges: The app is even faster and smoother. It will work well in both short and long conversations. If you encounter an issue, please contact the support
comments: Great backup and restoration app. With the increasing use of text messages in the business world these days and considering legal and billing purposes, it would be foolish to not have a messaging backup app. The paid version offers a variety of features which is more than fair for its price.

Glad that I bought this app! I always have the trouble of losing my text messages whenever I format my phone, and now with the help of this app, I'll always have a copy of messages to restore in the future. Definitely did not mind taking the leap to get the premium version.

Effortless and secure way to backup your text messages. You set it up once and its smooth sailing after that. I only backup important messages so there are yet quite a few features that I haven't tried, but I can say without a doubt that this app always delivers good results!

This app works so well and I have never had any complaints about it. The ads in the free version aren't intrusive and once you go premium you will much more features as well, you can select a specific text conversation and email it as a PDF or a CSV file. Works great!

If you are looking to get an app to perfectly backup your messages, you can go for this one without a doubt. After trying several other apps which partially work and start lagging with big conversation threads and multimedia messages, this is by far the best one and is true to what it says it can do!

comments: I am extremely satisfied with the speed and latency of most of the VPN servers in the Unlimited network. Connections are reliable and perform well under load. I ended up purchasing a Lifetime subscription and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this VPN for anyone wanting a high quality application. Very happy customer.

It's the Best VPN service that I have ever used, it fast ⏩, accurate and reliable... But sometimes it doesn't connect to the location you wanted. rather it shows you that it has connected but didn't actually connect... But still the must reliable VPN connection 😅😁😁😁

I just downloaded and set it up in less that two minutes. So far, it has THE BEST available connections AND speed I've experienced with a VPN, by far!! I do not have any income right now (Covid related) but I am already trying to figure out a way to purchase. It's THAT GOOD!! ☮️💪🏻💜

Occasionally gets blocked by streaming services but they usually fix it quickly and you can just pop into another server when that one doesn't work. Definitely worth getting the lifetime subscription. I have very rarely run into speed issues.

Very fast and stable VPN. I tried a few VPN applications on my Android TV Box and they often crashed or worked too slow. This one worked fine and continually. Customer support / service was also exeptional- very quick and coprehensive feedback and advice. Highly recommended

title: Elgato Stream Deck Mobile
description:
Works with What You Love
Stream Deck Mobile seamlessly integrates your favorite tools and platforms. Customize buttons as you wish. Instantly trigger actions with a tap. And get visual-haptic feedback to confirm your every command.
 
Works with What You Have
Go live, activate scenes, put your social media channels to work, and much more – all via the one device that’s already at your side. As long as your computer and phone are on the same network, you’re one tap away from controlling your entire setup.
 
Keeps a Low Profile 
Creative broadcasters rejoice. Whether you’re in the studio, kitchen or workshop, Stream Deck Mobile blends discreetly into your workspace. So you can switch cameras, adjust audio, engage lighting and launch media – employ all the tools of professional live production – while staying true to form.
 
Streamlines Your Workflow
Hotkey actions make remembering keyboard shortcuts an issue of the past. Launch apps and websites, open folders, trigger pre-composed texts – control anything you want – without a second guess.
 
Unleashes Your Creativity
Employ Stream Deck Mobile to enhance your onscreen antics with GIFs, images, videos, and soundbites. While you're at it, apply lower thirds and bookend your content with signature intro and outro graphics. Your options are endless, so explore and experiment.
 
Never Stops Evolving
Thanks to the Stream Deck SDK, new integrations just keep coming. Stream Deck just keeps getting better. And with everyone in on the action, anything is possible. 
 
Installs Effortlessly
Select your phone from the Devices list in the desktop Stream Deck app. Scan the QR code with Stream Deck Mobile, and you’re all set.
 
Instantly Yours
Accessing the legendary power of Stream Deck has never been easier. Go on.

Stream Deck Mobile is available monthly for $2.99 or 12 months for $25. Payment will be charged to your Google Play account after the free trial period. Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings after purchase.

Privacy Policy: https://www.elgato.com/data-protection
Terms of Use: https://www.elgato.com/terms-use-privacy-statement

summary: Evolve Your Content
developerAddress: 47100 Bayside Pkwy, Fremont, CA 94538
recentChanges: - Bug fixes
comments: Buyers regret. It does work technically, but won't stay connected if the phone switches to any other app. So every time someone calls, texts, or if another app sends an update, it will require that the phone rescan the QR code from the Elgato software on the PC. That doesn't sound like it would be a bad thing, but if you have a busy cell phone like I do, this amounts to take a minute to reset it about 10 times every hour. Who needs that kind of aggravation? It's so sad: this could have been such a home run for Elgato. I'm such a Stream Deck fanboy, I really thought this would have been as stellar as the rest of Elgato's A+ products. Instead I got unserviceable software that is way too impractical to use. I'm out the price of a yearly subscription that I can't use. Sorry Elgato: you need to fix this before you try to sell a subscription based service.

SCREEN BURN WARNING!!!! I noticed it once before but by restarting my phone (Note 10) it seemed to have disappeared, but after tonight's stream (usually go for 2-2.5 hours), there's a faint burn that I'm hoping might dissipate with some time; however, I'm canceling my subscription. Like many others, I've also experienced a lot of connection issues and having to add a new device several times. Great idea, and I've liked it while it has worked, but this is going to ruin a lot of phones!!!!

Be aware, my subscription is cancelled on the app store but the payments are still being taken out every month. When I try and access the app it want me to apply a new subscription yearly or monthly and my existing one doesn't exist. Can't cancel my original one as yet unless I contact my payment issuer.

Sure it works, but please devs- we all really need you guys to fix the connection issue where every time I open the app anew I have to create a new connection with my computer, resulting in having 30+ connections to the same device yet unable to delete any of them 😢 I don't enjoy having a clogged connection list

Loses connection with the desktop app all the time. Works great when it works but if my phone strays from the stream deck app for anything, even notifications, it loses connection and I have to scan the QR again at least 4 times per stream.

title: magicplan
description:
Instantly create and share floor plans, field reports, and estimates with one easy-to-use application. magicplan offers a better way to get work done while in the field. 

Measuring & Sketching
We use state-of-the-art tech with an easy-to-use interface, allowing you to measure and sketch interior plans in 2D & 3D.

Reporting
Add photos, 360° images, notes, custom forms, and markups to create structured reports that eliminate any risk of confusion.

Estimating
We developed a way to combine take-off and estimate to automatically calculate pricing on your mobile device.

magicplan is renowned worldwide:
Downloaded by over 20 million users
Every day the equivalent of a small city is mapped with magicplan
 
Training session available in English at https://www.magicplan.app/webinars/

Can I use magicplan for free?
Using magicplan for free allows you to experience the full potential of magicplan by giving you access to all features on two projects. There's no time limit.

What are the limits when using magicplan for free?
Create more than two projects
Collaborate in teams
Access the magicplan API

What paid options do you offer?
We offer three subscription plans, including unlimited projects and the features to meet your needs. You have the choice between a comprehensive sketching, reporting, or estimating solution. 

Sketch - Create and share professional interior plans in 2D and 3D
Report - Create structured reports including photos, notes, markups & more.
Estimate - Automatically calculate pricing for quick, accurate estimates.
 
Supported laser distance meters:
• HILTI PD-I
• BOSCH GLM 50 C, GLM 50 CX, GLM 100 C, GLM 120 C, PLR 30C, PLR 40C, PLR 50C
• DeWalt DW03201
• Leica Disto D110, D510 (Europe), E7100i, E7500i (North America), D810, D1, D2
• Stabila LD520, LD250 BT
• WDM 8-14
  
Compatibility
• Android device running AR Core 
• Requires a gyroscope

magicplan technology is protected by multiple patents.

New Features:

comments: This is a very good app but not the best. It only really wants u to do rooms not a house. And far as trying to make a layout for a house on here. We're u need to put walls it dos not let u some times. Like it won't let u make a wall off of a inside wall but it will from a out side wall. And y dos it not let u run the walls together? Like some of the inside walls can't be the same size? That's just very crazy to me. If they fix this I thank it will be werth using all the time

So far this app is becoming easier to use each time I log on and the fact that it gives you 2 free designs is even better for you to be able to compare. If they could just allow you to put in the roof pitch or roof angle and select amount of overhang you want so that it places a roof over your design to see if the design works they would have a monopoly on the market because I have not seen an app yet that does this.

It was a great app, but it seems they removed access to the 3D view to the free plans and now it isn't of value you to me anymore. It doesn't make sense for me to get a subscription plan either. I used to recommend it to everyone and now I'm going to find a different app.

"Aim at your feet", "floor too uniform", "aim at your feet"... Never got beyond these messages. Worthless. Just tried again in case it's fixed. Current version doesn't even launch properly without hanging up.

The only thing I don't like is that there are restrictions on objects for no reason. For example, I can't add a bookcase of size 61x242cm. It says bookcase should be less than 200cm. Why? My bookcase is in fact in these dimensions. Also, I was not able to add my dining table because it did not allow my dimensions. Please remove these restrictions, so that it will be a 5-star app.

title: AutoCAD - DWG Viewer & Editor
description:
Take the power of AutoCAD wherever you go! AutoCAD mobile is a DWG viewing and editing app with easy-to-use drawing and drafting tools. 
View, create and edit DWG files on mobile devices - anytime, anywhere. Simplify your site visits with the most powerful CAD app and do real CAD work on the go. 

7 Day Trial: Enjoy unrestricted access to all premium drawing, drafting and editing tools.

Current AutoCAD or AutoCAD LT desktop subscribers: Sign in with your Autodesk account to unlock all premium features for FREE.

AutoCAD mobile is accurate, fast, and offers an abundance of features. Upload and open 2D DWG drawings and view all aspects of your DWG file, including external references (xrefs). Extend your workflow across platforms, easily access data and DWGs from your desktop, web browser, and mobile device. You can even work offline without an internet connection, taking your CAD drawings with you in the field and beyond. Simplify your client meetings and construction site visits with the most powerful CAD app and do real CAD work on the go.

An ideal app for architects, engineers, construction professionals, field technicians and contractors. Easy to use as a DWG editor and viewer, regardless of CAD software experience.

Features
- View and edit DWG files from device storage, email, or external cloud storage like Google Drive, Dropbox and OneDrive
- Create new CAD drawings on the fly
- CAD editor - Modify and mark-up AutoCAD drawings
- Import values from Leica DISTO
- Draw and edit shapes using object snap and keypad input
- Advanced technical drawing and editing tools such as arc, offset and more!
- Select, move, rotate, and scale objects. View coordinates and properties
- Work offline and sync your changes once back online
- Manage layers- create new layers, lock, rename or delete layers
- Blocks- Move and duplicate existing blocks

Key Benefits
- Be more productive in the field by working with the latest drawings
- Safeguard drawings in your free Autodesk account or with your own external accounts
- Collaborate in real time and reduce mistakes and re-work 
- Replace blueprints at job sites with drawings on your mobile device
- Work seamlessly across platforms- from desktop to mobile and back to desktop

Upgrade to Premium or Ultimate to maintain access to all editing tools.

AutoCAD mobile subscriptions are available in the following options: 
- Premium monthly for $4.99
- Premium annual for $49.99 (save $9.89 vs. monthly subscription)
- Ultimate annual for $99.99
- Included free with AutoCAD and AutoCAD LT desktop subscriptions
- Available free for Student Autodesk accounts

All new users automatically get a free trial of the premium version for 7 days.

Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your Google Play account. Subscriptions are automatically renewed unless cancelled at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You will not be able to cancel a subscription during the active period. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase.

*Free products and services are subject to the Autodesk, Inc. terms of use that accompany them.

Stay connected! Follow us on:
Autodesk.com
Facebook @AutoCADmobileapp
Twitter @AutoCADmobile 

Terms of use

comments: So android got a new update. That's cool, but it REALLY messed up screen recording. First off, the videos seem to automatically be sped up, but the pitch is the same. It also seems to only happen sometimes. There's also a glitch with the audio where it sounds like it's coming out of a fan - well, that's the best way I can describe it. And the audio glitch happens every time. As an amateur video editor who needs to screen record for my videos, this is incredibly annoying. Usually it's great, tho.
This app is really great, its sound quality and video quality is really very good.The thing I like most is that you can put a logo of your choice instead of the recorder logo, it's really great.

The random stopping time seems to be fjxed. A new bug I noticed is it will close by itself. I'll be looking for the red circle but it closed itself for some reason. Another minor bug is the audio will be distored when I start recording. Thank you.

I use mobizen 2 years now and most annoying about this app is the watermark! I tried to watch video,after I finish seing two videos I cant open another videos! Its keep bothering when I do reaction video...please..
This app is so good for people who can't record and use apps, but please add a button to remove the water mark :) but this app is really good so 4 star

title: Duet Display
description:
** 50% Off For A Limited Time **

Duet turns your Android phone, tablet, or Chromebook into the most advanced extra display for both Mac & PC. Developed by a team of ex-Apple engineers, Duet offers unparalleled performance and display quality - all with zero lag.

— DO MORE —
Be twice as productive by multitasking with two screens. And for those that travel, have a portable way to stay productive.

— INCREDIBLY SIMPLE —
To get started, open Duet on your device and the free Duet desktop app will automatically detect your device that you can click to connect, and transform it into a high performance touchscreen display.

— TOUCHSCREEN —
Interact with Mac & PC like never before, with touch & gestures, including two-finger scrolling, pan and zoom.

And with our latest release, you can even add a touch bar to any Android with any Mac.

— PRESS —
TIME - "Getting Work Done Faster and More Efficiently"
Forbes - "The simple thing to note is this...Duet Display works."
Business Insider - "Zero lag and true retina resolution”
Wall Street Journal - “It’s as easy as just plugging it in"

— REVIEWS —
“Awesome! My iPad Pro can be an extra monitor! Cool app”
~CEO of T-Mobile, John Legere

Duet Works With:
All Androids with 7.0+
All Macs with 10.14 (Mojave) and later
All PCs with Windows 10 and later


Learn more at http://www.duetdisplay.com
Terms: https://help.duetdisplay.com/duet-terms-services
Privacy Policy: https://help.duetdisplay.com/duet-privacy-policy

developerAddress: 5237 Summerlin Commons, Suite 400, Fort Meyers, FL 33907
recentChanges: Stability Fixes
comments: It used to be the best. I had been using the wireless display option all the time. Paid the one time cost to enable pro features. Now the wireless display changed to subscription-based. This is not what I paid for. Greed has gotten this app to go from being the best to simply one of many making the money grab with subscriptions. How utterly disappointing.

This is a very cool concept, just plug your device into your computer and creates a monitor. On their website it says it can run at 60 fps, which would be awesome if it were true. With my Tab s5e, I am getting around 10-20 fps. I would say this app is a scam, but it is probably a bug, and it's at least usable despite the lag, and I contacted the support team, which were very responsive and respectful. However they could not address the issue. Until they fix the issue, I am giving them 3 stars.

Cool product, better tech support. I bought this while on vacation, had a few problems with speed. Sent an email to the dev/support and got a response very quickly. He led me through some debugging / troubleshooting steps and we finally figured out that the wi-fi where I was staying was too far away (and sub-standard). After I got home, I tried it again and it works like a charm. Thank you for getting this to work, I can see it being very helpful while traveling (to locations where I have decent internet).

I really like the idea of this app. I have all Apple products EXCEPT my Galaxy Tab S7+, simply because the Galaxy Tab is much better bang for buck, and I think just a better experience than iPad. That being said, Duet was supposed to be the app that allowed my to use my tablet as a second screen and even for drawing. But it works so poorly. I didn't even notice a difference using a wired connection. I'd pay extra to get stylus support if it worked. But it's so laggy and unreliable. Please fix.

An absolute nightmare to keep working. When it works, everything runs great besides some minor lag when drawing in apps such as photoshop. However I literally can never get it to work despite paying for the premium subscription. I got the air to connect only one single time. Half the time it won't connect be cause "my subscritpion was canceled" yet I have the money taken out of my account. I give up fighting with this app it isn't worth it.

title: Habitica: Gamify Your Tasks
description:
Treat your life like a game to stay motivated and organized! Habitica makes it simple to have fun while accomplishing goals.
Input your Habits, your Daily goals, and your To-Do list, and then create a custom avatar. Check off tasks to level up your avatar and unlock features such as armor, pets, skills, and even quests! Fight monsters with friends to keep each other accountable, and use your gold on in-game rewards, like equipment, or custom awards, like watching an episode of your favorite TV show. Flexible, social, and fun, Habitica is the perfect way to motivate yourself to accomplish anything.
If you have any questions, feel free to send feedback to mobile@habitica.com! And if you enjoy our app, we would really appreciate it if you would leave us a review.

developerAddress:
11870 Santa Monica Blvd.
Suite 106-577
Los Angeles, CA 90025
recentChanges: We’ve improved more of our notifications so they bring you to the relevant screen when tapped. When customizing your avatar, you’ll be able to see your avatar updating in real time as you select different options. You can also see your current Gems when gifting Gems from your balance now. We’ve fixed a few bugs too, including one where tasks wouldn’t load when the app is left running in the background, the stats widget works again, and another where Dailies wouldn’t filter properly on launch.
comments: I have ADHD. This app has been so helpful! The little hits of dopamine from accomplishing tasks and earning points is exactly what my neurodivergent brain needs. It's cute, it's easy to use. I was able to input all my chores, even annual ones! And input habits I want to encourage or discourage like getting takeout versus eating at home. It glitched on me once. I just closed the app, reopened it, and it was fine! It's a free app! I plan to subscribe if this ADHDer still uses it in September. ;)

I love the concept and really want to use the app, however, I don't want my to-do list items to disappear once completed. They need to go into a space for "tasks completed" or something similar, so that they can be referenced if necessary. I will have to use a different checklist until this is possible. Edit: It does in fact save your completed tasks. I just overlooked it. This app is a must have for making your life more productive and fun. I'm grateful to have found it.

I love it!! only app that geniunly keeps me motivated to do things! I also love how the free version doesnt withhold the basics, and subscription isnt forced [although once I have the money I definetly will be!] The wheelchair option in the avatar is super cool aswell. could never rate it anything other than 5 stars!

Good concept but seems a bit buggy so far. The positive/negative setup is not the most intuitive thing to figure out, as well as some other features. While trying to initially set up my tasks, I tried to adjust the streaks, and it would not save my adjustment. So idk. The app could use some more QA I think, & maybe some work on UX? Hoping it all gets better over time. The character creation is cute and I like the reward aspect of it.

This is actually a great app and I find it motivates me to do the things I struggle to do on a daily basis way better than any other methods I've tried. However one really annoying thing is that if you leave the app running in the background and come back to it, none of your tasks will load. You have to exit the app completely to get them to work again. If this gets fixed I will change my rating to 5 stars.

comments: Purchased the "Pro" version to get full functionality a few minutes ago. My very first task is a fail and the app will be deleted. I need a daily reminder every WEEKDAY, not every single day. This app doesn't seem to offer that, at least not easily. I need an app that it intuitive and efficient, and this simply isn't it. Too bad, I had high hopes. I can't say much about an app that lasted all of a few minutes, but I doubt that I'm alone in needing to list repetitive tasks that follow a routine

I paid for the premium version and I'm deleting this app. I wrote many times to the app makers but never had a reply. I sent them lots of screenshots. This app is too buggy and feels unstable. The last straw was one of my repeat To Do's with sub categories has turned into 10 subcategories that say 'car wash', and all my other subcategories have now gone. It's infuriating. You can't charge for a premium service for something so buggy. Not happy at all.

The app is somewhat neat and elegant. Not overloaded, which is good in the world of "todo apps". However. The first sin is the "add task" notification, which is a common task apps abuse. Notifications are for notifying. With this thing on you'll never have this "done clearing notifications" feeling again (and isn't regaining control over things to do the purpose of every todo app?). (Yes, you CAN turn it off.) Second sin is that the category color isn't used anywhere, so it's basically useless.

(Updated from 3 stars): Stunning and optimised 👍 I would highly recommend it In terms of task ordering, is there a way of getting them to appear in order from top to bottom rather than bottom to top? Previous problem (which I awarded 3 stars for, now fixed): 1/6 chance the 'press and hold to reorder task' feature would work ie: Display the border surrounding the task and allow me to move the task. This wasted lots of time.

I understand having ads but I have been trying to adjust something and every time I click its like there is an ad. I used a list and sublist and it seemed to copy the first item all the way down the list. I'm finding a new app. When I first used the app I enjoyed it. The ads weren't as often.

title: pCloud: Free Cloud Storage
description:
pCloud is the secure place where you can store, preview and share files, anywhere you go. Start with up to 10 GB free storage.

You'll be able to backup photos and videos from your device, play your personal playlists, or preview work-related documents. You'll also be able to share large files with anyone and add extra security like password protection and expiration date. From your vacation photos to videos and work documents, pCloud brings all your files together.

• Start with up to 10 GB free. Extend the space on your phone with up to 2 TB
• Choose where to store your files - in the United States or the European Union.
• Access and preview files across all your devices
• Backup photos and videos from your phone with the option Automatic Upload
• Share large files with added security (password protection, expiration date)
• Play your personal music collection with the built-in audio player
• Get offline access to important files, when you're on the go
• Encrypt private files with client-side encryption, using pCloud Encryption

Use pCloud Encryption as the vault for your passwords, financial reports or other sensitive documents. The files you upload to the Crypto folder will be protected with client-side encryption. This means that they will be encrypted before they get uploaded to pCloud. With pCloud's zero-knowledge privacy policy we, as a service provider, will not know what kind of data you store in the Crypto folder.

pCloud is also available for iOS, desktop (Windows, macOS and Linux) and from my.pCloud.com.

comments: Automatic upload doesn't work. Every time i have to manually deactivate and reactivate "automatic upload" to upload new files. EDIT: this was written after already having installed version 3.4.0. It still doesn't work EDIT2: seems to work now. Great job. Now, only the possibility to disable the annoying "free up space" message is missing

This is exactly what I was looking for. I considered NAS, personal cloud drives, various other cloud offerings, but nothing beats pCloud. This has to be the best investment I made. The mobile app as well as windows app are excellent. They backup silently in the background. So far I am very impressed.

pCloud is a real GEM! This service couldn't be any more CONVENIENT or EASIER to use. Learned a few things, incl that I NEED to delete images I've stuffed into my Folders, over the year(s)!!! Haven't cleaned my pic Files for way to long. Likely resulted in uploading 100 unnecessary pics. Bad me! WOW!! --->> This app, itself, uploads the pics/Folders I select!!!!!! What a SUPERB FEATURE!! Pics retain high quality. (I've trusted Dropbox for it's reliable LONGEVITY. Hope same is true of pCloud.)

I really do like this app. Biggest problems are the lack of option to create photo albums based from folders and the System Volume Information folder appearing all the time even if you delete it. Otherwise, very good app.

I was very weary of putting my trust into another cloud service they will either lose your valuable photos & videos that you hold dear to yourself or ask some stupid amount of money for there service.Then I found pCloud and oh I am in many ways so happy and impressed with there cloud service everything pCloud offers they deliver grab a low cost monthly service you will not be disapointed!

title: Productive - Habit tracker
description:
Productive is a free and easy-to-use habit tracker that helps you build a routine of positive, life changing habits. Set personal goals, track your progress, and motivate yourself to achieve new heights!

Productive habit tracker is here to help you make the most of your task management and get things done. Whether you want to break bad, arrange a good habits list, or set task reminder, our app will guide and motivate you on a daily basis. Achieve your goals with our task tracker!

What can you do with the Productive habit tracker?

★ Plan your habits and tasks with an easy-to-use interface
★ Schedule tasks for any time of the day
★ Set smart reminders for your habit list for each time of the day
★ Stay on track with useful statistics

Why should you download the Productive habit tracker?

SIMPLICITY:
The clear and beautiful interface that will help you build customised habits lists, based on our handy habit presets. 

CUSTOMIZATION:
The app is fully customizable - you can name your habit, choose a unique icon and even pick its color. It is easy to create a task list that is perfect for you.

STATISTICS:
Track your habits and analyze progress for a task - build motivating chains when completing them. The longer your chain of completed tasks, the more likely you will keep the streak going.

NOTIFICATIONS
Smart reminders give a summary of what tasks from your list are scheduled for each part of the day.

TIME MANAGEMENT 
Habits and tasks broken down into daily fragments of your routine and suitable for anyone who wants to achieve more in less time.

PREMIUM FEATURES
Subscribe to Premium for even more great features to boost your personal productivity: 
- Unlimited number of habits
- Improved reminders for your task and habit lists
- Motivating stats for each habit

There are many things you may want to improve. Productive will help you track your habits, like taking your pills regularly, exercising, or keeping to a diet. It can also be used by people who have difficulty focusing and concentrating, allowing them to create their own daily tasks and habits to work on.

By downloading this application, you agree to the Apalon Apps End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy.
You can choose from different subscription options.
* A subscription with a free trial will automatically renew to a paid subscription unless you cancel the subscription before the end of the free trial period.
* Cancel a free trial or subscription anytime through your account settings on the Google Play Store and continue to enjoy the premium content until the end of the free-trial period or paid subscription!

Privacy Policy: http://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4
California Privacy Notice: https://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#h

comments: Such a frustrating experience. The app is not at all intuitive, I found it hard to navigate through it and somehow, after several days of use, I still have no idea how to mark stuff as done (for habits that I set for myself, without reminders). 🤷🏻‍♀️ Pity, because it looked really good in the beginning, and seemed to be what I needed.

Great app for tasks! I've only downloaded it today, and I already have most of my tasks done! This app has no bugs whatsoever, and I love the software. It's smooth, and it looks nice to me. There are so many reminders/habits that you can easily hand pick from the options given. Like sleeping, online studying, and so much more! As a student, this reminder app will definitely help me a lot with tracking tasks and more. The app has so much more to offer than you think, download it now! I love it!

Looks great - Sneaky & Annoying popups. Signed up for free, 1st thing you see is the 7 day free trial and it asks for CC #...you DON'T have too do this to use it, look for little X in corner that you can barely see. I feel many don't see this X and think you must do 7 day trial to use it free. SNEAKY tactic, making X-out so hard to notice. EVERY time you open app to use it they use this method of pop up to try and get you to subscribe. ANNOYING. Looks great, and fun to use, not user friendly

It's a nice app! I got the paid version and there are some things I'd like to see added: A way to add descriptions to some routines An explanation for how the weekly routines are calculated-I'm supposed to do something 3x a week but it stops counting when the weekend arrives A way to set our own times for morning/afternoon/evening More icons for routines (maybe emojis?) I've also had some notifications not showing up for some reason (in the evening)

I m not satisfied at all. I got the one year premium. How can you charge so much without the ability to sync between devices :O What would happen when i change my phone which i do regulary and how come u cannot save to tje cloud as advertised when the Premium was offered to me. I m looking for an alternative despite having like 11 months left as premium

title: Cloud Earning PHT
description:
Welcome to the world of Phoneum - Mobile-only Cryptocurrency!

Cloud Earning PHT is designed to deliver simplified user experience and platform that enables all users, regardless of technical aptitude, to fully participate in the new cryptocurrency economy.

The application requires internet to sign in and establish a connection with the Phoneum server. Simply press "Start Earning" to connect. The server handles everything in the cloud, therefore, once earning is established, the app doesn't require the device to keep it open or in the background to earn PHT. 

Stake your PHT and get up to 5% monthly return! 

At any time, open Cloud Earning PHT to access the average earning statistics, track the earning progress, or see the PHT market statistics .

To avoid interruption, a notification is sent when the earning process ends, to extend Earning for the next 7 days. 

Features:

- Earn PHT on a 7-day basis
- PHT Balance updates every 10 seconds
- Stake PHT with up to 5% monthly return
- Deposit PHT
- Invite and earn more
- Average Earning Statistics
- PHT Market Statistics
- PHT/USD Calculator

comments: It is no longer possible to leave the book open while searching for a requestable card. Plus, the numbers on the request list are not visible, too tiny. This is annoying. Can't you just make the requests available from the book. It takes ages to open/close menus to find a card to request... Otherwise, navigating the book is faster and that's a big pro! Menu options fixed with new update. Tx. Game is very enjoyable and feedback is very good. 5* with pleasure :)

Not worth. I gave the free version a try because if you do the paid version you are an idiot. There is no break even point if you do premium, you will always be down, it's just math. Anyways after 3 months straight (not a single day not mining) I'm up to $0.49 if that sounds worth it to you, great. There are other apps like BTC cloud 2021 where you can make literally 100x that, though the mining is more hands on.

Real payout ! fun reward system , lots of ads. You get 2 or 3 spins and if you wish more, you have to watch an ad. But don't order your Lambo just jet; you get 10 to max 100.000 Litoshi (still only 0,1% when you already hit the litecoin logo twice) After 1 day casually playing i got about Litoshi or about 7 eurocents (at current rate). But at least it got banked at my Coinbase account, so you can withdraw for fiat or swap for some other coin at wish... Less ads, higher prizes for 5 star

I was excited to see that you do one click a week to mine, however I was let down greatly. Two weeks in a row, when i click to mine... my balance is reset. I am giving one last week and if i don't have the proper balance I am going to uninstall. I am mining for me, not for the team of PHT. Stop taking my funds!

I have no idea why so many people complain about free money on their reviews, I play every single day, and have deposited/ withdrawn to probit a few times without any problems ,just takes a lil while, if you don't know how to copy and paste a string of letters to withdraw, or can't understand the simple reason less pht is being minted, give up on life

title: QR & Barcode Reader
description:
QR & Barcode Reader is a modern QR code scanner and barcode scanner with all the features you need.

Scan any QR code or barcode to get additional information including results from popular online services; Amazon, eBay and Google - 100% FREE!

ALL COMMON FORMATS
Scan all common barcode formats: QR, Data Matrix, Aztec, UPC, EAN, Code 39 and many more.

RELEVANT ACTIONS
Open URLs, connect to WiFi hotspots, add calendar events, read VCards, find product and price information, etc.

SECURITY AND PERFORMANCE
Protect yourself from malicious links with Chrome Custom Tabs featuring Google Safe Browsing technology and profit from shorter loading times.

MINIMAL PERMISSIONS
Scan an image without giving access to your device storage. Even share contact data as QR code without giving access to your address book!

SCAN FROM IMAGES
Detect codes within picture files or scan directly using the camera.

FLASHLIGHT AND ZOOM
Activate the flashlight for reliable scans in dark environments and use pinch-to-zoom to read barcodes even from far distances.

CREATE AND SHARE
Share arbitrary data such as website links with the built-in QR code generator by displaying them on your screen as a QR code and scanning them with another device.

CUSTOM SEARCH OPTIONS
Get specific information by adding custom websites into the barcode search (i.e. your favorite shopping website).

CSV EXPORT AND ANNOTATIONS
Manage unlimited history and export it (as CSV file). Import it to Excel or save it to any cloud storage such as Google Drive. Annotate your scans and manage product inventory or implement quality assurance in your small business!

Enjoy one of the best QR code reader apps available for smartphones and tablets running Android 6.0 or higher.

Supported QR codes:
• website links (URL)
• contact data (MeCard, vCard, vcf)
• calendar events
• WiFi hotspot access information
• geo locations
• phone call information
• email, SMS and MATMSG

Barcodes and two-dimensional codes:
• article numbers (EAN, UPC, JAN, GTIN, ISBN)
• Codabar or Codeabar
• Code 39, Code 93 and Code 128
• Interleaved 2 of 5 (ITF)
• PDF417
• GS1 DataBar (RSS-14)
• Aztec Code
• Data Matrix

QR Code is a registered trademark of DENSO WAVE INCORPORATED in the United States and other countries.

comments: Too much space between rows. The darks theme has the top bar other color. The bottom ads are not correctly aligned and the remove ads button is annoying. And more ads on viewing a qr code. You can't search the country. Not sure why Chrome keyword exists in ootions... Wroks really slow, and on really samll qr you need to center it perfectly and is slow.

For some reason after I scan a QR Code the link is unable to be clicked nor to be copied so I had to manually type a super long "supposed to be one click" link. It was a google form (if ever you are asking).
It works quick for me and I don't have to go to the app for me to scan its at the top of my screen when I scroll down to see my settings I haven't had any ads from this app so far so

less than 3mb is quite impressive, considering that my gallery app is around 100 and is less complex than this, honestly I'm gonna use this once a year but it's not worth installing cause it's so dang small, seems pretty nice from what I've used however.

it seems to be good to me it'll scan the code and scanned the internet and gave me the information that on the subject,but I've only used it once. if it continues to work properly I'd be happy bumping it up to 5 stars 🌟.

title: Voxist: Visual voicemail you can read
description:
Voxist is an intelligent voicemail that replaces your carrier’s inefficient voicemail. Delight callers with customized greetings and save time by reading transcribed voicemail messages. Access messages on your phone or via email, so you never miss out.

Voxist is a free voicemail app that’s really simple to navigate, so you can manage all of your business and personal voicemail efficiently. In a meeting? On the train or in a car? With another client? Read your voicemail instead of listening to it!

- FEATURES - 

*VISUAL VOICEMAIL*
Get all your voicemail in one screen, and in one click, listen to that important one.

* VOICEMAIL TO TEXT*
Read your voicemails in more than 70 different languages with our reliable, high-quality voicemail transcription service.

*PERSONALIZED GREETINGS*
Delight your clients & friends and with voicemail greetings created by you just for them.  Discourage unwanted spam from leaving a message, by creating a greeting that lets them know they are not welcome. 

Record your greetings or write them. Our patented technology can even automatically greet your caller by name!

*VOICEMAIL TO EMAIL*
Receive audio and voicemail transcriptions in your email so you can access from anywhere and easily share voicemail with others. Add as many email accounts as you like!

*UNLIMITED STORAGE CAPACITY
No voicemail storage limits.  Voxist continuously captures all of your voicemails, ensuring your callers will never ever hear “this voicemail is full.”

*MESSAGES SAVED FOREVER
Don’t stress about voicemails disappearing unless you chose to delete them.  Many plans delete voicemails after a certain amount of time, but Voxist saves them forever.

*NEW VOICEMAIL ALERTS AND NOTIFICATIONS
Receive mobile and email notifications when you receive a new voicemail so no important messages go unnoticed.

*NO ADS
Always enjoy an ad-free experience, whether you’re a paid or free subscriber!
 
Users have described us as a visual voicemail on steroids - especially practical for business voicemail, people who handle a large volume of calls, and those who would like to address callers differently and uniquely.

Our offers:

- Voxist Free
• unlimited visual Voicemail for 1 number;
• 10 transcriptions per month;
• Voicemail transcript & audio via email;
• connect 1 email account;
• 1 personalized greeting;
• transcriptions in 1 language.

- Voxist Premium: $4.99 per month
• unlimited visual Voicemail for up to 2 numbers;
• 30 transcriptions per month;
• Voicemail transcript & audio via email;
• connect up to 5 email accounts;
• 5 personalized greetings;
• transcriptions in 2 languages.

- Voxist Pro: $9.99 per month
• unlimited visual Voicemail for up to 5 numbers;
• 100 transcriptions per month;
• Voicemail transcript & audio via email;
• connect an unlimited number of email accounts;
• unlimited personalized greetings;
• transcriptions in hundreds of languages!

- NOTES - 
• Compatible with most operators on monthly plans!
• Voicemail service available in France, United States (except Sprint) & on Bell in Canada.
• Sign up for FREE to see if Voxist works with your carrier.
• To use Voxist, you must forward missed calls to Voxist with carrier-specific forwarding codes.
• If Voxist doesn't fit your needs, deactivate forwarding BEFORE you delete the app, otherwise your voicemail will NOT be re-routed back to your carrier.

We hope you’ll give Voxist a try.

Check us out to learn more: https://www.voxist.com

Terms of Service & Privacy Policy: https://www.voxist.com/terms-conditions

comments: Their customer service is just amazing!! They immediately responded here and via email to my issue of not being able to activate the service. Not many companies can say that! They were quick, precise, and gave me clear instructions for how to get setup and use their vm app. I was able to fix it and love this app! One of my absolute favorites for functionality w my phone. You guys are awesome! Great job developers! Update after 4 months: One Big issue: empty vm count towards free 10 per month.

I use the free version (10 transcripts/month, 1 personalized greeting). It serves my needs well. I've used it for about a year and have not had any issues. I get an email with the transcription and also have the voice recording and transcription in the app as well. The few times I exceeded the transcription limit, I could still listen to the recording. I recommend this app.

So helpful! I hate having to dial into my vm and remember what buttons do what. Voxist puts it right there so I can see it, delete it, and/or call back with ease. Quick and easy to set up too. Sometimes the dictation will horribly mistype words or phrases, which is my only reason for 4 stars instead of 5.

I do like this app but set up isn't easy. My house doesn't have great reception so I need VoLTE and WiFi calling on so I get clearer reception. However, with VoLTE and WiFi calling on, it just doesn't work. Nobody can leave a voicemail, and it plays a French message. If it can work with VoLTE, it would be perfect. Doesn't work with 3 mobile.

I've been enjoying the app. It does what it is supposed to do. The only reason I took away 2 stars is because I keep getting alerts that I have a new voicemail transcript but when I open the app it says "no transcript available" and this counts against the 10 free transcriptions. Why does that count against my free transcripts if there was nothing to transcribe? Other than this, I love the app.

title: BlackBerry Hub+ Services
description:
BlackBerry Hub+ Services is the foundation upon which all of your favorite BlackBerry applications are built. It provides both enhanced security and improved productivity.

Key Features:
• Find out about all BlackBerry Hub+ applications 
• Enjoy a more consistent experience across your BlackBerry applications, including common menus that allow you to open items in other BlackBerry applications.
• Manages the data for all BlackBerry Hub+ applications, providing secure and efficient access to your most critical data. This includes the sync logic that obtains your data from the Internet, seamlessly keeping your device up-to-date. 
• Be first to find out what’s coming next in Inside BlackBerry
• Fully supports Android for Work deployment and, when enabled by your administrator, supports unifying your personal and work views while maintaining strict data storage separation.

recentChanges: • Minor enhancements and stability fixes
comments: *Update to my review below: While my Outlook email accounts work fine, the Hub seems to have stopped working for my AOL accounts and my Yahoo accounts. The point of the Hub is a unified Inbox, so I'm disappointed that I may have to drop the app. I've written to support, and am awaiting the reply. Brilliant app that blows away its competition. I have 10 email accounts + social media. Blackberry's rightly famous Hub lets me deal with this barrage of messaging very efficiently on phone & tablet.

I'm now on a OnePlus 8 Pro. I've never been on a phone that wasn't a BlackBerry. Hub+ is well worth the subscription and i have never had any issues with the transition. People that give poor reviews because they are on outdated phones isn't fair. I'm on Android 11 where my keyone was on 8. Yes it was giving me issues before but sometimes you just have to let go of the nostalgia of a BlackBerry and update your phone. This app works very very well and there is no other app like it.

On BB Motion Some emails do not appear in hub at times. Also, Yahoo mail used to blink red LED and now blinks blue (which is same color as texts). Oulook also blinks blue. Gmail, which I do not normally use now blinks red. We should have control of these LED notifications like older BB10 used to let user select.

Installed android 10 phone my previous phone Keyone android 7 had glitches ...sometimes unable to receive emails..sometimes for 24 hours..Since on android 10 (not a BB or keypad which requires re-learning) fast and reliable Hub Services,,,
Great app. I have become so used to this app on my Blackberry Keyone that I wanted it on my TCL 20 Pro 5G. It works great on Android 11

title: NordPass® Password Manager & Digital Vault
description:
With the NordPass password manager, keep passwords safe in one place to autosave, autofill, and access them on any device, anytime. It’s a new-generation password manager app, designed with top-level security and simplicity in mind. 
 
The NordPass password manager is brought to you by the cybersecurity experts behind NordVPN, a leading VPN service provider, trusted by more than 14 million users worldwide. The NordPass password manager was designed using the latest encryption algorithm, XChaCha20, and has a zero-knowledge policy: your passwords are yours only — we know nothing.
 
Here’s what you get with NordPass Free:
 
➡️ Keep passwords in a secure vault
No need to remember hundreds of different passwords. Just add them all to NordPass.
 
➡️ Autosave your passwords
Save time by using the NordPass autosave feature. You’ll no longer need to scroll through your passwords.
 
➡️ Autofill passwords
NordPass will recognize the website you’re visiting and will automatically prompt you to log in. Create strong passwords and autofill them whenever you’re visiting your favorite website.

➡️ Autofill credit card details
Save time and make swift online payments. Store your credit cards in NordPass to automatically fill details at online checkouts.

➡️ OCR scanner
Don’t waste time typing. Fill credit card details and add secure notes with the OCR scanner.

➡️ Add personal information
Add your Personal Info to NordPass and sort it your way.

➡️ Use NordPass wherever you are
Download and install NordPass on your mobile or desktop. Add browser extensions to save time and log in as you browse.
 
➡️ Free means free
The free password manager has no limitations on how many passwords you can store or how many devices sync your information. No credit card required.
 
You can access even more features by subscribing to NordPass Premium:

➡️ Safely share passwords
Share your passwords securely with other NordPass users.

➡️ Identify weak passwords
NordPass’s Password Health tool detects weak, reused, and compromised passwords. Update them and improve your online security.
 
➡️ Check for leaked data
Use the Data Breach Scanner to find out whether your sensitive data has ever been leaked.

➡️ Access passwords on multiple devices
Access all your passwords on up to 6 devices simultaneously. 
 
Download NordPass and forget your password stress. Forever.
 
ℹ️ For more information, visit: https://nordpass.com
🔒 For Privacy Policy, visit: https://nordpass.com/privacy-policy
✉️ Feel free to contact our customer support team with any questions you may have: support@nordpass.com

recentChanges: Random fact of the day: Did you know that there’s a bunch of ladies working at NordPass? Yes, we don’t follow any stereotypes here. So in this release, we want to thank all the women who tirelessly and continuously work to make NordPass a better password manager.
comments: It's getting better. One thing I hate is being forced logged out. Look, I get it safety and security. On a phone or laptop fine. But let me make that choice. Having to log in every day on my home desktop computer? Total PITA.

Okay but has issues. Tried this service because of their amazing vpn service that I would highly recommend but this autofill app has a ways to go before I could recomend. I have an active subscription currently and I cannot export passwords but has the option to import password only. Sometimes the autofill option doesnt like to work but for the most part it does what it is suppose to do. Keep up the work and it will be a great app.
Just excellent! And how anyone does anthing online without this app, is beyond me hehe. Love it and highly recomend it. Once you try it out, you will never understand how you manage without xD

It keeps unapplying itself in the permissions to auto fill. Furthermore autofill is a huge drag using this app even in the paid version. I hope this will be patched out People don't want to break their back to access passwords in this ever increasing speedy world of using different devices and different passwords. Developers please make ease of access better. If this doesn't change I probably will be shopping around for something else.I would love to keep this though. I like the rest.

I find this app a little frustrating. When I open an app the Nordpass icon pops up I click on it & most times it turns the screen misty white color & does nothing. When it does work if it knows I use the app instead giving me a list of apps to choose from it should go ahead & fill the username and password. I shouldn't have scroll list to find the app. If it's got a password on its list just fill it in. I also have used lastpass & that's what it does. I'm cancelling the paid version .

comments: WARNING. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! I was supposed to receive a 3day free trial, I was imediately charged 21.99 for the yearly fee. Once I opened the app, it doesnt do anything at all and there is no option to cancel your membership. TOTAL SCAM. The only thing you can do, is click "contact us" and you can email someone.. but you have no way identify yourself to request a refund unless you give a stranger your debit card number in the email. No thanks. Lost enough simply installing this app.
Does not work. Do not waste your time. Full of ads which could include virus and security issues.
Don't get it. It's a waste of time and it doesn't even search your TV. Don't do it if you have a Samsung Galaxy A01

My TV has the ability to connect to the Internet and sooooo slow smart which is simply impossible to use. I'm not ready to wait for 10 minutes to watch just a video. Today I solved my problem by downloading the application. It says that I can stream the image from the phone to the TV. You will not believe, but it is 10 times faster than my TV. Everything is streaming for a second in great quality, I'm amazed! I urge you to forget about the slow smart and start using the application. You will not regret, many thanks to the developers!

Does not work, fake app!!!! I'm assuming since this app didn't work from the start and I was charged a monthly charge and not reimbursed when I contacted the developer. That this is a FAKE app they never offered to help me figure out how to get it to work after I told them I did all the specifications needed. THEY JUST SENT ME A MESSAGE AND TOLD ME HOW I COULD CANCEL MY SUBSCRIPTION. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE... DO NOT DOWNLOAD UNLESS YOU JUST WANT TO GET CHARGED FOR NO REASON FOR AN APP .

title: Email - Lightning Fast & Secure Mail
description:
Email by Edison is the simplified, customizable inbox experience that allows you to manage unlimited email accounts in a seamless way! Get emails faster, block spam, and never see an ad clogging up your inbox again.

Enjoy Office 365, Yahoo Mail, AOL Mail, Hotmail, Outlook, MS Exchange, IMAP, Alto, Gmail, iCloud, Comcast, Verizon, AT&T, and more all in one application. Built for phone and tablet usage. 

Google Play Store 2017 Android Excellence Program Winner

TheVerge - “The fastest email app around...” 
Android Authority - “…useful features...great user interface…”
TechCrunch- “…like you’ve given the mail app an upgrade…” 
CNET- “…imposes order on an unruly inbox…” 

With Edison Mail you get:
• Price Alert - Get cash back on shopping! Enable Price Alert and Edison will alert you if your recent purchases dropped in price from retailers that offer price matching so you can ask for a refund for the difference.
• All Your Inboxes The Way You Want - Manage all your mail accounts, easily switch between inboxes, optional Focus Inbox moves your important mail up front.
• Closer to Inbox Zero - View all your subscriptions in a tab, unsubscribe from junk with a tap, bulk delete, block certain senders from messaging you again, easily block spam forever
• Privacy From Prying Eyes - The only email to automatically block read receipt tracking pixels without degrading the email experience
• Built-In AI Assistant - Easily search bills & receipts, attachments, travel, entertainment, and more without disturbing your email organization. Get real-time travel notifications about your flight plans. Check package statuses all in one folder. With our new Assistant, see your upcoming meetings, travel itinerary, bills due, smart unsubscribe suggestions, and more at a glance.
• Fewer Mistakes - Always undo send and AI-based smart reply options.
• Less Digging - A full search engine in your phone that allows you to search through all your folders quickly and seamlessly.
• Customizable Notifications - Personalize sound and vibration settings. Only get alerted for the mail you care to see.

Privacy By Design is Our Promise to Our Users 
We put privacy first in all the things we do at Edison Software. We never target you for ads and prevent other companies from tracking you when you use our app. We also believe in being transparent and giving you choices. Please read our Privacy Policy to ensure that you are familiar with our practices and business model and to learn how you can manage your data.

Please send us your feature requests and feedback at mailsupport@edison.tech.

Special thanks to everyone who rates us 5 stars, or leaves kudos! Your support means the world to our team!


Price Alert is available in the US.
AI-Assistant available in the US, UK, Australia, Canada, and India.
