comments: Wow! I'm so impressed! It was easy and it looks so, so professional...because you get pro results, seriously. I paid the $6.99 for premium bc Uber fees are more than that. So, this saved me a trip to CVS. I just hope it's accepted on the immigration website. Keep your fingers crossed.🙏🏾If not, you said I can get a refund so I'm excited to see the results.

Excellent step-by-step guide through staging, taking, and finalizing a photo for use with a passport or other official document. Ad-supported at each step or you can choose to pay to remove ads. Very easy to use this app to match whatever photo requirements you need to.

Worth the money! This app really helps you take a decent passport photo within the comfort of your own home. It advises that you should ask for someone else to take the photo for you (probably easier), but I was able to do this alone with the help of the delay button and a mirror... a stand for my phone, and some other jiggery pokery to help get myself and camera in the right position. Sounds harder than it was. The automatic background removal feature is absolutely brilliant! Great app.

Easy to handle and does a great Job... I totally recommend... After having used the app for over 3 months, I can safely say, it is one of the best Apps to edit digital photos for Passport size pictures. Easy to use and absolutely layman. No need for paying professional for simple edits

Well then you ask is not intuitive and for the amount of effort they put into building this app they could have taken it to the next level. That being said once you figure the app out, it works wonderfully and I could get the photos I needed including the ability to optimize and maximize the number of passport pictures on a single sheet a photo paper.

title: Degoo: 100 GB Cloud Storage
description:
Back up your data directly from your device!

Choose what you want to backup, like your photos or docs and we store it all securely in Degoo Cloud drive. Degoo allows you to bring all your photos, videos, music and documents anywhere. Store and share your files free forever with Degoo, the ultimate cloud drive for your phone and tablet. 


WHY USE DEGOO - FEATURES

• MOMENTS: Experience all your memories from your past. We use artificial intelligence to select the photos that matter the most to you. Whenever you open it you will find new photos you have not seen in a while. A gateway to recharging your digital life! 

• ZERO KNOWLEDGE ENCRYPTION: Our Top Secret feature uploads your files using zero knowledge encryption and spreads it across multiple continents (requires pro account). This military grade encryption ensures that no one else can access your data and that it is stored with maximum privacy and security. 

• AUTOMATIC: We detect when you snap a new photo with your camera or add some files and make sure your backup is always up to date. Never think about backup again! We backup, store and sync all your data for you automatically directly from your phone or tablet. 

• RELIABLE: At Degoo we store triple copies of each file to ensure they are always there when you need them. Just upload them into our mega secure storage explorer and access them whenever you like. 

• STREAMING SUPPORT: With our easy to use full screen stream player you can access all your videos and music streams in realtime without having to wait for the download to finish. 

• EARN EXTRA FREE GB: You can easily get more space by either watching an optional sponsored video or by upgrading to our pro account. 

• REMOTE ONLINE ACCESS: Keep all your data in the cloud and quickly access it from all your devices. Get instant access to all your office documents, like text docs, pdf, zip archives and notes wherever you are. Degoo lets you restore your files from your online storage space to any device in the world, all around the clock. 

• SIMPLE FILE EXPLORER: In My Files you can quickly list or search all your files in our explorer and use our easy file viewer to access and share your files and folders directly in the app. Keep all your information at your fingertips, store everything in your own folders and sync any time you want to fully back up your data. 

• SUPER EFFICIENT AND FAST: The app is very light-weight and uses minimum RAM, battery and CPU. Keep your memory space and power usage to more important work tasks and enjoy mega fast uploads. 

• AUTOMATIC LOGIN: Let our smart sign in assistant help you login to all your devices without having to use your keyboard or remember any password. 

• UNLIMITED DATA TRANSFER: Quickly send all your content across the Internet with our send file plugin, using the same military grade security as when storing your files. You can share as many files as you like to help you stay connected with your friends and colleagues and you will get a creative collaboration space of all the files you have sent from your phone. The files can be shared with all apps that support https URLs. 

• EASY TO USE: We have recently recreated our file manager from scratch. This new version has led to a much cleaner interface with a beautiful chrome finish and easier design, which makes it super easy to stay on top of your work tasks. Just drop all your files into Degoo and let us take care of the rest. 

• FIT 10 TIMES MORE PHOTOS (requires pro): Our photo storage maximizer mode enables you to fit up to 10 times more photos on your phone. Just enable the photo storage maximizer and Degoo automatically gives you more space on your SD card. If you need more than 100 GB you can upgrade to our affordable pro accounts. 


Need help? 
Contact our support via email: support@degoo.com or visit http://support.degoo.com we will do everything to keep you satisfied.
descriptionHTML:
Back up your data directly from your device!

Choose what you want to backup, like your photos or docs and we store it all securely in Degoo Cloud drive. Degoo allows you to bring all your photos, videos, music and documents anywhere. Store and share your files free forever with Degoo, the ultimate cloud drive for your phone and tablet.


WHY USE DEGOO - FEATURES

• MOMENTS: Experience all your memories from your past. We use artificial intelligence to select the photos that matter the most to you. Whenever you open it you will find new photos you have not seen in a while. A gateway to recharging your digital life!

• ZERO KNOWLEDGE ENCRYPTION: Our Top Secret feature uploads your files using zero knowledge encryption and spreads it across multiple continents (requires pro account). This military grade encryption ensures that no one else can access your data and that it is stored with maximum privacy and security.

• AUTOMATIC: We detect when you snap a new photo with your camera or add some files and make sure your backup is always up to date. Never think about backup again! We backup, store and sync all your data for you automatically directly from your phone or tablet.

• RELIABLE: At Degoo we store triple copies of each file to ensure they are always there when you need them. Just upload them into our mega secure storage explorer and access them whenever you like.

• STREAMING SUPPORT: With our easy to use full screen stream player you can access all your videos and music streams in realtime without having to wait for the download to finish.

• EARN EXTRA FREE GB: You can easily get more space by either watching an optional sponsored video or by upgrading to our pro account.

• REMOTE ONLINE ACCESS: Keep all your data in the cloud and quickly access it from all your devices. Get instant access to all your office documents, like text docs, pdf, zip archives and notes wherever you are. Degoo lets you restore your files from your online storage space to any device in the world, all around the clock.

• SIMPLE FILE EXPLORER: In My Files you can quickly list or search all your files in our explorer and use our easy file viewer to access and share your files and folders directly in the app. Keep all your information at your fingertips, store everything in your own folders and sync any time you want to fully back up your data.

• SUPER EFFICIENT AND FAST: The app is very light-weight and uses minimum RAM, battery and CPU. Keep your memory space and power usage to more important work tasks and enjoy mega fast uploads.

• AUTOMATIC LOGIN: Let our smart sign in assistant help you login to all your devices without having to use your keyboard or remember any password.

• UNLIMITED DATA TRANSFER: Quickly send all your content across the Internet with our send file plugin, using the same military grade security as when storing your files. You can share as many files as you like to help you stay connected with your friends and colleagues and you will get a creative collaboration space of all the files you have sent from your phone. The files can be shared with all apps that support https URLs.

• EASY TO USE: We have recently recreated our file manager from scratch. This new version has led to a much cleaner interface with a beautiful chrome finish and easier design, which makes it super easy to stay on top of your work tasks. Just drop all your files into Degoo and let us take care of the rest.

• FIT 10 TIMES MORE PHOTOS (requires pro): Our photo storage maximizer mode enables you to fit up to 10 times more photos on your phone. Just enable the photo storage maximizer and Degoo automatically gives you more space on your SD card. If you need more than 100 GB you can upgrade to our affordable pro accounts.


Need help?
Contact our support via email: support@degoo.com or visit http://support.degoo.com we will do everything to keep you satisfied.
summary: Store and share your files forever.

To make the app better for you, we update it on a regular basis. This update includes:

- Sharing feature improvements
- User Account UI improvements
- Get your best moments right away!
- Performance and UX improvements
- General bug fixes

Thank you for using Degoo!
comments: Had the problems with photo backups that others mention, but it seems to have been fixed over the last few updates (on my system anyway). Disappointed the desktop backup software has gone (still works and is available elsewhere). Other than that, it's a great backup system. 100gb for free is more than generous and new features appear quite often. There's a decent image search. Would be nice if it could play to Chromecast. It's my replacement for Google Photos now they charge so much.

[Original comment on 18/4/20] I cant download my uploaded file neither from phone or from pc. Whats the point of uploading if you cant even download been trying for weeks nothing has been fixed. Wouldn't recommend anyone to use this app since you can't download uploaded stuff later. [As of 2/8/21] I was promised on email by your representative that I will be able to download but I still can't. Now it says I need to watch an Ad to download my stuff, even after doing that, download fails.

Had been working great UNTIL today, when uploading takes up so much time and the pics are still not uploaded. Also, why isn't there a provision to lock the website with a passcode like the mobile application?
Love the App. Has definitely been a boon in using the free extra space. I would like to recommend a more unique and better way to organize the files. Maybe even have a folder system. 🥂 Cheers

I have never given a below 4 stars rating. Seriously what is the point of uploading when you limit the number of phones that can be linked and you deleted my photos attached to the respective phones when I need to unlink them. Great.

title: Wondr Note - Pretty notes, lists, countdown & more
description:
Wondr Note is a creative & unique take on notes & lists. We asked ourselves, "Why can't notes be pretty & useful?". And so we created Wondr Note in the hopes of providing ultimate convenience, productivity & visual appeal. 

From poems to shopping lists to travel expenses to errands checklist. Plan/add errands and todo lists to your day. Countdown to a big event or build an inspiration board for your next project. Keep your notes, lists, mood boards & accounts here. Easily categorize and search through titles and items. Add items to your agendas & customize the app with themes. We try our best to keep it simple, clean & pretty.


▌STUFF YOU COULD DO ON WONDR NOTE

✓ Make a shopping list for tomorrow
✓ Add widgets of your important lists, agendas or countdowns
✓ Add a checklist of your errands & chores in daily agendas
✓ Make simple expense accounts of an outing or trip you just returned from
✓ Add all your favourite recipes with a picture and steps in a numbered todo list
✓ Write short stories
✓ Keep diary entries with an image each
✓ Take down bulleted lecture notes and lists
✓ Make a todo list for assignments or homework
✓ Make a countdown of days to your examinations
✓ Create a board with your wishlist of things you want to buy or do
✓ Categorize and color all the above
✓ And many more…! 

▌FEATURES

★ Notes
★ Lists with options for checklist, numbering & bullets
★ Basic accounts
★ Mood Boards of images with description
★ Day countdown
★ Widgets (Notes, lists, countdowns, quick-add & today's agenda)
★ Autosaving
★ Tags(pick or add your own)
★ Themes
★ Backgrounds (pick or add your own)
★ Share notes to your friends or apps
★ Share info from other apps and save as a note

Add daily agenda

★ Add items from lists & notes into daily agendas
★ Add new items to agendas

Themes, backgrounds & customization

★ Choose from over 20+ themes free and 20+ more premium
★ Beautifully themed throughout the app according to your selection
★ Customize and create your own premium theme 
★ Add color to your notes, lists, accounts and countdown
★ Add a feature image to your notes, lists, accounts and countdown
★ Choose from over 20+ backgrounds free and 20+ more premium
★ Add your own background

Other features

★ Drag & drop features to manually organize your notes, lists & more
★ Categorize all items & easily search for them
★ Pick list or grid view
★ Share notes to your friends or apps
★ Share info from other apps and save as a note

Privacy Policy

★ Only you own, and have access to all your data
★ Your data is stored in the internal storage of your device inaccessible by other applications
★ We do not collect or store any data
★ Backup & restore your data in Google Drive (Beta)

Coming Soon

★ Calendar
★ Font customization

recentChanges:
An awesome new update for you guys! With all your valuable feedback, we have added more features and improved design as well as usability!

comments: I have used Color Note since 2017 and this is so much better. It's cuter and a lot more functional, and you can add tags to keep up with everything, kind of like hashtags. You can add pictures, agendas, lists, and even keep track of finances, as well as a lot of customization features at your disposal. I had it crash on me but support was responsive, however I recommend to people to back up often just in case it crashes. The customer service is awesome, and I will recommend this app to my folks!

I honestly don't usually write reviews but the latest update was so good that I have to sing it's praises. The slicker UI makes navigating the app, which already was good, a breeze. The new agenda features which let me plan ahead, as well as the UI making it a pleasure to use, has made me switch to using this as my main ToDo list. Fantastic! I applaud the team behind such a wonderful app. Keep up the good work!

Really cute note taking app! It's a little confusing at first but well made. It would be nice to have a feature to toggle dark mode/light mode from within the app though. Also, maybe an easier way to delete notes from the main screen! Keep up the good work!

It's still a new app, so features are limited, but I really like it! The functionality it does have works well and I really appreciate the visual customization. Can't wait to see what else the devs have in store for this gem!

Wish I didn't pay for premium. The widgets don't work,I can open the app and make agendas but I can't put it on my homescreen because the widget doesn't work for me. Smh, it's too bad because it's cute af and I would love to be able to use it.

title: Alarm Clock Xtreme: Alarm, Reminders, Timer (Free)
description:
Wake up gently to your favorite music and avoid accidentally disabling your alarm with Alarm Clock Xtreme Free! Our smart alarm clock includes features that prevent excessive snoozing and get you out of bed.

Join over 50,000,000 people who have already installed this app!
Download the redesigned Alarm Clock Xtreme Free (with timer and stopwatch) NOW

Alarm Clock Xtreme is more than your basic alarm clock. It’s highly customizable, allowing you to wake up in whatever way works for you.
♪ Set your morning alarm to slowly increase in volume and wake you up gently
♪ Use the extra-large snooze button to prevent you from accidentally pressing ‘dismiss’
♪ Jump-start your brain by solving math problems to snooze/dismiss the alarm
♪ Decrease snooze interval time and set a maximum number of snoozes. Perfect if you are a sound sleeper.
♪ Easily deactivate your alarm if you wake up before it goes off.
♪ Use Quick Alarm to speedily set a non-recurring alarm.

FEATURES
Alarm — Personalize your alarm to never oversleep again! Our alarm clock offers the following dismiss options: screen button, volume buttons, power button, or shaking your phone.
Quick Alarm — Set a non-recurring alarm in just a few taps.
Upcoming alarm notification — Easily deactivate your alarm if you wake up before it goes off.
Timer — Enter required time and start timer. You can set as many timers as you want for activities like exercise, cooking, and more!
Stopwatch — Use our simple and reliable stopwatch to keep track of split/lap time and total time down to 1/100 of a second.
My day — Display the most important information you need when you wake up, such as the day’s weather forecast and upcoming events synced from your calendar.
Reminders – Never forget an important task or event again thanks to our newest feature!

ALARM RINGTONE OPTIONS
Ringtone — Default ringtones from your device.
Music on device — Any music downloaded onto your device can be used as your alarm clock ringtone.
Online Radio — Choose from many popular online radio stations, or add your own if your favorite isn’t already on the list.
None — Don’t want any sound? Wake up using only vibrations.

HOW TO AVOID ACCIDENTALLY DISABLING YOUR ALARM
Choose one of the puzzles available in Alarm Clock Xtreme!
Puzzle appears only after you hit the dismiss button.

PUZZLE
Math — Solve math problems. You get to choose the difficulty level: Easiest, Easy, Medium, Hard, Hardest. If solving one problem isn’t enough, increase the number of problems from 1 up to 5. 
Password — To turn off the alarm, you must retype the password that appears on the screen. 
QR/Barcode — Scan any QR code to add it into your code library. Print the QR code and place it far from your bed. When your alarm goes off, you’ll have to scan the QR code to dismiss the alarm.
App Launch — Choose an app on your device that will launch after you turn off your alarm.
None — If you trust yourself to not hit dismiss or snooze when your alarm goes off, then no puzzle is needed.

With these puzzles you will never oversleep again.

Reminders (NEW!)
-    Customize each reminder with name, icon, or ring tone
-    Set repeat intervals: annually, monthly, weekly, daily, hourly, or several times a day
-    Choose a priority for each reminder: decide how urgent each reminder is, and how you want to be reminded


** Important Note: your phone must be on for the alarm to work **
Download Alarm Clock Xtreme Free (with timer and stopwatch) NOW!

Alarm Clock Xtreme Free features:
✔ Music alarm – choose your favorite music
✔ Gentle alarm with increasing volume
✔ Wake-up check
✔ Quick alarms
✔ Upcoming alarm notifications
✔ Random song alarm
✔ Solve math problem to snooze/disable
✔ Extra-large snooze button
✔ Nap alarm with countdown timer
✔ Decreasing snooze interval after every snooze
✔ Set a maximum number of snoozes
✔ Auto-snooze
✔ Auto-dismiss
✔ Built-in Stopwatch
✔ Built-in Timer
✔ Reminders

comments: Been using for years and was happy to pay to eliminate ads. Allows you to use any audio file as an alarm, but unlike most others, you can set the duration. You can have it repeat the alarm sound until you take the action to stop it or you can set an alarm duration for as short as one second. That means I can set a chime that only plays only once at a certain time every day that reminds me to do something instead of having to silence a repeating alarm sound. That feature alone is worth 5 stars!

Used to be a great app, but they keep adding these cutesy things, like a screan that tells me 'good night' that I have to close instead of just closing the app when I hit the 'Dismiss' button. At least give us a way to turn off these new things when you add them. Or better yet, let us turn them on if we want them. I've used this app for 6 or 7 years now, but I'm now thinking there has to be something better out there.

I've used this app for several years. I have anywhere from 5-12 alarms I use any given day. The most recent update is forcing the "my dashboard" to open after every dismissed alarm. I'm already clearing our ads. Now I have another wasted step to my day. I cannot get it to go away and have turned off all settings. I used to love this app but I'm about to switch to another.

I have been using this app for about 10 years now. Recent updates have been painful. I have been taking them into my stride. One of the major issues I have is this: I have 3 or 4 alarms set at the same time. When the alarm notification appears and when I dismiss the topmost alarm - I don't see the remaining alarm notifications..and that is dangerous! If this is not fixed soon, I will be looking for another alarm application.

This was my favorite. I have to wake up at 5am to take a pill but then sleep until I need to get up. The new day popup with a "good morning " message blocks the next alarm and I haven't dismissed it on a few occasions which has been terrible. A previous version had allowed me to turn this off but not now. What happened? This has happened to me multiple times. I have a Samsung S8+ and now upgraded to a Samsung S10+. The steps that I have observed on the S8+ (and caused me to be late to work a couple of times) are: 1. I create two alarm clock options: 5am and 6:30am 2. The 5am alarm clock goes off and I dismiss it 3. It displays the "Good Morning" message. 4a. If I don't dismiss the "Good morning" message closing with the tiny x on the popup after the advertisements are also closed, the 6:30 am alarm doesn't go off. 4b. If I dismiss the Good morning message from the 5am alarm, at 6:30 the second alarm will go off as anticipated. When I discovered this, I found that under Settings> My Day Dashboard, there was a way to turn off the feature entirely. Now that I upgraded to the S10+, the setting is gone. All I can configure is what shows up on the screen. I just tested this on the S10+ with two alarms one minute from each other leaving the Good morning message up, and the second alarm did go off, but I am nervous to depend on it because I have seen it fail. Thank you so much for taking the time to reply. I used to see the two options for "Show after standard alarm" and "Show after quick alarm" on a previous version on my Samsung S8+, but they are gone since this last update and I tried to run it on my Samsung S10+. When I went back to my S8+, it is now as with the S10+ too. I only have two entries "My calendar events" and "Weather forecast". I have version 7.0.1 70002976 and I am running on Android version 11. One UI version 3.1, security patch level July 1, 2021

title: Tasks: to do list with sync, reminders & calendar
description:
Tasks is a beautifully simple, free to do list, task list and reminder app that will help keep your busy life organized everyday.  No matter who you are or what you do Tasks can help!

Get started in no time, quickly and easily add new tasks as you think of them using quick add, via a homescreen shortcut or even create from another app by sharing with Tasks.

A beautifully simple todo list app
Tasks is a simple todo list app that emphasises simplicity and ease of use.  Whether you want a project list, grocery list or you just have lots of things to remember Tasks is built for you.  With Tasks you can build powerful lists, colour code them and then manage them with intuitive gestures like drag and drop to re-prioritise or swiping to delete.

Use reminders so that to dos can be delivered at the right time and with actionable notifications there is no need to open the app, simply mark a task as done or snooze for later.

Have your say
Tasks is designed to be beautifully simple to use.  This app is in active development with the most popular feature requests / suggestions added.  So if you want to shape the future of Tasks just give us your feedback.

Note for Reviewers
If there is a feature you would like or you require an issue to be resolved please email me and I will gladly help.

5 Antares Close

recentChanges:
Additions from the community
⭐️ NEW 1x1 list widget
⭐️ UPDATE minor improvements and bug fixes
comments: This is a simple no BS task-organization app. I have had this app for three years, and the only real gripe I had with it was that you cannot add tasks from your computer. Seeing as I spend most of my time behind a monitor, I figured I would use something that allowed me to do this. Now that tasks is available as a computer app, i truly have little else to say. Perhaps a Google assistant incorporation would be a worthwhile improvement.

Out of all the To-do list apps that I've ever used, and I used a lot of 'em, I'd say this is the best one. It's simple. It's slick. It got all the features that you'll ever need and more. Sublists combined with filtered list is a god send. And unless you want to synchronize to multiple devices, you got here an ad-less, highly customizable, highly functional, feature rich, heck of a To-do list app for the very low, direct from the manufacturer, specially discounted price of FREE.

UPDATE: 8/2/2021 This app is really easy to use. I like that I can have separate screens for different types of tasks. I can use any ringtone for the alarm/alert feature, which is really handy, because I work in a loud environment. Any functionality you can possibly think of is built right into the app, and it's highly customisable. I used to have an amazing memory but now that I'm older I'm finding I can't rely on it like I once did. This app is keeping my feet out of the fire! Thanks!

Very easy to use! You can create "To Do Lists" and probably other things. I created monthly and daily to-do lists. Very easy to add to and delete from. To mark of completed items, you just touch the circle.

allows different categories within one list, each displaying the number of tasks completed out of the total at the top, and sub lists within each category that can be expanded and collapsed as needed. tasks can be created with as much or as little detail as you would like. exactly what I was looking for to plan a camping trip!

title: SuperDisplay - Virtual Monitor & Graphics Tablet
description:
SuperDisplay turns your Android phone or tablet into a high-performance USB display with pressure support for Windows 10.

Here's how to get started:

① Download SuperDisplay from Google Play.
② Download the Windows driver from https://superdisplay.app
③ Connect your device to your PC via USB or Wi-Fi.


Second monitor
SuperDisplay turns your Android device into a portable USB display for your Windows 10 PC. Duplicate or extend your screen simply by plugging in your phone or tablet.

Superb performance
A laggy display is as good as no display. SuperDisplay was built with performance in mind, and we’re not afraid to show it. SuperDisplay works at 60 fps for the optimal drawing and mirroring experience. Try the app for free to see for yourself.

Pressure-sensitivity
Turn your Android device into a graphics tablet and use apps like Adobe Photoshop® through it. SuperDisplay supports pressure-sensitive styluses like the Samsung S Pen making it ideal for digital art and other creative work.

Adobe Photoshop® is a registered trademark of Adobe in the United States and other countries.

Here's how to get started:

① Download SuperDisplay from Google Play.
② Download the Windows driver from https://superdisplay.app
③ Connect your device to your PC via USB or Wi-Fi.


Second monitor
SuperDisplay turns your Android device into a portable USB display for your Windows 10 PC. Duplicate or extend your screen simply by plugging in your phone or tablet.

Superb performance
A laggy display is as good as no display. SuperDisplay was built with performance in mind, and we’re not afraid to show it. SuperDisplay works at 60 fps for the optimal drawing and mirroring experience. Try the app for free to see for yourself.

Pressure-sensitivity
Turn your Android device into a graphics tablet and use apps like Adobe Photoshop® through it. SuperDisplay supports pressure-sensitive styluses like the Samsung S Pen making it ideal for digital art and other creative work.

Adobe Photoshop® is a registered trademark of Adobe in the United States and other countries.
summary: Turn your device into a portable USB display and graphics tablet for Windows 10

comments: This is honestly an amazing app! If you're looking for an app to just plug your tablet into your laptop and use it as another monitor this is perfect. As a programmer this is incredibly useful for me. There is a little delay between moving windows around, but really not too noticeable. 100% would recommend this app

Can't say enough good things about SuperDisplay. It's PERFECT. This turns my Galaxy S7+ into a USB monitor for ny laptop via USB-C and it's flawless. It comes on when I plug in the USB and just works. Performace runs rings around any wireless solution. I easily use the tablet now as an Adobe Premiere monitor screen, a palate monitor for photoshop and even for netflix and video players windowed while I work. This is one of those apps I use every day and never want to be without again! Great!

Very well made App! I spent nearly a week looking for a way to use my tablet as a second moitor on my PC. All of the other apps that I tried before this one were just awful and very limited. This app however, does everything I need it to do and a lot more, plus very low latency in most cases, even when connected through WiFi at my tablets full resolution, and 120Hz; plus no studder!!! YMMV, I have a fairly high end PC and a Samsung s7+ tablet, but I highly recommend giving this one a try :)

Much better than expected. Was searching for a wacom alternative. This app transforms my Samsung s7+ into an amazing drawing tablet! 2D or 3D (e.g. zBrush). It has a very low display response latency. Personally, I am very sensitive to screen delays higher than 15ms (33ms at 30Hz). After installing the SuperDisplay Windows 10 driver on the pc it just worked flawlessly when I connected it via USB. My tablet was recognized as an additional display and supported all possible resolutions. Great!

Thank you soo much for making this app 😊. If want to make animation , graphic designing etc. If you are going to buy a graphics tablet a good graphics tablet with a large size will not be less than 33 dollars ( rs2500 inr) so if you download this app you get 3 days free trial and a lifetime payment of rs 800 inr ( 10 dollars ) so this app will never dissapoint you . Really Really recommended to download . Go ahead with no fear and download it . 😃👍.

title: HabitNow - Daily Routine, Habits and To-Do List
description:
Keep your routine and tasks organized as you build strong habits!
Now you can manage your tasks and keep track of your habits at the same time. Just enter your routine in HabitNow and record your progress everyday.

Define habits according to your needs
Create different habits and to-dos, set daily, weekly or even monthly goals.
Fix your schedule, goals, priorities and organize your activities in different categories. 

Set up reminders and alarms to achieve all your daily goals!
To never forget your scheduled activities, HabitNow provides a highly customizable reminder system.

Build strong habits, improve every day!
Create streaks of success for your habits and motivate yourself tracking up your progress as time goes by.
Check your schedule in the app calendar and create a journal using daily notes! 

Track your progress in an advanced way
Know your performance in detail and analyze your progress on every habit that you record. HabitNow provides many different charts and statistics.

Customize your experience as you like!
Set your style with a wide range of themes and icons.

Discover the app Widgets
Consult and track your daily progress in an easy way! 

Reach your goals and win medals!
HabitNow can be helpful if you want to quit smoking, exercise or follow a healthy diet. Just focus on something you want to improve in your life and make it a habit!

Protect your data privacy with HabitNow lock screen. 

Create backups to keep your progress safe and export them to other devices

Be more productive!
Organize your to-do list and track your habits in only one place.
Download HabitNow and stop procrastinating!

comments: Everything I was ever looking for in a habit tracking application. Simple, elegant and intuitive. I would have paid the premium price just for the basic application and I would change nothing about it. I hope the UI/UX is not altered as well as the app not bloated in the name of providing features. Grateful and Great Job everyone who was a part of this :)

Great app, although it lacks some key features! I will update this review to 5 stars once something close comes out because this app is definitely one of my favorite apps so far. So 2 wishes: 1. I wish there was an option to custom order habits! 2. Wish to better organize categories. Yes there is the option to order by categories, but organizing by colors is extremely clunky. I can see the categories tab being edited so you can drag and reorder categories to what you want

I really like the interface. But one important thing that i feel missing is you can not share your progress with your partner. I won't speak for all but i guess a person to compete with or to follow along does help in completing the habit and task. Is this in development? Or is there anytime soon we would be seeing it ?

This is one of my favourite and most used apps. The new UI was a bit of a shock at first but I'm quickly getting used to it. It's still clear, simple and easy to use and looks really nice. I have one problem now that I did not have before: the font is way too small. I have to increase it drastically in my phone's settings - and then, of course, it's huge in pretty much every other app. That makes HabitNow hard to use for me. Please make the font bigger again or offer in-app font size options.

Good UX design. Quick and easy to add a task to my todo list. I like how the plus button and the option to select a new task are right by my thumb, I don't have to click all over the screen. I'd be interested to see more statistics and features in the settings. I like how minimal the app is, so if they add anything I hope they don't put it in a place that will bloat it, or require extra steps. I like the quick and easy UX. Happily purchased the pro version to support good app development.

title: File Manager
description:
File Manager + is an easy and powerful file explorer for Android devices. It’s free, fast and full-featured. Because of its simple UI, it’s extremely easy to use. You can easily manage storages on your device, NAS(Network-attached storage), and cloud storages. What’s more, you can find how many files & apps you have on your device at a glance immediately after opening the app.
 
It supports every file management action (open, search, navigate directory, copy and paste, cut, delete, rename, compress, decompress, transfer, download, bookmark, and organize) for various file formats including media and apk.
 
Major locations and functions of File Manager Plus are as following:

• Main Storage / SD card / USB OTG : You can manage all files and folders on both your internal storage and external storage.

• Downloads / New files / Images / Audio / Videos / Documents : Your files and folders are automatically sorted by their types and characteristics so that you can easily find what you are looking for.

• Apps : You can see and manage all applications installed on your local device.

• Cloud / Remote : You can access your cloud storage and also remote/shared storage like NAS and FTP server. (Cloud storage: Google Drive™, OneDrive, Dropbox, Box, and Yandex)

• Access from PC : You can access your android device storage from PC using FTP(File Transfer Protocol).

• Storage analysis : You can analyze local storages to clean up useless files. You can find out which files and apps take up the most space.

• Internal image viewer / Internal music player/ Internal text editor : You can choose to use built-in utilities for faster and better performance.

comments: I strongly recommend this app to anyone accustomed to IOS and trying to get used to Android. It will do all the things IOS does behind the scenes or through the iTunes interface. Until I found this app I was lost. Also it has a very efficient home screen that displays all the categories of files on your phone with very nice looking icons. For anyone using a laptop to add files to their mobile device and moving them to where they need to reside this is a great app!

Just a "cool" program. I did not expect anything like this. Thought out everything to the smallest detail. DEVELOPERS THANK YOU VERY MUCH. recommend for download and installation. It works very smartly. The functionality is complete. Works with memory cards, supports usb OTG, works great with "cloud" services ..... I don't even know what it can't ... In my opinion, the best program in its profile .... Very intuitive. All the stars are YOU developers ...

I purchased the "One Time Payment" version. I have it installed on my One-Plus 8T and love it. I also have on my Samsung Tablet and I'm disappointed. The one feature that I find most useful is the ability to "Add to Home Screen" function. This works great on the One-Plus but the option is not there on the Samsung Tablet. I would return the Premium version if I could.

I don't normally do reviews on apps, the app has to be impressive for me to leave a review. This app is awesome. It's easy to understand, easy to navigate and find your document or pictures, etc. No ads in your face so it leaves you alone and I love it a lot. It's never let me down and it doesn't bug me. And it allows me to DELETE my pictures as opposed to google photos. This is a great app. And that is why I am leaving this 5 star review.

Awesome app, makes it very easy and convenient to find things if you're not as technological or tech challenged like alot of people are to find certain types of files especially with a search box right above and gives you a vast array of results to your search not just exactly for what you have searched for. For some people this way works great and for others not so much, but for me I love this app and if there were more developed similarly to it I would be the first to download them.

title: Private Notepad - safe notes & lists
description:
Private Notepad is a secure notepad app that allows you to create secret notes and reminders and to organize data in lists (to do list, checklist, shopping list). Store your photos in a private vault, backup your data to the secure cloud and sync it across your devices. Text and photos are securely encrypted. Create safe notes with this notepad!

Features:
- Offline access: access your notes without internet connection
- Checklist: plan your day with to do list, make shopping list, grocery list
- Autosave: the notepad will save your notes automatically while you edit them
- Password protection: protect your notes and checklist with password, PIN-code or pattern
- Folders: organize your notes using folders
- Photo vault: add photos and images to your secure notes
- Encryption: your notes and photos are always stored encrypted with AES standard which is used in banking systems
- Intruder's photo: the notepad will notify you about wrong password attempts and will show you a photo of the intruder
- Fingerprint access: open your notes and checklists with one touch 
- Labels: group your notes and to do list with labels to find them easily
- Colors: make your notepad more colorful - paint your notes with your favorite colors
- Cloud sync: backup and sync your notes across your devices using the secure cloud
- Reminders: add reminders to your notes to remember important things
- Undo button: undo last changes while you edit a note or to do list
- Data hiding: enable hiding the most critical notes if someone tries to break into your private vault
- Self-destruction: enable destroying the most critical notes if someone tries to break into your private vault
- Selective protection: protect only particular notes or to do list with password
- PDF and TXT files: export your notes to PDF and TXT files or convert the existing file to your notes
- UI themes: select from several notepad themes for a custom look
- Support: FAQ will help you to work with notes, checklist and reminders. Also you can always contact support if you have some questions

Permissions
- Camera: the notepad uses it for taking pictures of intruders
- Contacts: required to backup notes to  your Google Drive 
- Storage: required for exporting notes to the phone memory
- Network access and Internet: the notepad uses it for for syncing notes with cloud
- Billing service: required for purchasing premium version 
- Fingerprint hardware: required for the fingerprint access
- Preventing notepad from sleeping: required for disabling the sleep mode in some situations

comments: Update: The app is still good, but updating it seems to affect the labels. Previously, you could add a single note as as many notes as you wantrd, but now, you can only have a note on 5 labels. Really annoying if you have a note that fits in multiple things. i like it its good for keeping all your pin numbers, codes pictures , receipts and more thank you mikelove

comments: Sync great with my Google, Yahoo, and Outlook calendar. So far, very happy. I wish it would sync Reminders so I emailed the developer and received a quick reply that Google does not offer developers the API needed to sync Reminders. So I trust when Google allows it, they will implement it. Well worth using.... Keep up the great app and support... Updated: been using now for a year and a half and very happy. sync across my calendars consistently. I don't even think about it. It's automatic..

I was using this app for about a year now. Had an update on my android, and it must have erased one calendar. The new version isn't anything like the one I had. Really disappointed. I'm not re-editing my review. It was the truth at the time. And guessing you didn't even post it? Why have reviews if your not going to post them, for how the person feels, I also pay for premium. Might stop that now. I also can't change the font on my phone. Can on my desktop???

Five stars just feels like too much for this app. Five stars means perfect right? This is an amazing Calander app. Absolutely no complaints. I have it downloaded on 4 devices. I couldn't get by without it. If I were not so literal and techinical, I'd give it five stars, but i'm me

Exceptional calendar. I paint and decorate and this is one of the few apps that allows me to see blocked weekly bookings while in the yearly viewing mode. Which is main reason I don't use Google Calendar. The onecal Windows app is also even better and allows greater adjustments and functionality. Sync is also very reliable between all devices. I use windows, chrome os and Android. Marvellous. Thanks for the hard work and keep it up! You're making my life easier! 👍

I love the calendar. It's very straightforward and has all the options I need! They update regularly with new features which so far have always been helpful. It continues to be the calendar I check most regularly because of its straightforwardness.

title: MobiDrive
description:
MobiDrive is the secure cloud storage ensuring the files that matter to you are always by your side. From its powerful file conversion and management options, to its cross-platform and file-sharing capabilities, let’s have a look at everything MobiDrive has to offer.

Safe & Practical Storage

- 5 GB of free cloud storage that can be upgraded to up to 1 TB (1000 GB).
- Sync, Store or Download any file and folder in seconds.
- Backup local photos and videos automatically.

In-Depth File Management

- Work with all major document or multimedia file types.
- Convert files to hundreds of supported formats. (Premium feature)
- Enjoy automatic content collection by file type - Pictures, Video, Music, Documents.
- Use dedicated sections for recently accessed files (Recent Files).
- Manage deleted files in the special Bin section.
- Track the changes made to your files with each file’s Version History.
- 30 days of File Protection - Each file stored in the Bin will be there for 30 days before being removed. This includes access to each file’s Version Histories for up to 30 days back.

On-The-Go & Sharing Capabilities

- Sync files cross-platform to the Web version of MobiDrive. Windows & iOS versions coming soon!
- Share files and folders as an attachment or using a handy Download link.
- Keep an eye on shared files with the ‘Shared by me’ and ‘Shared with me’ sections.
- Keep a file ‘Offline’ to use it when you don’t have an internet connection.

DO MORE WITH PREMIUM 

Get the full range of MobiDrive capabilities by upgrading to Premium and enjoy these awesome features:

Up to 1 TB of Storage - Keep your local storages clean and your files safe with up to 1 TB (1000 GB) of cloud space.

Convert Files in 1200+ Formats - Don’t let file formats limit you. Convert all major document or multimedia file types.

180 Days of File Protection - Work with deleted files in the Bin and manage Version Histories for up to 180 days. 

Cross-Platform OfficeSuite Premium - Enjoy full Premium access to OfficeSuite versions on all platforms (Android, Windows PC & iOS).

• Thumbnails, size and numbers of items now shown next to device folders in Backup settings.

comments: I can't access my drive and failed to sign in. In any device. Fix it please and i will edit my review
15gb free account available but upgrades available. Sound & stable. So far so good.

This drive may be my saving grace. My ex has hacked my phone, my computer, all Gmail's, all my online accounts, my domain and my Google workspace. I found this drive, installed it, I opened it and lo and behold there was the information; code, apps, copies of my operating system but he erased it all and I don't know how to get it back does anyone know? the Drive is incredible. Hats off to the Developers! I'm sorry to use rating your app as an opportunity to help myself, truly.
Haven't used it. Seems str8 forward but it's 5gb free not 15gb as someone said. Challenge is how does mobidrive compete or offer anything 'unique' than so many competitors?
Great shortcut to file commander files and keeps you upto date with storage options

title: Family Shared Calendar: FamCal
description:
FamCal - a shared family calendar app, is designed for family connection. Combine calendars, events, tasks, notes, contacts and birthday reminders in one place so that you can easily keep everyone in sync and organized.

FAMILY MEMBERS
- Adult members with email addresses
- Child members without email addresses
- Color code events with members' colours

FAMILY CALENDAR
- Share events between couples, moms, dads and children or even whole family
- Add or edit events that everyone in the group can see
- Set reminder to notice someone
- Both calendar and agenda view

SHARE LISTS & ASSIGN TASKS
- Share grocery or shopping list & more
- Create task lists and to-dos

FAMILY NOTES
- Share notes or jot down a moment
- Unlimited notes to share with family
- Leave comments to each memo

STAY CONNECTED & IN SYNC
FamCal is a shared schedule family planner, you can organize your calendar, tasks and notes at everywhere. Access with any devices, works on both Android and iOS platforms. The whole group shares one account, so login with your own email address and a shared password.

All the functions listed above are basic, we also offer an ad-free version with many additional features(available as a subscription)
- Text month view
- Shared contacts
- Birthday Tracker
- Anniversary Tracker
- Export Schedule

Payment models for Premium Subscription:
- $4.99/month
- $9.99/quarter
- $23.99/year
Please note the subscription is automatically renewed unless you choose to cancel the subscription at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. 

Family Calendar Planner App - FamCal is great for family, group or anyone who needs to stay organized together. You can schedule together, achieve projects together. There is no limit in events, tasks and notes, you can create as many as you need.

Permissions Overview:
1. Calendar: FamCal needs this permission to read events from local calendars
2. Contacts: FamCal needs this permission to read contact from local device when you choose to import a contact
3. Location: FamCal needs this permission to get your location when you add an event with location info
4. Storage: FamCal needs this permission to read photos from Gallery when you choose to upload a photo to a memo or write photos to Gallery when you choose to download photos from memos

We're glad to hear your feedback. If you have any problems or suggestions please send a mail to famcal.a@appxy.com, you’ll get a response in a short time.

comments: Astonishingly useful - the free app is very helpful, options to upgrade are not intrusive and don't bother you like some apps. Same with the ads, they're really well placed to stay visible, but not in the way. We're using the free version for a few months before we upgrade to get a feel for it, but so far it's been amazingly helpful keeping us organized and always coordinated. Since I travel, it helps me avoid traveling over important family dates :)

I got this app when I was diagnosed with cancer. Because of the number of appointments I had I need something where I could put this on one calendar and it would propagate to several people. This app is awesome and worked so well. It made our lives so much easier.

Our family has been using FAMCAL for years. It works well but I have always wished it would finally be available for PC and Mac computers. I'm in the military and work in a building where I cannot bring my phone inside and have to duplicate effort and find work arounds to keep track family calendar events. That disconnect is finally getting to be unworkable. I'll be migrating the whole family over to Cozi Gold because I can access it on my home & work computers and our phones. I hate to do this because I actually prefer FAMCAL's interface and functionality. I know you can run an Android emulator like Bluestacks but not everyone in my family is that tech savvy.
I really enjoy this app it is great for everyone to see what is going on. I really wish you could import other app calendars into it so I don't have to add multiple events in.
Great app. Would have given 5 stars except the home screen widgets sometimes don't update automatically until sync is manually pressed and/or the app is manually opened.

title: Do It Now: RPG To Do List. Habit Tracker. Planner
description:
Organize your life with Do It Now - fantastical to do list which helps you to add game elements into your everyday tasks, make schedule, add daily reminders and organize your life with built-in skills, characteristics and level ups.

🎮 Gamify your things to do (gtd)
With our reminders app you will get virtual copy of yourself with be able to track your skills, characteristics and statistics. Every task can be bound to skills and characteristics. When task is performed in real life - your virtual hero will get skills and characteristics increased, gain additional experience (XP) and could level up life.

🧠 Self improvement
Track personal growth in different areas with customizable characteristics. Increase your everyday productivity by creating flexible system with skills. Basic sets already added to organizer.
Gamify your routine to do list and improve yourself, your life and virtual RPG character with goal tracker. His skills and abilities will grow with yours. Make him more powerful and become more productive.

📅 Handy calendar
Get overview on plans for months, weeks or use a day planner, agenda planner, schedule planner. Find most suitable time to schedule your tasks with calendar planner. Stay as productive as you can with this reminder app and to do wunderlist! View the business calendar in grid format or use daily planner, weekly planner, time tracker. Enhance your time management.

🔔 Sleek reminders
Our calendar app can remind you about critical tasks with notifications. Add up to 5 notifications to each task.

📘 Productivity organization
Organize your tasks in groups like in trello, taskrabbit, habitica, ticktick, habitbull, any do to separate different types. Keep it all organized and know what to do in daily to do list app free.
Use groups as to-do list, check list, reading list, bucket list, wishlist, all the lists to do! Add notes to any goals.

🔄 Sync across your devices
Your tasks will sync within cloud or Dropbox so that you can view and manage them wherever you are for better goal achieving with task manager.
Or just save your entire progress to file on your device.

⚙️ Flexible tasks setup
Productive habit tracker allows to add really flexible tasks. Setup custom repetitions (daily, weekly, weekdays, or monthly todoist), infinite repeats, finish date\time, difficulty\importance\fear, auto-fail or auto-skip on overdue, bind negative and positive skills, combine tasks in groups, add subtasks and much-much more. Prioritize goals and focus on the what really matters to do it tomorrow. Also lots of icons included to customize your tasks. Make goal setting easy.

📈 Statistics
Overview your progress with fancy charts. Use characteristics and skills charts to reveal your strong and weak sides. Customize your dashboard to show daily success charts with tasks, gold and experience.

👍 Habits
Generate useful habits. You can habitify any task, just enable habit generation for it. Use Do It Now as productivity app to generate any habit as in RPG game!

💰 Rewards system
Get gold from performed tasks and buy self-assigned rewards. E.g. you can add reward "Watch a movie" with 100 gold, buy it and indeed watch a movie in real life as a reward for hard work!

😎 Achievements
Increase you motivation with achievements. You can create your own achievement and bound them to tasks, skills or characteristics.

🎨 Themes
Change app appearance with custom themes. Our task tracker app has a lot of them!

🧩 Great widgets
Get easy access to your tasks and statistics by adding a checklist widget to your home screen. There are various sizes and types. Choose one that you like the most.

Maintain your daily motivation and develop your virtual self to make promotion and improvement in real life.

---
Connect with us at:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DoItNowApp
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DoItNowRPG
Email: support@do-it-now.app

🌟 Icon selection: icon names and search
🌟 First day of the week throughout the app now depends on selected language
🌟 Other fixes and improvements
comments: I was very excited for this app to help schedule my day or build to do like lists and set some goals. The app is not super user friendly. If there was any constructive criticism I could add is it would be very helpful if there was a database to get settings achievements, tasks, and rewards out of instead of having to build everything yourself. Also a guideline on how to build things properly with exp and coins. (How much for what tasks).

Really handy and fun way to make to-do lists. I do have a feature request. It would be nice if the inventory of items in possession was separate from the list of all created items. This would make it easier to see what I have in inventory at the moment. Thanks for making this app!

One of the best app on building habits. Unfortunately it's lossing its charm. Please introduce some features in it. Weekly/monthly/yearly Comparison is highly needed to keep ourselves motivated. Time Based /expiring date for unlocking achievements should be introduced. Please bring in these highly desired features.

I believe I that this is the best life rpg app out there. It's clean, intuitive, and very customizable, able to fit a broad range of purposes. My only gripe is the expensive premium, behind which a few features including most icons are. It makes sense, as this is a good quality product and the best of its kind imo, but $18 CAD per year and $58 CAD per full purchase still seem rather steep. Still, it's entirely functional, and there's no need to worry if you don't mind minorly limited aesthetics.

From South Carolina, came to Cali for work this coming month, and now it's like my app doesn't know that. Stuff that I should have all day to complete is auto failing early. I pay monthly for the app and was honestly quite surprised to see it bugging out like this. Whatever app I use for planning needs to be able to be used in more than one time zone. I don't travel much now but I do plan to when I can.

comments: To anyone who downloads this, do note that there is a free version, where u have to watch ads to increase the time of vpn use, and a paid version with no ad hassle. Once your free trail is over, just take 5 minutes to watch like 8 ads and you'll have 2 hours of free vpn. If you don't like it, then pay and don't complain. This is actually one of the few VPN apps that actually works in your favour if you think about it

Doesn't seem to work for me. (Maybe it's just a Netflix thing?) I'm in Italy, tried the UK vpn to get the shows I used to watch in the UK but it hadn't made a difference. I could be doing something wrong. I'd take any advice..

This app is amazing!! The free mode with ads isn't a problem and doesn't take that long to get 15h of free VPN, but if I want to add Netflix I have to start the free trial and pay weekly after and I can't do since I'm only 15 which is quite unfortunate😔

It works perfect except on for apps, i downloaded it for Netflix but it doesn't work on apps luckily it does on google and i have no regrets of downloadingthis app 4* Edit: they added a new feature wich lets you pick if you want to use the vpn on netflix now definitely a 5*
I use the app anytime I want to log into Twitter app and I have no problems. The advert s are sometimes too many for just an hour or 2 because it is almost near the whole day's watching.

title: Noteshelf: Take Notes | Handwriting | Annotate PDF
description:
~ #1 in Korea, Mexico (Productivity Paid App Category)
~ #2 in USA, Canada, Germany (Productivity Paid App Category)
~ #3 in UK, Australia (Productivity Paid App Category)
~ Featured in Google Play

“Let your thoughts flow with Noteshelf. Noteshelf gives you more choices in how you take notes. Whether you prefer using S Pen or typing, its fluid note-taking that feels natural as you learn or create.” 
- Samsung

Noteshelf is one of the most popular note-taking iOS apps, and it is with great excitement that we bring Noteshelf for Android. You can create beautiful handwritten notes, make checklists, annotate PDFs, and type documents all in one place.

✍️ Fluid Handwriting 
With Noteshelf, experience handwriting that feels just right. It is as smooth and fluid as writing with a pen on a notepad. Choose from an array of pens and highlighters in different sizes. Play around with colors, shapes, and images to create notes that are your own. So, taking your best class notes or meeting memos is now colorful and fun too! Noteshelf brings you the convenience of typing too. You can choose from many styles and formatting options. 

🖊️ Stylus
We support a variety of styli for taking beautiful handwritten notes. You will never miss using a pen and notepad again! On Samsung Galaxy Note devices, we also support a quick-erase option with the S-pen button. 

📝 Annotate PDFs, Write On Images
PDF annotations and markup is easier than ever! Import PDFs or images into Noteshelf to highlight, underline, or markup with our convenient formatting tools. You can edit school notes, grade papers, fill out forms, and sign documents too!

🔍 Search & Convert Handwritten Notes/ OCR
You can search your handwritten notes and even convert handwriting to text. We provide handwriting recognition in 65 different languages.

🎙️Record Audio Notes
Record audio as you take notes so you never miss anything important at school or work. Add as many recordings as you want and play them back anytime, even as you take handwritten notes. Loved by students while taking lecture notes!

💾Evernote Auto-Publish
Auto-publish your notes to Evernote and access them from just about anywhere.

🎁Noteshelf Club Exclusive
100s of beautifully crafted paper templates and notebook covers to go with your good notes. Get them for free when you signup for the Noteshelf Club!
Find paper templates for classroom notes, meetings memos, to-do lists, shopping lists, personal health trackers, journals, and many more! 

➕SOME MORE FEATURES
- We now support a wide range of Android smartphones too.
- Squares, circles or triangles, use auto-shapes to draw perfect geometrical shapes with ease.
- Auto-backup to Google Drive & Dropbox.
- Share your notes with colleagues, friends, and family over email, Google Drive, Dropbox, and other supported cloud services.
- Keep your personal and business notes separate. Drag and drop notebooks into groups or categories easily to organize them.
- Create bookmarks in Noteshelf. You can name or color your bookmarks, to organize your notes better!

Go ahead, try the app out, and start taking some amazing handwritten notes!

Join us in making Noteshelf better at note-taking. With your constant support and feedback, we will be giving you the best note-taking experience on Android too. We'd love to hear from you—write to us at noteshelf(at)fluidtouch.biz! 

“Noteshelf—Digital Note-Taking, Simplified!”

comments: Awesome app! Only thing it's missing is color fill and the magnifying box thingy. Otherwise I'm in love. My brain is kinda scattered so I'm so happy to find an app that goes with my whiteboard/mindmap approach!

I bought the paid version to get a better use of the app, however, I constantly get glitches and delays. I've messaged and sent video proof of these issues and nothing has changed in over a year. I was hoping said problema would be resolved with time in "the next update" as they constantly tell me, yet I have the exact same problem than I did last year. If there's any chance of getting a refund I would like to request it as I've tried to deal with the glitches and wait, but this is too much!

I am so sad about this app. I thought I finally found an app that would actually do what I wanted it to, unfortunatly it's crazy bugged!! I wish I had the same experience as everyone else but honestly with the bugs, its insanely hard to use and when you zoom in, the screen goes completely black. I really hope they update it and fix all of the bugs. There is so much potential here!

i see the potential in noteshelf, its a good app when it comes to notetaking and it is still getting better with updates but but but the developers at noteshelf should see the pace at which another app called "Flexcil" is moving. flexcil has a ui which feels far far smoother as to what we have seen in noteshelf... noteshelf also has good amount of bugs,the pen sometimes stops working and the app crashes when minimised for too long and the scrolling is sluggish

Overall app is satisfactory, but I'm facing one serious issue right after the new update, when exporting to pdf, the output hand written text becomes automatically too thin and on top of that it even cut down the every few strokes, which ultimately made the text unreadable. Waiting for this bug to be fixed soon. I think it has something to do with compression, because in ealier version pdf sizes were high, but no problem was there.

title: Routinery: Ritual/Routine
description:
⭐ App of the Day (2020)⭐
A powerful routine app that makes you behave.

Is your concentration low?
Do you habitually postpone your work?
Do you need a nudge to make your behavior easier?
Do you want to create and maintain a regular life?
Is your sleeping pattern a mess because you can't fall asleep easily at night?

Routinery helps build routines based on behavioral science.
Have you ever thought that you lack will? That's not true.
According to Stanford psychologist BJ Fogg, the environment outperforms will.
For example, just leaving a cup in your bedroom can increase your chances of drinking water in the morning!
Create productive plans and routines that maintain good habits with Routinery.

[Routinery Features]
✔Manage habits and routines
Create your own routine by creating productive habit.
Get habit recommendations, add your own habit.
scheduling, automatic routine notification.
Various ritual, habits icons.

✔Powerful Routine Timer 
Start with a timer so you don't put off your habit.
Verify routine progress including remaining habits.
Using as a pomodoro, study timer, planner
Check the time spent on each habit for adhd

✔Statistics and Feedback
View routine activities such as streaks/day-specific performance/calendar/habit completion at a glance.
Help improve routine activities with feedback from each habit.
Habit suggestion, report functionality to be added.

✔Conversations and Badges
Features that keeps you up.
Routinery's message encouraging routine activity.
Acquire badges as consecutive days pile up, check visual routine steps.

✔Apple Watch Support, Other Features
Supports iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch.
Seamless backup and synchronization between devices.
Dark Mode Support.

[With Routinery]
Make productive morning Routine, night Routine and Ritual
Plan and maintain the schedule systematically.
Relieve anxiety and overcome lethargy.
Don't forget to keep the small habit of taking vitamins.
Maintaining minimalist lifestyle with cleaning habits
Stay focused and get help with ADHD symptoms.

[Recommendation habits]
Making bed 1 minute → Drinking water 1 minute → Meditation 10 minutes → Stretching 20 minutes
Reading 30 minutes → Studying 2 hours → Writing a diary 20 minutes → Checking today's to do list 5 minutes

Contact us for errors and improvements: routinery.help@gmail.com
Check out FAQ : Download App ▶ Profile ▶ Frequently Asked Questions

developerAddress: 서울 서초구 나루터로 75 406호
recentChanges: How are you all doing? From this week, the routine analysis page will be slightly changed. Check it out :)
comments: This app absolutely keeps my day from getting derailed. The free version allows for two routine sequences, plenty to get a feel for whether it could help you (and it may be all you need!). I gladly opted for the paid version and have "on" day, "off" day, and bedtime routines. I love the ability to pause (and the reminders to unpause!) and being able to change the order on the fly, if needed. I wholeheartedly recommend it.

3 stars because it is a fantastic app but getting someone to respond to a problem isn't happening. I am not receiving notifications while I am in the middle of a routine needing to move on to my next task. I set a time to clean for 30 minutes and 45 minutes later I'm still going because no notifications have come through. Only when I unlock my phone again does the app tell me to move on and then tells me how much time I went over with the task was on. I really wish someone would get back with me

Wow, Routinery got me on track for my goals in only a few days! It's so easy to use, I love how the timer counts down, before this app I was constantly running late or taking forever to do a quick task. when I needed to move a little faster looking at the timer does the trick. I am so much more productive now.

I love the concept behind this app and it has genuinely helped me build good new habits, like meditation and reading. I will therefore be purchasing the premium version. However, it could use some tweaks and polish. For example, having alarms that continuously ring until they're silenced, rather than single little beeps, would prevent me from going way over time.

Accommodates shift work! I get home at midnight most days, but the "day" isn't over until you go to sleep! Routinery gets that, and you can set your day end time. I've been really enjoying the overall cleanliness of the app, too. It's helping me take control of the time I have, and get the things I want to do, done!

title: Plague Inc: Scenario Creator
description:
Enter the lab and develop your own custom scenarios for Plague Inc. with this powerful yet easy to use tool. Create new plague types, worlds, events and more and then share them with friends and over 85 million other players!

▶ IMPORTANT - This app is a tool to create custom scenarios for Plague Inc. It is not a game! You need the original Plague Inc. game installed in order to play scenarios. To get the original game - go here: www.plagueinc.com

The Plague Inc: Scenario Creator is a powerful yet easy to use content creation tool which lets players bring their deadliest ideas to life as they develop/mod their own custom scenarios for Plague Inc. and then share them with the world

 ◈◈◈ Push your creativity and imagination to the limit ◈◈◈
Want to make a cat pandemic, an infectious political meme or an alien parasite that makes people’s heads explode? How about a government that evacuates the population of Madagascar to the moon, a youtube star that turns people into zombies or a travel company that operates hundreds of flights to Greenland every day. Maybe you want to just want to accurately model how a real life disease might spread...

With the Plague Inc: Scenario Creator - you can do all this and lots more! Unleash your creativity and show the world your wonderful/twisted/weird/scary [delete as appropriate] creations.

 ◈◈◈ Access powerful developer labs ◈◈◈
The creator contains five labs, each with a specific focus. Choose which of them you want to use for any given scenario:

● Core lab: Edit core scenario information, write background narratives, set win conditions, edit translations and more
● Disease lab: Develop a bespoke plague with unique stats and fully customised symptoms, abilities and transmissions. 
● World lab: Control country attributes, such as population, climate, health care budgets, and air routes.
● Government lab: Dictate actions taken by governments in response to your disease. Modify existing actions or create entirely new ones.
● Events lab (advanced users): Create game-changing events and narrative pop ups for your scenario using powerful scripting tools.

 ◈◈◈ Share your scenario to make it go viral ◈◈◈
Once you’ve made your scenario - choose who you want to infect with it:

● Share scenarios directly with friends by sending them an email (or link in Twitter/Facebook etc)
● Publish your best scenarios worldwide to over 85 million players with the press of a button then see statistics on how many people play your game and what they think about it. Make your virus go viral! :P

◈◈◈

Like Plague Inc. on Facebook: 
http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc 

Follow me on Twitter: 
www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

▶ IMPORTANT - This app is a tool to create custom scenarios for Plague Inc. It is not a game! You need the original Plague Inc. game installed in order to play scenarios. To get the original game - go here: www.plagueinc.com

● Events lab (advanced users): Create game-changing events and narrative pop ups for your scenario using powerful scripting tools.

◈◈◈ Share your scenario to make it go viral ◈◈◈
Once you’ve made your scenario - choose who you want to infect with it:

● Share scenarios directly with friends by sending them an email (or link in Twitter/Facebook etc)
● Publish your best scenarios worldwide to over 85 million players with the press of a button then see statistics on how many people play your game and what they think about it. Make your virus go viral! :P

◈◈◈

Like Plague Inc. on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc

Follow me on Twitter:
www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

▶ IMPORTANT - This app is a tool to create custom scenarios for Plague Inc. It is not a game! You need the original Plague Inc. game installed in order to play scenarios. To get the original game - go here: www.plagueinc.com

comments: It's an absolutely great game. Theres plenty to keep you into the game, like scenarios and creating scenarios. I think a neat feature could be added though. Such as adding in your own sounds via MP3. It would help with certain scenarios and it would be neat.

At first, nothing worked for me. But then I realized why. When doing percents, you have to put down numbers before the decimal place as a 1 in the ones place would mean 100% and saying 33 means 3300% so say .33 instead as that'll mean 33%. What I have the most issue with are the events as I can't even get them to work for me and I'm pretty sure that I'm typing things in the right places. I just can never get one actually ready for use, but rather partly constructed if you get what I mean of.
I love it, but it is kind of confusing at first, but you get used to it. Also when I try to log into my acount, it keeps me on the logging in screen. Please fix this.
I had lots of fun before but now my scenarios arent saving and i cant work on them again. This has to be fixed!
So i give this 4 stars ita pretty good you can custom but when im finished with my scenario it keeps saying invalid email error wrong password etc after having hard work so pls fix this.
