comments: I Get told there's 500 pages of images, but each page is identical. Really expensive. Terms of usage are confusing, unless you upgrade to "team". And on top of that about half the images I'm interested in are "no longer available " why? Did you sell out?

Charging $100+ to cancel when I only used it to download 4 images from the free trail, then forced into paying the rest of a year. I only found out it didn't cancel after checking my bank account this week and seeing a $30 charge from them. Unless you are going to be using them consistently I do not recommend signing up at all. Now I have a fee that I can't afford having very little work during Covid.

So sad. I signed up last year, and did not download a single image. And now i received this email "You’ve run out of downloads. Re-purchase now". All I can say is be careful, monitor your subscription, before it expires. I was'nt even informed in advance that its coming to an end.

Please fix search bug. Every time I add another letter it freaks out and ends up like this. Eg trying to type "seamless" will end up "sseseaseamseamlseamleseamlesseamless" or something similar. Driving me nuts. Other than that I like the app :)
Not only great collection of photos to explore, easy to use and most importantly, I can buy and save to my phone. Just hope that it will continue to work well.

title: Focus To-Do: Pomodoro Timer & To Do List
description:
Focus To-Do combines Pomodoro Timer with Task Management, it is a science-based app that will motivate you to stay focused and get things done. 

It brings Pomodoro Technique and To Do List into one place, you can capture and organize tasks into your todo lists, start focus timer and focus on work & study, set reminders for important tasks and errands, check the time spent at work. 

It's the ultimate app for managing Tasks, Reminders, Lists, Calendar events, Grocery lists, checklist, helping you focus on work & study and tracking your working hours.

Focus To-Do syncs between your phone and computer, so you can access your lists from anywhere.

How it works:
       1. Pick a task you need to accomplish.
       2. Set a timer for 25 minutes, keep focused and start working.
       3. When the pomodoro timer rings, take a 5 minute break.
 
Key Features:

- ⏱ Pomodoro Timer：Stay focused and get more things done.
       Pause and resume Pomodoro
       Customizable pomodoro/breaks lengths
       Notification before the end of a Pomodoro
       Support for short and long breaks
       Skip a break after the end of a Pomodoro
       Continuous Mode
       
- ✅ Tasks Management: Task Organizer, Schedule Planner, Reminder, Habit Tracker, Time Tracker
       Tasks and projects: Organise your day with Focus To-Do and complete your to do, study, work, homework or housework you need to get done.
       Recurring tasks: Build lasting habits with powerful recurring due dates like "Every Monday".
       Reminders: Setting a Reminder ensures you never forget important things ever again, you can set up recurring due dates to remind you each and every time. 
       Sub-tasks: Break down your task into smaller, actionable items or add a checklist .
       Task Priority: Highlight your day’s most important To-Do with color-coded priority levels.
       Estimated Pomodoro Number: Estimate the workload or set a goal.
       Note: Record more detailed about the task.

- 📊 Report: Detailed statistics of your time distribution, tasks completed.
       Support the calculation of the total time of Focus Time.
       Gantt Chart of the Focus Time.
       Statistics on completed To Do. 
       Statistics on time distribution of project.
       Trend chart of the completed To Do and the focus time.

- 🖥📲 All-Platform synchronization: View and manage your goals wherever you are for better goal achieving.
       Support seamless synchronization within iPhone、Mac、Android、Windows、iPad、Apple Watch.

- 🌲 Forest: Turn your focused moments into a lovely plant, a interesting way to build motivation and makes you productive
       Focus on work and study, generate sunlight for the plant, and grow with the plant.

- 🚫 App Whitelist: 
       Stop getting distracted by apps when focusing and get more things done.
 
- 🎵 Various Reminding:
       Focus Timer finished alarm, vibration reminding.
       Various white noise to help you focus on work & study.

- Daily/Weekly/Monthly Report
       View all of your tracked time in a calendar view.

- Support prevention of screen lock:
       Check the pomodoro time left by keeping the screen on.

- Handy Widget: 
       Get easy access to your to do by adding a checklist widget to your home screen

Contact Us: focustodo@163.com, reply within 24 hours.
Website: http://www.focustodo.cn
Pomodoro ™ and Pomodoro Technique ® are registered trademarks of Francesco Cirillo. This app is not affiliated with Francesco Cirillo.

Users have been focused on our app for 200 million hours, join us and we help you to be focused and increase your productivity, reduce procrastination and anxiety.

recentChanges: 1.Bug fix
comments: I do really love this app and pay for the premium version but the only thing that is frustrating is that when I have my tasks for today I can't move them and put them in the order I want to complete them, there's only the option to list it as high, medium or low priority. If the tasks could be moved and put in order it would be perfect! Due to this I'm thinking of trying another one but if this changes I would give it 5 stars without a doubt

I bought a premium version and it worked ok. Then I had to buy a new phone as my old phone stopped working. I tried to download the app again, and it simply does not open. I guess there is a problem caused by the premium version. Edit. I redownloaded the app after several months of not using it. It works fine right now, might even change the rating to 4 stars if I encounter no problems.

It had everything I needed for studying. The timer, the list, and much more things. I wish I can give it more of a 4.5 because the colour is really bright. I can change make it into dark mode more can I make the widget also dark. Maybe there is a dark mode but I can't find it or I have to pay for it. I'm not sure, but my eyes hurt from looking at the bright white and red-ish/orange-y colour. Other than that, it's relatively a good app!

Love this app. It has definitely helps with my productivity at work and my passion project. I make my to do list, execute during the working period, and include healthy habits during my breaks (refilling my water cup, stretching, going for a quick walk, etc.). It helps me focus on my tasks and leaves room for behaviors that relax me. After each day if using it, I feel more & more productive and am surprised how much I get accomplished. It truly helps you go from being busy to being productive.

Almost perfect! Great features, and easy to use. Love the sub-tasks and the ability to swipe left or right to do certain actions. Only feels unprofessional and incomplete when you launch the app and it lands on a page filled with settings or options instead of a nice and clean overview page. Add a new landing page with clean overview, then I might consider paying for this app. Otherwise, has potential and I recommend it.

title: SplashID Safe Password Manager
description:
SplashID is the world's most trusted password storage system. For over 12 years, over one million users have kept their passwords safe with SplashID - and now it gets even better with an all-new version.

Think of SplashID as your personal vault or digital wallet on Android. You can store and lock sensitive information - not just usernames and passwords but credit card data, account numbers, registration codes, prescriptions, and much more.

Keeping your usernames, passwords, and bank account numbers in your head, on a Word or Excel file, or written on a piece of paper is unsafe. Passwords can be forgotten; laptops can be lost. With SplashID, your data is easily and quickly accessible, reliably stored, and - most importantly - secure.

Only SplashID offers:

- Access: Free, native, secure apps for mobile, desktop, web, and browser
- Choice of sync and storage: You decide how to store and sync your records with convenient cloud sync, local network Wi-Fi sync, or on-device storage
- Customizable record types and categories keep information organized
- Photo capture feature quickly and easily stores credit card information
- File attachments: upload photos, documents, and add notes to any record for reference
- Protection features include 256-bit encryption and 2-factor authentication
- Secure sharing: Safely share records with other SplashID users or even those who don’t use SplashID
- Automatic SplashID Backup service to ensure data never gets lost
- Security dashboard provides usage statistics and tools to monitor and fix weak, reused, and old passwords
- Web autofill saves typing in usernames, passwords, and delivers the correct address from the secure data vault every time to prevent phishing
- Refer a friend to SplashID and you both receive a 25% discount on a SplashID Pro subscription

Lock your personal information up in a state-of-the-art data saver and feel comfortable knowing that at any time you can access private information safely.

No other password app delivers SplashID's combination of features, reliability, and security. Compare SplashID to others: http://splashid.com/personal/compare.html

The app is free to use with basic record storage functionality. A one-year subscription to SplashID Pro gives you many additional features like sync across devices, Security Dashboard and Automated Backup for just $19.99. It's auto-renewed at the end of the year, or easily cancelled. Refer a friend to SplashID, and you both get a 25% discount on SplashID Pro!

Note: SplashID requests permission to access your contacts data on install solely for the purpose of allowing you access to your own contact list when using the share records tool. We do not collect any contacts data.

comments: I have been using this app for years without incident. More recently I had to change my email address. I had been fearing this due to how the email address is used by the app. I found a support document on their website and followed the instructions prescribed and was pleased to have the end result as intended. I see several reviews hear that indicate others have had significant problems with the app; however, that is not my experience.

I have been using SplashID since the Palm days, I got a lifetime license when I migrated to the Mac. A few months ago, I found that it would not sync with my phone unless I upgrade. Then I found some bugs and contacted tech support. Nickolai refused to help. The conversation degenerated into a high pressure sales pitch from him to pay for an upgrade in June. The upgrade is here, and I find that I need to pay for the Pro version to sync. Good bye SplashID! Your money-grubbing has lost you a fan!

Like the online experience, however the Android app needs way too many permissions purely for my "convenience". I have no interest in the parts of the app that need the permissions and so will be uninstalling

SplashID has not kept up functionality. I relied on notes to store seed phrases for crypto wallets and it will randomly dump them. Despite owning a lifetime license I will be taking my passwords elsewhere.
The global sync well, and I just enabled the fingerprint lock, so happy!

title: All-In-One Toolbox: Cleaner, Speed Booster
description:
All-In-One Toolbox is a set of basic useful tools which help your Android working the best that it can. All handy tools on one small-size app.

All-In-One Toolbox gives a collection of tools such as a  junk cleaner, history eraser, speed booster, memory optimizer, battery optimizer, CPU cooler, app manager, file manager, mini launcher just to name a few to maintain good performance for your Android.

It is also compatible with a lot of plug-ins like app lock, game booster, volume settings and so much more. 

How does All-In-One Toolbox improve device performance? 

►Show Phone Storage Status 
Just open app, you can see status of your phone. How much RAM run, how much ROM occupied and what is the CPU temperature. Keeping track of your RAM and internal storage space make you understand better of your phone.

► Clean Junk – Only One Click
Click “Clean”, it will scan cache, temp files, app leftovers, thumb images, empty folder and process. Almost all kinds of junk files will be scan out. After scanning, clean those file searched and your phone will have extra space. 
 
► Boost Speed- Only One Touch
Touch “Boost”, it will scan which process can be exited and will release about 400MB memory every time.

► Cool CPU- Only One Tap
Tap “CPU Cooler”, it will tell you CPU temperature and if it is normal. Automatically choose the apps you are running and you can terminate them to cool down your Android.

► Speed up Boot Time

descriptionHTML:
All-In-One Toolbox is a set of basic useful tools which help your Android working the best that it can. All handy tools on one small-size app.

All-In-One Toolbox gives a collection of tools such as a junk cleaner, history eraser, speed booster, memory optimizer, battery optimizer, CPU cooler, app manager, file manager, mini launcher just to name a few to maintain good performance for your Android.

It is also compatible with a lot of plug-ins like app lock, game booster, volume settings and so much more.

How does All-In-One Toolbox improve device performance?

►Show Phone Storage Status
Just open app, you can see status of your phone. How much RAM run, how much ROM occupied and what is the CPU temperature. Keeping track of your RAM and internal storage space make you understand better of your phone.

► Clean Junk – Only One Click
Click “Clean”, it will scan cache, temp files, app leftovers, thumb images, empty folder and process. Almost all kinds of junk files will be scan out. After scanning, clean those file searched and your phone will have extra space.

comments: This has been a 5-star app until this past week. I'm a paid annual subscriber via Google Play Store for a couple of years, now, and still am. All of a sudden ads started appearing, making this app almost unusable. I thought that "Restore Purchase" would fix it, but it said "No purchase to restore". I've contacted Developer Support twice but I haven't yet heard back from them. If they help me "restore" my purchase I'll restore their 5-star rating.

This app covers pretty much everything your phone needs and more. The ads are very short, out of all the apps I've used this one is ultimately the very best out there, it's free , it's not ad intrusive, it covers so much with ad ons, it's perfect!!

I have been using this app for a few years and I love it; it stops unwanted background processes, cleans unwanted files andcached, etc. and just keeps my phone running smooth. Today I've made several attempts to open the app but it stays on the blue intro. screen. I rebooted my phone 2x, force stopped app, checked updates (there were none), used phones cleaning tool; all of which did nothing. Something is very wrong. I would usually give 5 stars but not until usable again.

8/21 - Can you please get rid of the redirect ads? I am most disturbed by ads that redirect to this app even after leaving your site. I love the cleaner (using on my 4th new phone) but really hate the new ads after using boost & battery boost. Before, there were ads but none that would redirect. It's too bad that the advertising is getting in the way of the cleaner. Surprised that such an easy app would clean & boost my phone so well.

Invasive notifications sent back to back literally. Couldn't even do what I was trying to do because I had to stop to get rid of the message that just stays there on the screen. Be careful what you allow in the permissions. If it continues I'm uninstalling it. Very annoying and interferes with important tasks.

The cancellation will take effect 24-hours after the last day of the current subscription period and you will be downgraded to the free service.
* Please note: any unused portion of a free trial will be deducted from the plan once you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period.

comments: I've had this app for many months and I paid for the yearly subscription. It does not load anything anymore. I try once a week to load it up but it just stays on a white screen and eventually crashes. If I'm not using what I'm paying for I need a refund.

Was immediately wary when I saw misspelt words and random use of upper/lower case. The habits on offer are as random as they come: "Brush teeth" but not "music practice"? Please. Also, "take injections"??? Whatever they mean, it got lost in translation. A rating of 4.9? Yeah right...

Its a simple app but incomplete in a lot of aspects. Cant sort habits. Cant set weekly/monthly repeat habits into my preferred day (it does so randomly). Cannot add notes to habits. Provides very little customization.

This app is probably the least useful app on my phone. You can only set up three inexact habits for everyday habits unless you want to pay premium for more inexact daily habits. Deleting, Do not download.
Very glitchy. Images and texts are not proportionate to windows and boxes. Plus they harass you to subscribe and you can't use the app without harassment at all. Skip.

title: Task & Project Management - MeisterTask
description:
MeisterTask is an intuitive tool for project management and task management. It is ideal for your personal organization, but also for agile and efficient teams. MeisterTask runs both on your mobile devices and online in your Internet browser!

Whether you want to manage projects and tasks of all kinds or create clear to-do lists and checklists, with its versatile functions and flexible Kanban boards, MeisterTask offers everything you need to work together with your team to make workflows much more efficient.

Notifications keep you up to date on the progress of your colleagues while ensuring that you never lose track of your own tasks or miss an important deadline.

But MeisterTask is more than a simple task management tool: it's a place where all your project-related information is securely stored and yet available to all project members at all times. It's a place where you can gain insights into the productivity of your team and track the progress of your projects. Moreover, it is a place where work is really fun!

Feature Highlights - FREE Basic Plan:
- Create an unlimited number of tasks and invite others to collaborate with you
- Dashboard with quick access to all your tasks
- Checklists / predefined checklists
- Notifications keep you up to date on what's happening in your team
- Real-time communication across all devices
- Activity list in projects and tasks
- Leave comments in tasks and 'like' activities
- Integrated time recording

Feature Highlights - Pro-Plan:
- Create project groups
- Upload custom wallpapers for dashboard and projects
- Create multiple checklists within a task
- Recurring tasks
- File attachments up to 200 MB per file
- Automate processes with different actions
- Statistics and reports
- Agenda - Personal Board

Feature Highlights - Business Plan:
- Assign roles and permissions
- Share projects with your entire team
- Custom fields
- Compliance and activity exports
- Priority Support
- Timeline - Gantt Charts


Note: To use MeisterTask, you must create a free user account. If you already have an account, using the mobile app will not cost you extra.

The basic version of MeisterTask is free. You can try the pro-plan for free for a week if you want to. If you are satisfied with your trial version, do not change anything and your membership will automatically resume as a monthly subscription with automatic renewal.


Privacy Policy: https://www.meistertask.com/privacy
Terms of use: https://www.mindmeister.com/legal

comments: Even with the free plan this app is AWESOME! I'll probably get the premium asap when my business will need it. Thank you a lot MeisterX,Y,Z... you'll find yours. I'm not use to the mind maps, but I use yours when I give it a try sometime, it looks pretty well made too!
It's a wonderful app, Even though I am not using it for collaboration, it still tripled my productivity for the first week I used it. We'll only one thing I miss is the number of projects I can add.

Wysiwyg, simple, works, syncs with cloud, would have loved to have the ability to have everything encrypted where privacy was focussed on. Adittionally, having the ability to do automations from the phone would be nice.

This is a paid app... Remove it from the free category. The moment you get in it says you only have 7 days before you have to pay. This is against Google's terms of service for the Google Play store as any paid product has to list itself as paid.

Terrific app for managing projects and the associated tasks. Highly customizable and the automations are amazing! I've set mine up for use with the Getting Things Done (GTD) Strategy. Give it a try... You will not be sorry.

title: The Clock: Alarm Clock & Timer
description:
Alarm Clock App with Timer, Stopwatch, Bedside Clock & World Clock 

Simple, Reliable, Precise

The Clock is a beautiful alarm clock with "extreme" functions. It includes features that prevent excessive snooze and get you out of bed. It also comes with a built-in timer, stopwatch, world clock and a stylish bedside clock. Combines all of the functionality you need into one simple, beautiful package. It is designed to create, edit and remove alarms in the easiest way. 

Timely and accurate
You can use it to wake up in the morning or to setup reminders for your tasks and “to-do”s during the day. Set recurring alarms for repeating events. It’s an innovative solution for those who just can’t seem to get up on time, even with an alarm clock. 

 Gentle alarm with increasing volume (Alarm Fade-In)
🔊The Clock offers an option to set alarmy volume increasing in a peaceful and progressive way to provide gentle wake-up experience (volume crescendo). You will be able to wake up gently from your dreams, in a peaceful and progressive way. 

You’ll never oversleep or miss an appointment
Choose your favorite music or tunes for your wake up. Jump-start your brain by solving math problems to dismiss the alarm. Comes with a large snooze button to prevent you from accidentally pressing ‘dismiss’. Wake up in time and never late for work.

Wake up to Spotify Music
Select your best track on Spotify and wake up to great music.

Set favorite tunes with online radio
Choose from many popular online radio stations, or add your own if your favorite isn’t already on the list.

Solve math problems
You get to choose the difficulty level: Easy, Medium, Hard, Very Hard.

Alarm Widget You can edit or remove alarms with just one touch. 

Nap Alarm Perfect for an afternoon siesta!

Perfect alarm clock for heavy sleepers 
Sleep if u can! Annoying alarm clock with loud alarm tones and vibration. Perfect solution for those sleepyheads. Wake up using only vibrations, with a choice between soft and intense. It will force you out of sleep.

Works better than other alarm clocks
It is flexible. You can set an exact alarm time or sleep goal. You can set as many timers as you want for activities like exercise, cooking, sports, games and more!

Timer The Clock has a Countdown Timer, both on app and as a widget on home screen. Use it for sports, fitness exercises, tabata, HIIT, games, in the kitchen, gym or wherever you need it.

Stopwatch Simple and reliable stopwatch to keep track of split/lap time and total time down to 1/100 of a second. Feature for games, sporting events, work, science experiments, etc. The results can be shared via any application such as SMS, e-mail or Whatsapp or recorded on your notepad. 

World Clock
Keep track of time around the world using the World Clock.

Widgets
Alarm Widget, Analog Clock, Digital Clock, Calendar, World Clock Widgets. One can decorate her/his home screen with those beautiful widgets. 

Bedside Clock Turn your device into a gorgeous bedside clock. Our alarm app features a night clock with gorgeous themes (in nightstand mode). You can set as a screen saver.

Themes Unique themes & custom background support (dark & light).

Compatible with Android 11 and 12
- Use voice commands to set alarm and timers (Google Assistant)
- Use strobe light for alarms
- 📅 Set date for alarms

** Important Note: your phone must be on for the alarm to work **

comments: This app pushes me to purchase the paid version all the time. The last time it did this, was at night. THE ADVERTISEMENT PREVENTED THE ALARM FROM SOUNDING. Late to work was all this time, but there won't be a next time. This app is a big dud. Edit: Apparently they've received so much negative feedback that a bot immediately asks you to contact them when your review is posted. Possibly consider fixing the issues before trying to sell it?

Only 1 star because it has a lot of features, but it about cost me my job because of the stupid pay upgrade prompt/window that pops up will freeze the app till you clear it, preventing the alarms to go off. Even after ticking the box that says "don't show me this again", it still pops up down the line after a few days. About to uninstall. Horrible job costing implementation they have going on. You can bet I won't pay you for this app that's a dime a dozen.. DO NOT RELY ON THIS APP!

Limited to just 7 alarms, need to pay for more, that's absurd. App keeps asking me to rate it 5 stars or report problem via email. I would like an equally easy option of rating it lower than 5 stars without being annoyed over and over again nor having to waste my time writing an email.
I love this app, helps me to be more organized. I would like to suggest , make the font a slightly larger in size.
It annoyingly keeps asking me to give it five stars on Google play, that's why I'm giving it 3 stars. Otherwise, it's a great app.

title: Padlet
description:
What is Padlet?
Padlet is like paper for your screen. Start with an empty page and then put whatever you like on it. Upload a video, record an interview, snap a selfie, write your own text posts or upload some documents, and watch your padlet come to life. Once others add to it, the page will update in real time.

Used by teachers, students, professionals, and individuals of all ages, all around the world, the Padlet app is the easiest way to create and collaborate wherever you are. Padlet supports any file type you can imagine, from Spotify Playlists to Excel Spreadsheets. Upload a link and watch a detailed preview appear. Organize the content in any format you like - whether you prefer an grid of images or a chronological scroll.

The Padlet app makes it easy to collaborate in any setting. With views tailored for smaller devices and easy-to-use editor buttons, you can change how your padlet looks with a quick double tap. Add photos from your camera roll, or take a video and upload it instantly. Use our QR reader to access a shared padlet. Share across social platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and LinkedIn. 

If you are using Padlet for school or work, you might want to consider our Backpack and Briefcase plans. Visit https://padlet.com/premium.

Millions of people are already using Padlet for:
📚 Biographies
😻 Blogs
🎠 Collages
🗒 Collaborative note-taking
🤓 Creative writing prompts
🎓 Curriculum planning
👔 CVs/Resumes
👯 Digital bulletin boards
🖊 Essays
🎫 Exit tickets
💯 Feedback
🎉 Group birthday cards
👚 Fashion design
🏃 Fitness tracking
👼 Inspiration boards
💅 Lookbooks
🎶 Music playlists
📌 Noticeboards
🍕 Nutrition logs
📬 Pen-pal messages
🖼 Photo albums
🏅 Portfolios
💃 Professional development
❓ Q+A
🏠 Real estate listings
📊 Solo or group presentations
⏳ Timelines
✅ To-Do lists
🚆 Travel planning
📽 Video playlists
👰 Wedding planning
🗃 Workflow organization
😎 ... Just being cool

You can find out more at http://jn.padlet.com. Read our privacy policy at http://sl.padlet.com/privacy-policy. You can also email us at hello@padlet.com.

comments: The Android app seems to be completely independent from the web version. So many times I've been bitten by things I've posted from my phone getting cut off later less than halfway through what looked like the message I posted, or else being deleted altogether...I have zero trust now unless I bring out my laptop. This makes it so unreliable that I'm actively searching for a better replacement. Too bad, because I wanted to use this, but what's the point if you can only rely on the web version?

Okay. First of all, why can only make 3 padlets for the free version? Sometimes it’s unfair because our teacher told us to use this app and we wanted to use it for our classes and make presentations. I am a student. I don't have the money to upgrade to a paid one. I hope you consider that thing. If you can update this app, I want more than that. Well, that's all I want to give feedback on this app (Padlet).

I'm trying to use my organisation's Padlet and it doesn't have the same password as my organisation's login. I login to the Padlet app and I see different padlets from when I login on a browser. My students aren't able to edit posts if they log in using their school accounts - but it's okay if they do so using their personal emails. Come on, Padlet, fix this darned mess.
Padlet is an interactive tool that fosters engagement. My students and their parents LOVE it! Students can work as independent learners posting their own work and accessing feedback. Thank you!
Actually a great app, it convenient to interact with my teachers but have a problem, that is sometimes it automatically subtract some words

title: LifeUp: Gamification To-Do & Tasks List | HabitRPG
description:
LifeUp, whose name means UPGRADE YOUR LIFE, is a gamification To-Do List (Tasks List) application with many interesting gamified features.


It's designed by us, two newly graduated developers, who intend to develop A customizable and fun gamified To-Do list and Habit-forming RPG application.

LifeUp has a unique item reward and custom achievement mechanism, but it doesn't lose the utility of tools.
It allows you to record things like playing a productivity game.
And its simple and easy-to-start attribute mechanism can make light users experience the fun of life RPG.


Features: 
- No Ads, No In-App Purchase related to the features, You can enjoy all the functional modules at once.

- Beautiful Material Design UI

- Full basic To-Do Functions
Remark, Reminder, Start Time, Deadline, Repeat, Target Times, History, and List.

✨ Gamification Functions
6 Attributes (Including Strength, Intelligence, Charm, Endurance, Vitality and Creative), EXP, Level, Coin, Random Coin.

What's more, You can customize the Attributes Icon and Text as you like.

🎨 Easy-to-Use
EXP and Coin reward can be auto calculated by Urgency and Difficulty Degree that you set up.

🏆 Achievements
Up to 57 built-in Achievements waiting for you to unlock.
What's more, you can create your achievements which can be set up to auto calculate the progress.

🎁 Shop
Put items you want with the price you decide on shelves. Earn the coin by finishing tasks. Purchase the items and then USE them in your Inventory.
Items can be customized with various effects, such as increasing or decreasing experience points, synthesizing other items, and starting a countdown.

⏰ Pomodoro
As a Pomodoro timer is completed, you can receive a virtual tomato reward.
Decide whether to eat or sell tomatoes?

🎲 Custom item effects: loot boxes
You can customize the effect of the shop item.
For example, you can create your Loot boxes to get rewards randomly.

⚗️ Custom item effects: synthesis
Create your synthetic formula and synthesize some items into others.
So you can realize the multi-currency function. More ways to play with loot boxes.

⚽ Various Ways to Gain EXP
You can even gain STRENGTH EXP by your daily steps,
or maybe get ENDURANCE EXP by eating your tomatoes gained from the Pomodoro timer.

🤝 Community
Join the team you like, complete team tasks, submit your activity, and so on.

- Feelings
Record your feelings of completion by text and pictures.

- Widget
App Widget is available, tasks can be managed from the Home Screen.

- Theme Color
23 built-in color themes

- Dark Theme

- Lots of Settings
Such as the EXP punishment factor/coin punishment factor.
Hiding any module that you don't need.

- Local, WebDAV and Dropbox Backup/Restore
Most of the data is stored offline, you have complete control over your data.

- Network is Unneeded
Most features of LifeUp can be used without network connections.

- Keep Updating New Functions


Support
- Language: Please note that currently only English, Turkish, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese, German, Italian, Russian, Japanese available. 
As an Indie application, we can not afford the translation fee for more languages. 
Some languages contain only partial translations. However, everyone can contribute their translation.

- Price: As the application continues to be updated and improved, and new features are added, the price may be adjusted accordingly. 

- Issues: If you have any application issues or intent to refund, you're welcome to contact us via email below.

- App Privacy Terms & Policy: http://wiki.lifeupapp.fun/en/#/introduction/privacy-terms

- Contact Email: kei.ayagi@gmail.com

recentChanges:
0. Fixed some issues of plenty tasks, pomodoro, select photos and restore data

comments: This app is really good. I like that you can get a shop reward on completion of a certain task without having to buy it. I also like the pomodoro feature. I wish we could edit the attribute section though. Edit: I was experimenting with the synthesis feature which is also unique to this app and it's very well done. You can choose to buy something from the store with another store item or many other items like xp, coins etc

I find this app highly effective. I first scoffed at the idea of the gamification of discipline to accomplish boring/tedious/menial/taxing/important tasks. Then I tried it. I absolutely love this app. The fact that I feel so convicted for not accomplishing my tasks makes this app amazing, because I refuse to allow to gratify myself with enjoyable activities like gaming or browsing youtube until I've earned enough coins to do so, through completing the more important tasks in my life. It takes a bit to set up your own little economy, but I think I've got it down pretty well. The widget for the home screen is good.

This app is amazing, what I was expecting was not all these features and it is almost perfect. I just wish I could add more attributes. Other than that everything is perfect, not too complex, takes a few minutes to learn but worth every penny.

A super clean app that's worth the small price. Although as of now, you are unable to customise the opacity and general theme of the widget when it's in light mode, which kinda sucks... (Fear not for you dark mode users though, since you can customise that)

I enjoy it, really holds you accountable because you want to complete tasks like a video game. I hope this continues to improve as it's a more recent app. Some more features like avatars, boss battles, other quality of life improvements, etc. will take this app to the very top in my opinion.

title: QR Code - Barcode Reader Free
description:
Qr Code Reader is completely free of cost and highly secure. Change your smartphone into a powerful QR Code, Barcode scanning utility. By using the phone's camera, Barcode Scanner will quickly scan and recognize the information of barcode.

Qr Code Reader - DECODE text, urls, ISBN, email, contacts information, calendar events and much more with a click using smartphone camera, online codes. After decoding you will be redirected to webpage links, books review, multimedia and calendar online informations.

Features of QR code Scanner/ QR code reader:

- Easily scan QR code and generate code
- Powerful QR decode speed
- Generate QR code for text, personal information, web link and share with friends.
- No need Internet connection to scan QR code/ barcode
- Create QR code for the message you want to send to your friends
- Barcode Scanner allows you to view detailed product information by QRcode at stores, supermarkets etc.
- Save QR scanning history, filter support and search your QR scan history

QR code Scanner / QR Barcode Scanner can scan and read all QRcodes / barcode types including text, url, ISBN, product, contact, calendar, email, location, Wi-Fi and other formats. You can even use QR & Barcode Scanner to scan coupons / coupon codes to receive discounts and save some money. It is safe and fully compatible with your devices

How to use QR code Scanner / QR Code Generator:
1. Open the QR code Scanner application.
2. Point the camera to the QR code or barcode
3. Auto recognize, scan and decode
4. Get results and relevant options
5. Share result with friends if you want.

QR code was designed with camera permission. If you care about security, this is the code scanning application just for you.

HOW THE APP WORKS

Scan all kinds of QR codes and barcodes in one step: open the app and move the camera to the location with the QR code / barcode you want to scan. When scanning the QR code, if the code contains the URL, you can open it Browse to the site by pressing the browser button. If the code contains only text, you can see it immediately.

Not only is this a QR code scanner, it also gives you lots of interesting features like saving scan history so you can review any when you want. This code scanner app not only helps you scan QR codes, but also other types of codes. In addition, you can share your scan results easily with just a push of a button.

title: Mind map & note taking tool - MindMeister
description:
MindMeister is the one and only mobile mind mapping app you’ll ever need. Whether you’re using it in the boardroom, the classroom, the presentation hall, or the lunch meeting, MindMeister can help you organize, prioritize, and even generate new thoughts.

Designed from the ground up as an extension to our award-winning, browser-based interface, the MindMeister app stores your mobile creations and seamlessly syncs them with your online account.

Feature highlights in the free “Basic” plan:

- Up to 3 mind maps
- Seamlessly sync maps and folders with your free online account
- Support for drag & drop, zoom, pan
- Add icons, colors, styles and map themes
- View and edit notes, links, tasks and attachments on topics
- Draw connections between nodes
- Play presentations
- Share maps directly from the device
- Real-time collaboration

Additional features in the “Personal” plan:

- Create and edit unlimited mind maps
- Add files and images to topics
- Export maps in PDF and PNG format
- Priority support

Additional features in the “Pro” plan:

- Export maps in MS Word and MS PowerPoint format
- Export slides as zip file

NOTE: Requires a free account registration.

The “Basic” version of MindMeister is free. You can try the “Personal” plan free for 1 week after signing up! If you enjoy your “Personal” trial, do nothing and your membership will automatically continue as an auto-renewing month-to-month subscription.
If you subscribe via Google Play: Payment will be charged to Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off before the end of the current period. The account will be charged for renewal after the end of the current period at the rate of your selected plan above.
Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Google Play Subscription Settings on the device.
If you haven’t subscribed through Google Play, you can manage your subscription through MindMeister.com.

Privacy policy: https://www.mindmeister.com/privacy
Terms of use: https://www.mindmeister.com/legal

summary: Plan projects, brainstorm, take notes. Whether alone or in a team.
developerAddress:
Zugspitzstr. 2
85591 Vaterstetten
Germany
recentChanges: This release brings stability improvements to the app. Additionally, we are working on a new map editor that will improve your mind mapping experience. Release is slated for later in the year.
comments: Wonderful!! I can see big picture by zooming in and zooming out and see what are interconnected dots.

BEWARE: they have shady and dishonest billing practices! It works as described but the problem is with customer service. I paid for premium and signed up for one year But canceled it so it would not auto renew... The cancellation did not go through for some reason So it automatically billed me for another year. The day after I was billed I sent in a request for refund explaining this ... but they basically said "sorry, too bad".

It's a great app! When writing I often find my head filled with different information all jumbled up and this app is a great way to get it into writing. It's always there when I need it and it's very easy to use.

The desktop web browser app is pretty good as long as you don't do things too fast but the mobile android app is not good. There has been more than one time that I created a new node and hit save and then it disappeared. I had to create it again.
Amazing app as it helps me streamline my work and life goals. Love the web and app interface which brings lot of flexibility and convenience.

title: Profit Bandit
description:
Make money with your phone

Scan any barcode to find out how much profit you can make if you sell the item on Amazon. Profit Bandit has a built-in profit calculator to provide the most accurate profit figure, including postage rates and FBA fees.

The #1 scanning app for any Amazon Seller.

No calculations on your part are necessary and it's very easy to use. Don't pay $50/month for overpriced FBA scouting apps - Profit Bandit provides virtually identical functionality for a fraction of the price. It's the best-value Amazon scouting app on Google Play.

You WILL make the money back that you spent on this app. Guaranteed.
The app has two modes, one that requires a Pro account and one that does not require one. 

FEATURES for Pro mode:

• Bluetooth scanner support
• 'Sell It' button takes you directly to the Amazon page to list your item for sale
• Highlights Amazon's offer
• Tap any seller to base your profit from
• Profit & Sales Rank alerts: vibrate phone when profit is above a specified amount or Rank is below a certain number
• Show Net Profit ($) or Profit Margin (%) or ROI (%)
• Use the Native scanner (built-in to the app) or ZXing (built-in to the app) or Pic2Shop for camera scanning
• Supports Amazon US, CA, UK, ES, IT, FR, DE and AU
• Search CamelCamelCamel, eBay, Pricegrabber and others directly from the app (tap the title)
• Search by barcode or keywords
• Scan History (export to spreadsheet function available)
• Buy List: Add the item to your "Buy List" within the app, then send the spreadsheet file (CSV) to yourself as an email attachment
• Offline scanning
• Amazon web view
• See a breakdown of the profit calculation if you tap the profit amount
• Display weight and Sales Rank
• Restriction alerts: gated items, condition restrictions, FBA restrictions, slow moving items.

FEATURES for Non-Pro mode:

• Highlights Amazon's offer
• Show Net Profit ($) or ROI (%)
• Use the Native scanner (built-in to the app) or ZXing (built-in to the app) or Pic2Shop for camera scanning
• Supports Amazon US
• Keepa graph for Price History displayed in main screen, tapping on the graph makes it full screen (slide to get to the offers screen)
• Search by barcode or keywords
• See a breakdown of the profit calculation if you tap the profit amount
• Display weight and Sales Rank
• Restriction alerts for fully restricted items (ie: gated products).
The last screenshot is for the Non-Pro mode.

Profit Calculation Factors:
• Postage Rates (USPS media mail/1st class/parcel post, Royal Mail for UK)
• Media Mail
• Amazon Variable Closing Fee
• Amazon Referral Fee
• Amazon FBA Fulfillment Fee
• Amazon Shipping Credit (non-FBA)
• FBA 30-day Storage Fee
• FBA Inbound Shipping Cost (user provided)
• Your cost to purchase item (user provided)
• Auto-calculated sell price on Amazon (based on lowest price & condition - this can also be set to be based on the lowest FBA price)
_____________________________
SUBSCRIPTION INFO:

Subscribe to take advantage of all the features described above:
• Subscription length: monthly
• The payment will be charged to your Google Play Account when your purchase is confirmed.
• Your subscription automatically renews at the end of the billing period.
• When cancelling a subscription, your subscription will stay active until the end of the period. Your past subscriptions will not be refunded.
• You could see a payment authorization up to 72 hours before your current subscription or free trial expires. You won't be charged until the actual renewal date. You can also cancel your subscription before it expires.
• You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal from your Google Play account.
• Any unused portion of the free scans will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription. 

Terms of service: https://sellerengine.com/terms-of-service

Privacy policy: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/78250020

summary: Profit Bandit - Sell on Amazon

recentChanges: - Bug fixes
comments: If they let you play with it long enough to good at it and more dependant, then I'd be more apt to subscribe but as it stopped working after like 20 scans, I don't even know what I'd be missing and I think I'm getting the same using Amazon seller and keepa(free version) apps. If you'd give us a month or even a week, or like 100 scans or more, you'd make a relationship between the customer and the app, something worth paying for. Taking the carrot away so fast just seems mean, and I resent that

It says 7 day free trial but I was prompted to pay $9.99 before I could assign it to my Amazon seller account. I did that but when I tried to scan anything I was given an error message that my account has not set up. I authorized it through the app and checked my seller account and it was authorized through there too. Now I'm irritated that I was required to pay on day one of my "free" trial and it doesn't even work.

I try to search an item when I type in the name of the item and click search it just closes out the keyboard. Also won't switch to pro account which I already paid 9.99 for. Fix the software or I'll just do a charge back on the card... I uninstalled and Cancelled my subsciption.. You guys won't be in business long with a non working product..

i got this app on reccomend from youtube and i thought it'd be convenient for scanning quickly but the camera doesn't even work. everything is too blurry to scan. if you put in a tap to focus option I might consider using it but otherwise useless. I'm not typing in every single item just to see if it's possible.

Pros Shows actual Amazon subcategory rankings. Shows quick snapshot of current FBA prices. Usually prompt search. Cons Can not use voice search from keyboard or swipe typing. Using OnePlus 6T. No search history of things I've already looked up. Both of these are super annoying.

title: Business Calendar 2 - Agenda, Planner & Widgets
description:
Business Calendar 2 has everything you need in a calendar app: It provides an excellent overview of your appointments, it’s easy to use and it gives you powerful tools for planning and scheduling your events and tasks.

🎯 Your Personal Organizer
▪ calendar, schedule planner and task organizer in one app
▪ 6 clearly designed main views: month, week, day, agenda, year and tasks
▪ flexible daily and weekly planner, quickly adjustable to 1-14 days
▪ sync with Google Calendar, Microsoft Outlook, Exchange etc.
▪ share your calendars with colleagues, friends and family
▪ intuitive navigation with simple swipes between monthly, weekly and daily planner
▪ popup with details directly in monthly planner
▪ quickly show and hide calendars with the favorite bar
▪ birthdays and public holidays calendar 
▪ beautiful calendar widgets for agenda, month, week, day etc.

🚀 Your Quick Schedule Planner
▪ convenient dialogs to enter all details hassle-free
▪ smart suggestions for title, location and attendees based on previous entries
▪ powerful voice input feature to add your appointments without any typing
▪ drag you appointments to the right time swiftly
▪ flexible recurrences

🔔 Don’t Miss Anything
▪ status bar reminders or popup notifications
▪ snooze reminders, show map, write email to attendees or check tasks directly from notification

🎨 Unique Widgets
▪ 7 professional calendar widgets
▪ agenda, month, week, day, tasks and icon widget
▪ adapt each calendar widget to suit your personal needs

🌏 Synchronized or Local
▪ sync of events with Google Calendar, Microsoft Exchange, Outlook etc. by using the Android calendar synchronization
▪ sync of tasks with Google Tasks
▪ you can also use our app as local schedule planner if you want 

🔧 Always the Right Tools
▪ easily invite attendees and answer meeting invitations
▪ heat map in year view to find free time slots quickly
▪ optional ongoing notification with event countdown
▪ live search in all views
▪ share your events easily

🎉 Add Emoticons
▪ add over 600 emoticons to your events (Emoji artwork provided free by EmojiOne: http://emojione.com)

🌟 Premium Features
You can download Business Calendar 2 for free and use it free of charge as long as you want. Additionally you can unlock a lot of highly valuable premium features in our calendar app by doing a one-time payment:

▪ no ads
▪ attach files & photos
▪ integrated weather report in daily planner, monthly planner and agenda
▪ easily move and copy appointments using drag&drop in our weekly and daily planner
▪ move, copy and delete multiple events at once using multi-selection in agenda, weekly and daily planner
▪ copy an entry to multiple days at once, e.g. to place your work shifts in no time
▪ mark events as cancelled and reschedule them later on in monthly planner
▪ suggestions for locations based on the database of TomTom
▪ privately link a contact to your appointment
▪ easily create templates for new events
▪ repeating alarms
▪ individual ringtones for different calendars
▪ repeated tasks, subtasks and priorities for tasks
▪ 22 beautiful themes for the app (e.g. dark theme)
▪ additional widget themes and premium options to customize each widget
▪ new widget "Day Pro" showing everything that matters in one view
▪ print your schedule to PDF
▪ individually configurable font sizes
▪ import and export calendar data (.ical, .ics)

💖 Developed with Energy and Passion
Business Calendar is developed by a small, dedicated team in Berlin. We’re completely self-sustained and only funded by the revenue of our apps. By upgrading Business Calendar you will not only get a lot of professional premium features but also greatly support the continuous development of the app.

😃 Follow us
Read our tip of the week on Facebook: 
www.facebook.com/BusinessCalendar2

Twitter: twitter.com/BizCalPro

- subtasks can be expanded and collapsed in the month popup, day and task view
- options to set sort order of subtasks in day and task view

comments: I really love this calendar and use it daily. I love its many features. I like that it coordinates with TASKS which moves tasks automatically to the next day if not accomplished. The only reason I am not giving Business Calendar 5 Stars is that from time to time it will drop an appointment and that bothers me! I missed an appointment the other day because of it! It wiped out some birthdays last year. That really aggravated me! I don't know why this happens.

Not fully customisable as claimed unfortunately. You used to be able to set it that tapping any date in the widget would open up that month, now it opens the day and when I wrote to the developer they said that'll never change now. The double click feature is buggy, when you click on an adjacent date it still counts it as a double press. There's also no way to turn that off, either, to quote the developer 'this is the design' and that's that.

Excellent calandar app. I tried dozens of calendar apps before finding this one.. My husband and I both use the app and it links to our Google calendars. We have several calendars set up (his stuff, my stuff, joint stuff, birthdays, bank Holidays), plus task lists, reminders, etc. and it all works perfectly and syncs immediately. We paid to upgrade so there are no adverts and the premium features like dragging and dropping make it very easy to use. Wouldn't be without it.

As of summer 2021, still the best calendar app I've used. If you want to actually see what you have scheduled, in a proper month view, this is the app for you! None of this "minimalist" stuff that adds unnecessary tapping to see what's scheduled. Has calendar grouping to quickly show/hide events so you can find what you're looking for easily. Seriously, get the paid version. It's worth every penny!

I love the option of color coding events. Sharing calender is HARD. Doesn't always sync like it's supposed to. I really love this calendar but due to not being able to share and keep apts up to date I'm on the hunt again for a new calendar. If it was just for my use this would be perfect.

title: INKredible PRO
description:
INKredible PRO includes all in-app purchase features of INKredible (a $9 value) plus free future updates.

It’s amazing how pen and paper, two inventions dating back to thousands of years ago, have been almost irreplaceable. Until now. Inheriting the best inking feature from the popular Notes Plus app, now with its own automatic palm and wrist rejection, INKredible will make writing on a tablet feel as good as, or even greater than, pen on paper. You have to try it to believe it. It’s incredible!

SIMPLE

INKredible has only ONE single mission: to create an outstanding writing experience on a tablet. It is meant to be distraction-free. In fact most of the time, you will not see any UI controls or buttons, just a blank sheet of paper to write on.

BEAUTIFUL

With more than 3 years of R&D in vector-graphics inking technology, we are confident INKredible - with a sophisticated manipulation of Bezier curves - will make your handwriting look more beautiful than on paper.

Even more specially, it will look good in any resolution, for printing or displaying purposes. Just zoom in and you will see why INKredible is unique among other handwriting apps.

… and, well, PERFECT!

OK, the INKredible writing experience on a tablet might not be perfect, but it is as close to perfection as you can find.

Try it today and see for yourself.

developerAddress: 36 Peach Blossom, Irvine, CA 92618
recentChanges: - Bug fixes (Toolbar, Share function, etc.) and improvements
comments: Great writing app. My only issue is the organization of notebooks. It seems numbers in titles are sorted by digits instead of value, so notebooks display in order as Chapter 1, Chapter 10, Chapter 2, Chapter 3, etc. If this is changed to sort by value then I would have no problems. It is great for notes and handwriting otherwise, but the current organization method is a little annoying.

This app changed the way I take notes on my phone and tablet. I was so comfortable with the old toolbar that the new one felt clunky at first, but after a few days of using the app, I can see the advantages of the new toolbar in the current app and how it will facilitate new features in the future. One feature I would absolutely love is to be able to import a PDF as a template/custom paper for new notes. I would like to create my own variant of one of the Productivity paper types for a work diary. Maybe, as an incentive for others to upgrade to the Pro version, you could create an online gallery where Pro users can create and upload their own paper types and share them with other Pro users?

Love this app for note taking. I am very excited to use it with my digital planner. Love the pens! Love that I can import my planner template. Would love to be able to use the hyperlinks set up in the planners as well as do some image editing. Specifically the ability to take an image and adjust its transparency.

More saving bugs! I think that there are auto save bug? Sometimes it kick me out and everything I previously wrote are gone! Nice apps, the best one currently in Android. But the new design updates is currently suck, it's not faster and it requires more click to change tools/color etc. Love the old design more. Also, split screen doesn't work properly any more. [mabe favorite toolbars for each tools? Cus changing color is much more harder with new designs, pls fix!]

Still great app! I feel bad though. I can see some people aren't happy with the new updated tool bar. It may be a little buggy but it does have potential. You guys really do care about the app and the quality of it, I'm sure you guys will figure it out. If I may suggest, maybe on the next update add the ability to customize the quick tools? I don't use the text tool much and I don't toggle palm rejection mode off and on but I do toggle closeup mode on and off and insert page action often. Pls x)

recentChanges: Fix for crashes
comments: I have been using Notepad for several years now. I have always been a big fan of this app. I never had any issues with it, and it stored many, many important notes for me on my phone. I really liked that those notes were stored on my phone where I could easily access them. One day the app was working without issue. Then, later that day the app crashed. I updated it and after the update all the most recent notes I had saved were gone. The app reverted to old saved data. I am so disappointed.

Pains me to have to rate an app I loved so low at this current time. I have always loved it and thought highly of it. However, Since yesterday I cannot get access to all my notes. Keeps saying the app stopped working and to close the app. For one, how do you close an app that wont work. I cant afford to lose all my important notes...

This app was very helpful at one point. But it's very glitchy now. It doesn't open and force closes immediately. I cleared my cache and even uninstalled and reinstalled. Worked shortly and problem started up again. If it doesn't get fixed I will have to move on to a different app

Love the app, been using it for some time. Unfortunately the trash bin is broken, and whenever I click on it, the app freezes, which then slowly freezes everything else on my phone if I dont shut down the app in time. Im using a galaxy s21, latest software. Pls fix, I deleted a note by mistake and cant retreive it because of this bug. Otherwise, five stars.
Easy tool to store reminders. Saves lots of papers. Good to protect the environment.

title: Lock Me Out: App Blocker & Website Blocker
description:
Can't put your phone down? Are you addicted to your smartphone? Lock Me Out is a simple but powerful application that will lock you out of your phone when you would rather be doing something else.
 
Please check www.dontkillmyapp.com to make sure Lock Me Out is running unrestricted on your device!
Brief overview (detailed overview below)
• Block specific apps, allow specific apps, or allow lock screen only
• Block specific websites
• Automatic lockouts based on usage: app time, app opens, device unlocks
• Regularly scheduled lockouts
• Only lock while at specific locations
• Turn on DND/silent ringer during lockouts
• Prevent changes during or before lockouts
• Password protection for entry, uninstall, and tampering
• Temporary emergency access
• Works in split screen, PIP, and Samsung's pop-up views
• Pay a penalty to end lockouts early
• Usage statistics for time spent in apps, with DND on, in lockouts
• Notifications to warn you about your usage
• No ads
 
Lock Me Out has helped thousands of people reduce their phone usage, including many students that want to focus on studying. It also works great as a parental control for children. Originally released in 2014, it is continually being improved based on user feedback and feature requests.
 
Customer service is a top priority at TEQTIC. If you experience an issue, please use the "Contact Support" menu option inside the app or email lockmeout@teqtic.com before leaving a negative review! We usually reply to all emails within 48 hours, and often much quicker.
 
Install now and enjoy some organic time, free of distractions!
Detailed overview
Lockout mode
Each lockout has a lockout mode associated with it. The blocked apps mode allows you to choose a list of apps you want blocked during the lockout. The allowed apps mode allows you to choose a list of apps you want to allow during the lockout. The most strict is the lock screen only mode, which only allows use of the lock screen. You can still answer calls or call emergency numbers in lock screen only mode.
 
Usage based lockouts
Configure rules that will trigger an automatic lockout based on your device usage. With usage based lockouts enabled, total screen time, usage of apps, and number of unlocks will be monitored. You can set up usage rules that trigger a lockout based on total screen time, time spent in specific apps, number of times specific apps are opened, or number of device unlocks. Usage rules can be scheduled to only be enforced at certain times.
 
Scheduled lockouts
Set up lockouts that repeat regularly on a schedule. You can choose the start and end time, the days of the week, the lockout mode, and additional options for each scheduled lockout.
 
One-time lockout
Quickly start a one-time lockout for today. You can set a custom duration, lock until a certain clock time, or schedule a lockout for later on.
 
Lockout options
Each lockout has its own configurable options. The lockout can turn on Do Not Disturb (DND), silence the ringer, block websites, or only begin the lockout at chosen physical locations. DND is important to helps us eliminate frequent interruptions, which is vital for our focus, productivity, and mental health. Having lockouts limited to specific physical locations can improve focus while at school, the gym, or anywhere else apps can be a distraction. The website blocker works well when you don't want to block the entire browser app.
 
Additional settings
There are many additional options on the settings screen to fine tune the app to your liking.
 
Premium version
The free version is limited to 4 lockouts, 6 blocked apps, 12 allowed apps, and 10 blocked websites. The premium version has no limitations. Please consider upgrading to support future development! We want everyone to conquer their addiction. If you cannot afford the premium version, please email us.

recentChanges:
6.4.2 (2021.08.03)
-Please view the full changelog by going to Menu -> About Lock Me Out -> Changelog or www.teqtic.com/lockmeout-changelog
comments: It gives so many options ...more than paid apps...i can choose what i actually want in this single one. That's mind blowing for me. It helped perfectly to block out distractions.. I haven’t seen any ads yet. Lots of thanks. and thanks for beautifully adjusted notification reminders and screen time Notification. i Always wanted to monitor my screen time but used to foget to check. Now i can see it in Notification.

This app is powerful, but not so powerful that you can crash your device. However, this app needs to implement better safe guards when blocking the phone. I would suggest implementing separate blocking logic for the phone app such as 3 minutes of emergency calling with a 15 minute block, or adding a special button for calling 911. Another alternative would be defaulting to allowing the phone in whitelists unless specifically unchecked by the user. I would advise starting with say a 5 minute one time block so that you can ensure your profiles are working as intended before you commit to a long lockout, or else be prepared to boot your device into safe mode to disable anything that ends up having unintended consequences. Speaking of safe mode, realize that safe mode is intended to revert your phone to factory defaults so anyone sufficiently desperate can access any stock app. Finally, in extreme cases the user can perform a factory reset to lose all data for access to any app. I like that this app allows both whitelisting and blacklisting apps as different profiles require different configurations. I wish that it would have a category option to help with more complicated rules. You can find similar apps for a little cheaper and many that cost 10x as much per YEAR, so I think this app is fairly priced especially for its ease of use.

This app is literally life changing. I have worked with the developer to iron out some issues and also changed my phone to a Samsung Galaxy S20. Huawei phones had an issue that stopped me using the app to its full potential. Being an ex IT professional and severely addicted to my mobile phone I was desperate to find a solution to help me stay off my phone, yet I kept finding routes in to my addiction. I now, finally, feel calm, undistracted, free to get on and enjoy my life and be a productive member of society again. I think it is difficult to imagine for most people how soul destroying it can be to be addicted or suffer addiction of any kind unless you experience it yourself. I have felt like I have lost months and months of my life over the years to just sitting there scrolling, scrolling, scrolling my life away and not being in control. Believe me when I tell you that if you have the right phone, and this software you can regain the control in your life and turn your very smart phone into a tool rather than your master. Remember it isn't your fault. The apps on your phones are designed to turn you into an addict. This application can help you regain control yet still be able to use the key functions of your phone without them taking over your life. Download it, Pay for it. Whatever it costs believe me it is worth it. Many thanks to the developer Flaviu for being responsive to me and to his customers, simply amazing service and product, I couldn't ask for more.

If you have mobile/youtube addiction, go ahead and install this app, it will save you and your time(not an overstatement)! It has multiple lockouts too, thank you so much to the developers, great job, keep up the good work!😇

Works great. I use it to remind/force me to take breaks when I'm not paying attention because otherwise my phone use aggravates my RSI. I've been using this app for over a year, in combination with other things, and my pain has decreased a lot.

title: Port VPN
description:
PortVPN protects your privacy and identity and allows you to browse the web anonymously without fear of being tracked by any government or Internet Service Providers.  

Access Websites and Applications
PortVPN gives you access to the entire websites and applications while traveling in a another country, while at school or at work.

PortVPN will allow you to use Youtube, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, WhatsApp, Facebook, and other social networks at work, at a school at a hotel or coffee shop.

Anonymous Web Usage
PortVPN is a a free VPN lets you surf the web anonymously with no concerns about being tracked by your ISP or any other third party. PortVPN issues you a new IP so that another party cannot track your activity while on your device.


How does PortVPN Work?
PortVPN encrypts your data and safely connects you to any web site or mobile app. PortVPN keeps you safe by directing your data traffic through our secure servers. PortVPN is fully automated so that will not not have to worry about manually turning on the VPN each time you want to securely connect to the internet. Your personal IP address is hidden so that you are free to browse the internet without revealing your location to anyone without permission.

PortVPN Benefits:
• Browse the internet safely knowing your passwords, credit card numbers, and bank accounts are safe from hackers.
• Privatized your online activities and location whether you are at work, airport, coffee shop, home using a shared public Wifi or on the move.

Unique Features of our Unlimited PortVPN
• No credit card needed (FREE MODE)
• No in app purchase requirements (FREE MODE)
• No registration needed (Guest Mode)
• No login or password required (GUEST MODE)
• Easy to connect to PortVPN
• Easy to disconnect from PortVPN
• FreeVPN connects you to the fastest and nearest server
• YES, it's really FREE but with limited connection time.



PortVPN is doing everything we can to keep this app simple and easy to use. If you think we can do a better job please let us know. We are here 7 days a week.

title: Autosync for Google Drive
description:
This app is an automatic file sync and backup tool. It lets you automatically synchronize files and folders with Google Drive cloud storage and with your other devices. It is an ideal tool for photo sync, document and file backup, automatic file transfer, automatic file sharing between devices,...

New files in your cloud account are automatically downloaded onto your device. New files in your device are uploaded. If you delete a file on one side, it will be deleted on the other side. It works across multiple devices (your phone and your tablet). If their folders are synced with the same cloud account, they will be kept in sync with each other.

This is how Google Drive works on computers but not on Android. Two-way automatic synchronization should be an essential function of the official app. For whatever reason, it is not the case. Autosync for Google Drive is here to fill the gap.

All file transfers and communications between user devices and cloud storage servers are securely encrypted and do not go through our servers. No outsiders will be able to decrypt, see or modify any file contents.

MAIN FEATURES

• Full two-way automatic synchronization of files and folders
• Very efficient, consumes almost no battery
• Easy to set up. Once set up files will be kept in sync without any effort from users
• Works reliably under ever changing network conditions on your phone
• Monitors battery level, WiFi/3G/4G/LTE connectivity and adapts its behavior according to user preferences
• Configurable autosync interval: 15 minutes, 30 minutes, every hour,...

If you like this app, please consider upgrading to premium version. By doing so you support the development efforts and get access to premium features. You can upgrade via in-app purchase.

PREMIUM FEATURES

• Sync multiple pairs of folders
• Upload files larger than 10 MB
• Sync your entire cloud account with a folder in your device
• Sync with multiple accounts
• Sync with shared drives
• Protect app settings with passcode
• No ads displayed in the app
• Email support by developer

SUPPORT

Please check out our website (http://metactrl.com/) for more information about the app, including User's Guide (http://metactrl.com/userguide/) and FAQ (http://metactrl.com/faq/). If you run into any issues or have suggestions for improvements, don't hesitate to email us at drivesync@metactrl.com. We will do our best to assist you.

recentChanges:
Version 4.5:

• Separate file size limits for WiFi and mobile data
• Storage accounts and folder pairs can have descriptive names
• Wait-before-delete parameter in "Upload then delete" and "Download then delete" sync methods can be set to more than 7 days
• Reorganized app settings
• Polished many UI details to fit modern Android design
comments: works as expected - syncing files from or to specified folder in google drive. used it for months without problems. The pro version is worth the money to remove ads and upload large files, highly recommended

Works very well for the most part. Unfortunately I appear to have hit some edge case where an upload initially failed, so I tried again and instead of retrying the upload it thought the file had been uploaded and deleted from the cloud, so it decided to delete the copy on the device (which was the only copy of that file). It wasn't data I was willing to lose... Be very cautious of using 2-way sync in this app 😞

I tried gdrivesync. That one didn't recognize my sd card. this one does. On the free version of this app, you only get one folder pair to sync, meaning you have to put everything you want on your google drive and on your phone in one folder each location. You can still have subfolders on each side, and it will still mirror the subfolder structure, so you can add everything you want, but I love this app, so I paid for the ultimate version. You don't have to to get a use out of this app though.

Billions of time better than Google Drive and Google One apps.. Here we can choose exactly what type of files, what folder and where to save them. And you have access to the files in real time... Google One decides what to backup, what folders and you never have direct access to the files, so it's a gamble.. Here you can check exactly what was backed up. Paying for the premium was totally worth it. I leave my consideration to the developers. Thank you so much.

Let's me automatically upload my phone's photos to Google drive (from where they are synced to my computer's hard drive as back up). I prefer storing in Google drive rather than Google photos because of the desktop sync option, which means I'm no relying 100% on Google for access to my precious photographs.

GetHabit is a personal helper which is perfect for setting goals, tracking your progress, motivating and challenging yourself to new heights! 

GetHabit can help you with planning your schedule to create healthy new habits. You can analyze your daily, weekly and monthly progress in one place!

Manage your habits, set up and find them easily
Customize your goal plan
Learn more with our articles

comments: DO NOT sign up for trial! They offer a week-long trial, but I was charged the full monthly amount 3 days after signing up for the trial. There is no customer service number to get a hold of, and even though it's a monthly subscription, there is no option to cancel or stop subscription in either my PayPal or Google play account. The website says 14-day 100% money back guarantee, but customer service is AWOL. There's also no "account" to manage from the app itself. No way to update subscription

So wish to pay more attention for the reviews earlier! Police should look at proper money stealing in this case. I've never seen so bad customer services! Even if you ask to cancel subscription, they are not doing it, but taking money from your account. App itself is messy, not very helpful. It didn't deserve even 1 star, but have to give some unfortunately.

The flow of this program is confusing/misleading! Saw the ad in FB, answered some questions to determine my habits & I keyed in my email to see the plan. Received an email to download my plan & start a free trial, but it did not indicate how long the trial was going to be. Next thing I know, on the 4th day, I saw a deduction for the subscription. There was nothing on the app to manage my payment or cancel my subscription. Now I'm waiting for their email reply.

I wish I had read more reviews. This app sucks. Plus, they charged me 3 different amounts, which totaled almost $60!! I've emailed them twice and they refunded the first charge of $0.99, but never responded nor did anything with the $19.99 or $37.99 charges. This app MIGHT be worth $5.00. It is very basic and not very useful because I don't get notification reminders, so what's the point?!

After a mix up at the start with subscriptions (asked thus be rectified for all users to make it clearer) a great app for what I need. Communication could be improved and account information should be clearer, especially for PayPal users as that confuses things. If they can rectify this I have no issues. I like it

title: Probuild (App for Contractors)
description:
Probuild is an all-in-one business management app that is designed to meet the unique needs of contracting and trade businesses. Probuild lets you manage your projects, estimates, invoices, timesheets, and communications from anywhere—using just one app!

Get Organized—Manage your day-to-day operations using only a smartphone
Look Professional—Impress your clients with professional estimates and invoices
Stay Connected—Collaborate with your team in real time

THE RIGHT TOOL FOR THE JOB
 
Probuild’s intuitive design gives you quick and reliable access to all the features you need to run a successful contracting or trade business right from your smartphone, saving you time and making you money. Probuild really is the right tool for the job!
 
With Probuild, you can:
- Manage PROJECTS remotely with real-time project feeds
- Create professional, branded ESTIMATES and INVOICES with your own logo
- Get constant access to your information (even when offline!)
- Document your work by adding PHOTOS
- Capture client SIGNATURES directly on your phone
- Conquer payroll with accurate, electronic TIMESHEETS
- Keep everyone up to date with in-app communications
- Coordinate your team’s work with worker LOCATION TRACKING
 
DESIGNED WITH SMALL BUSINESSES IN MIND
 
Probuild has been specifically designed for use by small contracting and trade businesses, including: general contractors; plumbers; electricians; drywallers; remodelers; renovators; handymen; builders; landscapers; roofers; painters: paving and concrete contractors; carpenters; siding, window and door contractors; tilers and masons; deck builders; fence builders; and HVAC technicians.
 
CHOOSE THE PLAN THAT’S RIGHT FOR YOU
 
Probuild’s competitive pricing is designed with small businesses in mind. We make it simple by offering just two pricing tiers (Basic and Pro) to suit the needs of your business.
 
BASIC: All new users start off on our free Basic tier, with full access to Probuild’s many useful features. We want you to take the time to use the app for free – with no risk and no obligation! Even after an extended trial, small teams (up to 2 users) can choose to stay on the Basic tier.
 
PRO: After trying the app for free, larger teams (3+ users) will have the option to upgrade to our Pro tier, which includes unlimited users and priority 24/7 support. The cost of a Pro subscription will then remain the same whether you have 3 users or 20+ users. Our goal is to help you grow your business, which is why we won’t charge you every time you add a new user.
